1 | <!-- run psgl inside docker container -->
2 | docker exec -it eduspace-postgres psql -U eduspace_user -d eduspace_db
3 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/api/auth/login/route.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 2 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 3 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 4 | import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';
 5 | import { LoginWithTenantDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 6 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 7 | import * as tenantSchema from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 8 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 9 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
10 | 
11 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
12 | 
13 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
14 |   try {
15 |     const body = await request.json();
16 |     const { tenantId, email, password } = LoginWithTenantDto.parse(body);
17 | 
18 |     log.info({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login attempt.');
19 | 
20 |     const tenantDb = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
21 |     const userResult = await tenantDb.query.users.findFirst({
22 |       where: eq(tenantSchema.users.email, email),
23 |     });
24 | 
25 |     if (!userResult) {
26 |       log.warn({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login failed: User not found.');
27 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
28 |     }
29 | 
30 |     const isPasswordValid = await bcrypt.compare(password, userResult.password);
31 |     if (!isPasswordValid) {
32 |       log.warn({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login failed: Invalid password.');
33 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
34 |     }
35 | 
36 |     const token = jwt.sign({ tenantId, userId: userResult.id }, env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn: '8h' });
37 |     log.info({ tenantId, userId: userResult.id }, '[API] Login successful.');
38 | 
39 |     const response = NextResponse.json({ message: 'Login successful' });
40 |     response.cookies.set('authToken', token, {
41 |       httpOnly: true,
42 |       secure: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production',
43 |       sameSite: 'strict',
44 |       path: '/',
45 |       maxAge: 8 * 60 * 60, // 8 hours
46 |     });
47 | 
48 |     console.log('Setting cookie for domain:', process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? '.localhost' : '.yourdomain.com');
49 |     console.log('Request host:', request.headers.get('host'));
50 |     console.log('Response Set-Cookie:', response.headers.get('set-cookie'));
51 | 
52 |     return response;
53 | 
54 |   } catch (err) {
55 |     log.error({ error: err }, '[API] Login process failed.');
56 |     if (err instanceof Error && err.message === 'Tenant not found') {
57 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid tenant specified' }, { status: 404 });
58 |     }
59 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'An internal error occurred' }, { status: 500 });
60 |   }
61 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/api/tenants/route.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 2 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 3 | import { TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 4 | import { createNeonProject } from '@/lib/neon/api';
 5 | import { mainDb, getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 6 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 7 | import * as tenantSchema from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 8 | import { encrypt } from '@/lib/crypto';
 9 | import { runTenantMigrations } from '@/lib/db/migrate';
10 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
11 | import z from 'zod';
12 | 
13 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
14 | 
15 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
16 |   let neonProjectId: string | null = null;
17 |   try {
18 | const body = await request.json();
19 |     const data = TenantSignupDto.parse(body);
20 |     const { tenantId, orgName, adminName, adminEmail, adminPassword } = data;
21 | 
22 |     log.info({ tenantId }, '[API] Tenant creation request received.');
23 | 
24 |     // 1. Create the new database project on Neon
25 |     const neonProject = await createNeonProject(tenantId);
26 |     if (!neonProject || !neonProject.projectId || !neonProject.connectionString) {
27 |       throw new Error("Invalid response from Neon API during project creation.");
28 |     }
29 |     const { projectId: _neonProjectId, connectionString } = neonProject;
30 |     neonProjectId = _neonProjectId; // Assign to the outer scope variable for the catch block
31 |     console.log(`neonProject: ${JSON.stringify(neonProject)}`);
32 |     // 2. Store the new tenant's metadata in your main database
33 |     const encryptedConnectionString = encrypt(connectionString);
34 | 
35 |     await mainDb.insert(tenants).values({
36 |       tenantId,
37 |       name: orgName,
38 |       neonProjectId: _neonProjectId,
39 |       connectionString: encryptedConnectionString,
40 |     });
41 |     log.info({ tenantId, neonProjectId }, '[API] Tenant metadata stored.');
42 | 
43 |     // 3. Run the migrations on the newly created tenant database
44 |     await runTenantMigrations(connectionString);
45 | 
46 |     // 4. Create the tenant's first admin user in their new database
47 |     const tenantDb = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
48 |     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(adminPassword, 12);
49 |     await tenantDb.insert(tenantSchema.users).values({
50 |       name: adminName,
51 |       email: adminEmail,
52 |       password: hashedPassword,
53 |     });
54 |     log.info({ tenantId, adminEmail }, '[API] Admin user created in tenant DB.');
55 | 
56 |     // 5. Done!
57 |     return NextResponse.json({ message: 'Tenant created successfully', tenantId });
58 | 
59 |   } catch (err) {
60 |     let errorDetails = {};
61 |     if (err instanceof Error) {
62 |         errorDetails = {
63 |             name: err.name,
64 |             message: err.message,
65 |             stack: err.stack,
66 |         };
67 |     } else {
68 |         errorDetails = { error: 'An unknown error occurred' };
69 |     }
70 |     
71 |     log.error({ ...errorDetails, neonProjectId }, '[API] Tenant creation failed.');
72 |     
73 | 
74 |     if (err instanceof z.ZodError) {
75 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid input', details: err }, { status: 400 });
76 |     }
77 |     console.log(`ERRROR:${JSON.stringify(err)}`)
78 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
79 |   }
80 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/layout.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { notFound } from "next/navigation"
 2 | import { getSession, UserSession } from "@/lib/session"
 3 | import React, { use } from "react"
 4 | import {
 5 |   SidebarProvider,
 6 |   SidebarInset,
 7 |   SidebarTrigger,
 8 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
 9 | import { AppSidebar } from "@/components/app-sidebar"
10 | import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator"
11 | import { Breadcrumb } from "@/components/ui/breadcrumb"
12 | import log from "@/lib/logger"
13 | import { TenantContextType, TenantProvider } from "@/components/tenant-provider"
14 | import { MobileNav } from "@/components/mobile-nav"
15 | import { ThemeToggle } from "@/components/theme-toggle"
16 | 
17 | 
18 | interface DashboardLayoutProps {
19 |   children?: React.ReactNode;
20 | }
21 | 
22 | export default async function DashboardLayout({ children }: DashboardLayoutProps) {
23 |   // 1. Fetch the session data once for the entire dashboard
24 |   const user: UserSession = await getSession();
25 |   if (!user) {
26 |     log.warn("No user session found in dashboard layout, redirecting.");
27 |     return notFound();
28 |   }
29 | 
30 |     // 2. Prepare the context value with user and tenant information
31 |   const tenantContextValue: TenantContextType = {
32 |     user: user,
33 |     tenant: {
34 |       id: user.tenantId,
35 |       tenantId: user.tenantId,
36 |       name: user.name
37 |     },
38 |   };
39 | 
40 |   return (
41 |     <TenantProvider value={tenantContextValue}>
42 |     <SidebarProvider>
43 |       <AppSidebar user={user} />
44 |       <SidebarInset>
45 |          <header className="sticky top-0 z-10 flex h-14 shrink-0 items-center justify-between gap-2 border-b bg-background/80 px-4 backdrop-blur-lg sm:px-6">
46 |           <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
47 |             <SidebarTrigger className="-ml-1 hidden md:flex" />
48 |             <Separator orientation="vertical" className="mr-2 h-4 hidden md:flex" />
49 |             <Breadcrumb />
50 |              <MobileNav />
51 |           </div>
52 |           <div className="flex gap-4">
53 |               <ThemeToggle />
54 |           </div>
55 |         </header>
56 |         <main className="flex flex-1 flex-col gap-4 p-4 lg:gap-6 lg:p-6">
57 |           {children}
58 |         </main>
59 |       </SidebarInset>
60 |     </SidebarProvider>
61 |     </TenantProvider>
62 |   )
63 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { getSession } from "@/lib/session";
 2 | import { getTenantDb } from "@/lib/db";
 3 | import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card";
 4 | import { Users, Folder, Building, UserCircle } from "lucide-react";
 5 | import { sql } from "drizzle-orm";
 6 | 
 7 | 
 8 | async function getStats(tenantId: string) {
 9 |     const db = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
10 |     const userCountResult = await db.execute(sql`SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;`);
11 |     const roleCountResult = await db.execute(sql`SELECT COUNT(*) FROM roles;`);
12 |     const userCount = Number((userCountResult.rows[0] as { count: string }).count);
13 |     const roleCount = Number((roleCountResult.rows[0] as { count: string }).count);
14 |     return { userCount, roleCount };
15 | }
16 | 
17 | export default async function DashboardPage() {
18 |   // The layout already secures the page, but we get the session here
19 |   // to access the data for rendering.
20 |   const session = await getSession();
21 |   const stats = await getStats(session.tenantId);
22 | 
23 |   return (
24 |     <div className="space-y-6">
25 |       <div>
26 |         <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold">Dashboard</h1>
27 |         <p className="text-muted-foreground">
28 |           An overview of your organization&apos;s activity.
29 |         </p>
30 |       </div>
31 |       <div className="grid gap-4 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3">
32 |         <Card className="lg:col-span-1">
33 |           <CardHeader className="pb-4">
34 |             <CardTitle>Welcome, {session.name}!</CardTitle>
35 |             <CardDescription>You are currently logged in.</CardDescription>
36 |           </CardHeader>
37 |           <CardContent className="space-y-4 text-sm">
38 |             <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
39 |                 <UserCircle className="h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
40 |                 <span className="text-muted-foreground">User ID:</span>
41 |                 <span className="font-medium">{session.userId}</span>
42 |             </div>
43 |             <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
44 |                 <Building className="h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
45 |                 <span className="text-muted-foreground">Organization:</span>
46 |                 <span className="font-medium">{session.tenantId}</span>
47 |             </div>
48 |           </CardContent>
49 |         </Card>
50 |         <Card>
51 |           <CardHeader className="flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2">
52 |             <CardTitle className="text-sm font-medium">Total Users</CardTitle>
53 |             <Users className="h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
54 |           </CardHeader>
55 |           <CardContent>
56 |             <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{stats.userCount}</div>
57 |             <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">managed within this tenant</p>
58 |           </CardContent>
59 |         </Card>
60 |         <Card>
61 |           <CardHeader className="flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2">
62 |             <CardTitle className="text-sm font-medium">Defined Roles</CardTitle>
63 |             <Folder className="h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
64 |           </CardHeader>
65 |           <CardContent>
66 |             <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{stats.roleCount}</div>
67 |             <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">available for assignment</p>
68 |           </CardContent>
69 |         </Card>
70 |       </div>
71 |     </div>
72 |   );
73 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/roles/columns.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import { ColumnDef } from "@tanstack/react-table"
 4 | import { MoreHorizontal } from "lucide-react"
 5 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 6 | import {
 7 |   DropdownMenu,
 8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
13 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
14 | import { toast } from "sonner"
15 | import { deleteRole } from "@/lib/actions/role"
16 | import type { roles } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant"
17 | 
18 | export type Role = typeof roles.$inferSelect;
19 | 
20 | export const getColumns = (
21 |     onEdit?: (role: Role) => void
22 | ): ColumnDef<Role>[] => [
23 |     {
24 |         accessorKey: "name",
25 |         header: "Name",
26 |     },
27 |     {
28 |         accessorKey: "description",
29 |         header: "Description",
30 |     },
31 |     {
32 |         id: "actions",
33 |         cell: ({ row }) => {
34 |             const role = row.original
35 | 
36 |             const handleDelete = async () => {
37 |                 if (window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete role "${role.name}"?`)) {
38 |                   const result = await deleteRole(role.id);
39 |                   if (result.success) {
40 |                     toast.success(result.message);
41 |                   } else {
42 |                     toast.error(result.message);
43 |                   }
44 |                 }
45 |             };
46 | 
47 |             return (
48 |                 <DropdownMenu>
49 |                     <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
50 |                         <Button variant="ghost" className="h-8 w-8 p-0">
51 |                             <span className="sr-only">Open menu</span>
52 |                             <MoreHorizontal className="h-4 w-4" />
53 |                         </Button>
54 |                     </DropdownMenuTrigger>
55 |                     <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
56 |                         <DropdownMenuLabel>Actions</DropdownMenuLabel>
57 |                         {onEdit && <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => onEdit(role)}>
58 |                             Edit Role
59 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>}
60 |                         <DropdownMenuSeparator />
61 |                         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={handleDelete} className="text-red-500 focus:text-red-500">
62 |                             Delete Role
63 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>
64 |                     </DropdownMenuContent>
65 |                 </DropdownMenu>
66 |             )
67 |         },
68 |     },
69 | ]


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/roles/data-table.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import * as React from "react"
 4 | import {
 5 |   ColumnDef,
 6 |   flexRender,
 7 |   getCoreRowModel,
 8 |   useReactTable,
 9 | } from "@tanstack/react-table"
10 | import {
11 |   Table,
12 |   TableBody,
13 |   TableCell,
14 |   TableHead,
15 |   TableHeader,
16 |   TableRow,
17 | } from "@/components/ui/table"
18 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
19 | 
20 | import { getColumns, Role } from "./columns"
21 | import { RoleFormDialog } from "./role-form-dialog"
22 | 
23 | interface RolesDataTableProps {
24 |   data: Role[]
25 | }
26 | 
27 | export function RolesDataTable({ data }: RolesDataTableProps) {
28 |   const [isDialogOpen, setIsDialogOpen] = React.useState(false);
29 |   const [editingRole, setEditingRole] = React.useState<Role | null>(null);
30 | 
31 |   const handleEdit = React.useCallback((role: Role) => {
32 |     setEditingRole(role);
33 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
34 |   }, []);
35 | 
36 |   const handleCreate = React.useCallback(() => {
37 |     setEditingRole(null);
38 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
39 |   }, []);
40 |   
41 |   const columns: ColumnDef<Role>[] = React.useMemo(() => getColumns(handleEdit), [handleEdit]);
42 | 
43 |   const table = useReactTable({
44 |     data,
45 |     columns,
46 |     getCoreRowModel: getCoreRowModel(),
47 |   })
48 | 
49 |   return (
50 |     <div>
51 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-end py-4">
52 |             <Button onClick={handleCreate}>Create Role</Button>
53 |         </div>
54 |         <div className="rounded-md border">
55 |         <Table>
56 |             <TableHeader>
57 |             {table.getHeaderGroups().map((headerGroup) => (
58 |                 <TableRow key={headerGroup.id}>
59 |                 {headerGroup.headers.map((header) => (
60 |                     <TableHead key={header.id}>
61 |                         {flexRender(header.column.columnDef.header, header.getContext())}
62 |                     </TableHead>
63 |                 ))}
64 |                 </TableRow>
65 |             ))}
66 |             </TableHeader>
67 |             <TableBody>
68 |             {table.getRowModel().rows?.length ? (
69 |                 table.getRowModel().rows.map((row) => (
70 |                 <TableRow key={row.id}>
71 |                     {row.getVisibleCells().map((cell) => (
72 |                     <TableCell key={cell.id}>
73 |                         {flexRender(cell.column.columnDef.cell, cell.getContext())}
74 |                     </TableCell>
75 |                     ))}
76 |                 </TableRow>
77 |                 ))
78 |             ) : (
79 |                 <TableRow>
80 |                 <TableCell colSpan={columns.length} className="h-24 text-center">
81 |                     No roles found.
82 |                 </TableCell>
83 |                 </TableRow>
84 |             )}
85 |             </TableBody>
86 |         </Table>
87 |         </div>
88 |       <RoleFormDialog
89 |         key={editingRole?.id}
90 |         isOpen={isDialogOpen}
91 |         setIsOpen={setIsDialogOpen}
92 |         role={editingRole}
93 |       />
94 |     </div>
95 |   )
96 | }
97 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/roles/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { getRoles } from "@/lib/actions/role";
 2 | import { RolesDataTable } from "./data-table";
 3 | 
 4 | export default async function RolesPage() {
 5 |   const roles = await getRoles();
 6 | 
 7 |   return (
 8 |     <div className="space-y-4">
 9 |       <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Role Management</h1>
10 |       <p className="text-muted-foreground">Create and manage roles for your organization.</p>
11 |       <RolesDataTable data={roles} />
12 |     </div>
13 |   );
14 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/roles/role-form-dialog.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | "use client";
  2 | 
  3 | import React from 'react';
  4 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
  5 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
  6 | import {
  7 |   Dialog,
  8 |   DialogContent,
  9 |   DialogHeader,
 10 |   DialogTitle,
 11 |   DialogFooter,
 12 |   DialogDescription,
 13 | } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
 14 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 15 | import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
 16 | import { toast } from 'sonner';
 17 | import { RoleFormSchema, RoleFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/role';
 18 | import { upsertRole } from '@/lib/actions/role';
 19 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form';
 20 | import type { Role } from './columns';
 21 | 
 22 | interface RoleFormDialogProps {
 23 |   isOpen: boolean;
 24 |   setIsOpen: (open: boolean) => void;
 25 |   role: Role | null;
 26 | }
 27 | 
 28 | export function RoleFormDialog({ isOpen, setIsOpen, role }: RoleFormDialogProps) {
 29 |   const isEditMode = !!role;
 30 | 
 31 |   // The useForm hook is now correctly typed with RoleFormInput
 32 |   const form = useForm<RoleFormInput>({
 33 |     resolver: zodResolver(RoleFormSchema),
 34 |     // We explicitly handle the possibility of `null` from the database
 35 |     // and provide default values that match the schema (`string` or `undefined`).
 36 |     defaultValues: {
 37 |         id: role?.id,
 38 |         name: role?.name || '',
 39 |         description: role?.description || '',
 40 |     },
 41 |   });
 42 | 
 43 |   const onSubmit = async (values: RoleFormInput) => {
 44 |     const result = await upsertRole(values);
 45 |     if (result.success) {
 46 |       toast.success(result.message);
 47 |       setIsOpen(false);
 48 |     } else {
 49 |       toast.error(result.message);
 50 |     }
 51 |   };
 52 | 
 53 |   return (
 54 |     <Dialog open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
 55 |       <DialogContent className="sm:max-w-[425px]">
 56 |         <DialogHeader>
 57 |           <DialogTitle>{isEditMode ? 'Edit Role' : 'Create New Role'}</DialogTitle>
 58 |           <DialogDescription>
 59 |             {isEditMode ? "Update the role's details below." : "Fill in the details to create a new role."}
 60 |           </DialogDescription>
 61 |         </DialogHeader>
 62 |         <Form {...form}>
 63 |             <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4">
 64 |                 <FormField
 65 |                     control={form.control}
 66 |                     name="name"
 67 |                     render={({ field }) => (
 68 |                         <FormItem>
 69 |                             <FormLabel>Role Name</FormLabel>
 70 |                             <FormControl>
 71 |                                 <Input placeholder="e.g., Teacher" {...field} />
 72 |                             </FormControl>
 73 |                             <FormMessage />
 74 |                         </FormItem>
 75 |                     )}
 76 |                 />
 77 |                 <FormField
 78 |                     control={form.control}
 79 |                     name="description"
 80 |                     render={({ field }) => (
 81 |                         <FormItem>
 82 |                             <FormLabel>Description</FormLabel>
 83 |                             <FormControl>
 84 |                                 <Input placeholder="e.g., Can manage courses and students" {...field} />
 85 |                             </FormControl>
 86 |                             <FormMessage />
 87 |                         </FormItem>
 88 |                     )}
 89 |                 />
 90 |                 <DialogFooter>
 91 |                     <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
 92 |                         {form.formState.isSubmitting ? 'Saving...' : 'Save Role'}
 93 |                     </Button>
 94 |                 </DialogFooter>
 95 |             </form>
 96 |         </Form>
 97 |       </DialogContent>
 98 |     </Dialog>
 99 |   );
100 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/settings/_components/delete-account-form.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client";
 2 | 
 3 | import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
 4 | import { zodResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/zod";
 5 | import { toast } from "sonner";
 6 | import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card";
 7 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button";
 8 | import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input";
 9 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from "@/components/ui/form";
10 | import { DeleteAccountSchema, DeleteAccountInput } from "@/lib/dto/settings";
11 | import { deleteAccountAction } from "@/lib/actions/settings";
12 | 
13 | export function DeleteAccountForm() {
14 |   const form = useForm<DeleteAccountInput>({
15 |     resolver: zodResolver(DeleteAccountSchema),
16 |     defaultValues: {
17 |       confirm: "",
18 |     },
19 |   });
20 | 
21 |   const onSubmit = async () => {
22 |     // A native confirm dialog is a good extra layer of protection here.
23 |     if (window.confirm("Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.")) {
24 |         const result = await deleteAccountAction();
25 |         if (result.success) {
26 |             toast.success(result.message);
27 |             // The server action will handle the redirect.
28 |         } else {
29 |             toast.error(result.message);
30 |         }
31 |     }
32 |   };
33 | 
34 |   return (
35 |     <Card className="border-destructive">
36 |       <CardHeader>
37 |         <CardTitle className="text-destructive">Danger Zone</CardTitle>
38 |         <CardDescription>
39 |           Deleting your account is a permanent action and cannot be reversed.
40 |         </CardDescription>
41 |       </CardHeader>
42 |       <Form {...form}>
43 |         <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
44 |           <CardContent>
45 |             <FormField
46 |               control={form.control}
47 |               name="confirm"
48 |               render={({ field }) => (
49 |                 <FormItem>
50 |                   <FormLabel>To confirm, type &quot;delete my account&quot; below</FormLabel>
51 |                   <FormControl><Input {...field} /></FormControl>
52 |                   <FormMessage />
53 |                 </FormItem>
54 |               )}
55 |             />
56 |           </CardContent>
57 |           <CardFooter className="border-t border-destructive/50 px-6 py-4">
58 |             <Button variant="destructive" type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
59 |               {form.formState.isSubmitting ? "Deleting..." : "Delete My Account"}
60 |             </Button>
61 |           </CardFooter>
62 |         </form>
63 |       </Form>
64 |     </Card>
65 |   );
66 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/settings/_components/update-password-form.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client";
 2 | 
 3 | import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
 4 | import { zodResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/zod";
 5 | import { toast } from "sonner";
 6 | import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card";
 7 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button";
 8 | import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input";
 9 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from "@/components/ui/form";
10 | import { UpdatePasswordSchema, UpdatePasswordInput } from "@/lib/dto/settings";
11 | import { updatePasswordAction } from "@/lib/actions/settings";
12 | 
13 | export function UpdatePasswordForm() {
14 |   const form = useForm<UpdatePasswordInput>({
15 |     resolver: zodResolver(UpdatePasswordSchema),
16 |     defaultValues: {
17 |       currentPassword: "",
18 |       newPassword: "",
19 |     },
20 |   });
21 | 
22 |   const onSubmit = async (values: UpdatePasswordInput) => {
23 |     const result = await updatePasswordAction(values);
24 |     if (result.success) {
25 |       toast.success(result.message);
26 |       form.reset();
27 |     } else {
28 |       toast.error(result.message);
29 |     }
30 |   };
31 | 
32 |   return (
33 |     <Card>
34 |       <CardHeader>
35 |         <CardTitle>Change Password</CardTitle>
36 |         <CardDescription>Update your password here. It recommended to use a strong, unique password.</CardDescription>
37 |       </CardHeader>
38 |       <Form {...form}>
39 |         <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
40 |           <CardContent className="space-y-4">
41 |             <FormField
42 |               control={form.control}
43 |               name="currentPassword"
44 |               render={({ field }) => (
45 |                 <FormItem>
46 |                   <FormLabel>Current Password</FormLabel>
47 |                   <FormControl><Input type="password" {...field} /></FormControl>
48 |                   <FormMessage />
49 |                 </FormItem>
50 |               )}
51 |             />
52 |             <FormField
53 |               control={form.control}
54 |               name="newPassword"
55 |               render={({ field }) => (
56 |                 <FormItem>
57 |                   <FormLabel>New Password</FormLabel>
58 |                   <FormControl><Input type="password" {...field} /></FormControl>
59 |                   <FormMessage />
60 |                 </FormItem>
61 |               )}
62 |             />
63 |           </CardContent>
64 |           <CardFooter className="border-t px-6 py-4">
65 |             <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
66 |               {form.formState.isSubmitting ? "Updating..." : "Update Password"}
67 |             </Button>
68 |           </CardFooter>
69 |         </form>
70 |       </Form>
71 |     </Card>
72 |   );
73 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/settings/_components/update-profile-form.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client";
 2 | 
 3 | import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
 4 | import { zodResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/zod";
 5 | import { toast } from "sonner";
 6 | import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card";
 7 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button";
 8 | import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input";
 9 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from "@/components/ui/form";
10 | import { UpdateProfileSchema, UpdateProfileInput } from "@/lib/dto/settings";
11 | import { updateProfileAction } from "@/lib/actions/settings";
12 | import type { users } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant";
13 | 
14 | interface UpdateProfileFormProps {
15 |   user: typeof users.$inferSelect;
16 | }
17 | 
18 | export function UpdateProfileForm({ user }: UpdateProfileFormProps) {
19 |   const form = useForm<UpdateProfileInput>({
20 |     resolver: zodResolver(UpdateProfileSchema),
21 |     defaultValues: {
22 |       name: user.name,
23 |       email: user.email,
24 |     },
25 |   });
26 | 
27 |   const onSubmit = async (values: UpdateProfileInput) => {
28 |     const result = await updateProfileAction(values);
29 |     if (result.success) {
30 |       toast.success(result.message);
31 |     } else {
32 |       toast.error(result.message);
33 |     }
34 |   };
35 | 
36 |   return (
37 |     <Card>
38 |       <CardHeader>
39 |         <CardTitle>General Information</CardTitle>
40 |         <CardDescription>Update your personal details here.</CardDescription>
41 |       </CardHeader>
42 |       <Form {...form}>
43 |         <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
44 |           <CardContent className="space-y-4">
45 |             <FormField
46 |               control={form.control}
47 |               name="name"
48 |               render={({ field }) => (
49 |                 <FormItem>
50 |                   <FormLabel>Full Name</FormLabel>
51 |                   <FormControl><Input {...field} /></FormControl>
52 |                   <FormMessage />
53 |                 </FormItem>
54 |               )}
55 |             />
56 |             <FormField
57 |               control={form.control}
58 |               name="email"
59 |               render={({ field }) => (
60 |                 <FormItem>
61 |                   <FormLabel>Email Address</FormLabel>
62 |                   <FormControl><Input type="email" {...field} /></FormControl>
63 |                   <FormMessage />
64 |                 </FormItem>
65 |               )}
66 |             />
67 |           </CardContent>
68 |           <CardFooter className="border-t px-6 py-4">
69 |             <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
70 |               {form.formState.isSubmitting ? "Saving..." : "Save Changes"}
71 |             </Button>
72 |           </CardFooter>
73 |         </form>
74 |       </Form>
75 |     </Card>
76 |   );
77 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/settings/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { getSession } from "@/lib/session";
 2 | import { getTenantDb } from "@/lib/db";
 3 | import { eq } from "drizzle-orm";
 4 | import { users } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant";
 5 | import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator";
 6 | import { UpdateProfileForm } from "./_components/update-profile-form";
 7 | import { UpdatePasswordForm } from "./_components/update-password-form";
 8 | import { DeleteAccountForm } from "./_components/delete-account-form";
 9 | 
10 | // This page is automatically protected by the dashboard layout.
11 | export default async function SettingsPage() {
12 |   const session = await getSession();
13 |   const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
14 | 
15 |   // We still need to fetch the specific user details for the form defaults
16 |   const currentUser = await db.query.users.findFirst({
17 |     where: eq(users.id, session.userId),
18 |   });
19 | 
20 |   if (!currentUser) {
21 |     // The layout's getSession would already have caught an invalid session,
22 |     // but this handles the rare case where the user was deleted mid-session.
23 |     return <div>User not found in this tenant.</div>;
24 |   }
25 | 
26 |   return (
27 |     <div className="space-y-6">
28 |       <div>
29 |         <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Settings</h1>
30 |         <p className="text-muted-foreground">
31 |           Manage your account settings and preferences.
32 |         </p>
33 |       </div>
34 |       <Separator />
35 |       <UpdateProfileForm user={currentUser} />
36 |       <Separator />
37 |       <UpdatePasswordForm />
38 |       <Separator />
39 |       <DeleteAccountForm />
40 |     </div>
41 |   );
42 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/tenant-provider.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use client';
 2 | 
 3 | import { createContext, useContext, ReactNode } from 'react';
 4 | import type { users } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 5 | import type { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 6 | 
 7 | type User = Omit<typeof users.$inferSelect, 'password'>;
 8 | type Tenant = typeof tenants.$inferSelect;
 9 | 
10 | interface TenantContextType {
11 |   user: User;
12 |   tenant: Tenant;
13 | }
14 | 
15 | const TenantContext = createContext<TenantContextType | null>(null);
16 | 
17 | export function TenantProvider({
18 |   user,
19 |   tenant,
20 |   children,
21 | }: {
22 |   user: User;
23 |   tenant: Tenant;
24 |   children: ReactNode;
25 | }) {
26 |   return (
27 |     <TenantContext.Provider value={{ user, tenant }}>
28 |       {children}
29 |     </TenantContext.Provider>
30 |   );
31 | }
32 | 
33 | export function useTenant() {
34 |   const context = useContext(TenantContext);
35 |   if (!context) {
36 |     throw new Error('useTenant must be used within a TenantProvider');
37 |   }
38 |   return context;
39 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/users/columns.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import { ColumnDef } from "@tanstack/react-table"
 4 | import { MoreHorizontal } from "lucide-react"
 5 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 6 | import {
 7 |   DropdownMenu,
 8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
13 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
14 | import { deleteUserAction } from "@/lib/actions/user"
15 | import { toast } from "sonner"
16 | 
17 | export type User = {
18 |   id: number
19 |   name: string
20 |   email: string
21 |   roles: string
22 | }
23 | 
24 | export const getColumns = (onEdit: (user: User) => void): ColumnDef<User>[] => [
25 |     {
26 |         accessorKey: "name",
27 |         header: "Name",
28 |     },
29 |     {
30 |         accessorKey: "email",
31 |         header: "Email",
32 |     },
33 |     {
34 |         accessorKey: "roles",
35 |         header: "Roles",
36 |     },
37 |     {
38 |         id: "actions",
39 |         cell: ({ row }) => {
40 |             const user = row.original
41 | 
42 |             const handleDelete = async () => {
43 |                 if (window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete user ${user.name}?`)) {
44 |                   const result = await deleteUserAction(user.id);
45 |                   if (result.success) {
46 |                     toast.success(result.message);
47 |                   } else {
48 |                     toast.error(result.message);
49 |                   }
50 |                 }
51 |             };
52 | 
53 |             return (
54 |                 <DropdownMenu>
55 |                     <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
56 |                         <Button variant="ghost" className="h-8 w-8 p-0">
57 |                             <span className="sr-only">Open menu</span>
58 |                             <MoreHorizontal className="h-4 w-4" />
59 |                         </Button>
60 |                     </DropdownMenuTrigger>
61 |                     <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
62 |                         <DropdownMenuLabel>Actions</DropdownMenuLabel>
63 |                         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => onEdit(user)}>
64 |                             Edit User
65 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>
66 |                         <DropdownMenuSeparator />
67 |                         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={handleDelete} className="text-red-500 focus:text-red-500">
68 |                             Delete User
69 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>
70 |                     </DropdownMenuContent>
71 |                 </DropdownMenu>
72 |             )
73 |         },
74 |     },
75 | ]
76 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/users/data-table.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | "use client"
  2 | 
  3 | import * as React from "react"
  4 | import {
  5 |   ColumnDef,
  6 |   flexRender,
  7 |   getCoreRowModel,
  8 |   useReactTable,
  9 |   getPaginationRowModel,
 10 |   getSortedRowModel,
 11 |   getFilteredRowModel,
 12 |   SortingState,
 13 |   ColumnFiltersState,
 14 | } from "@tanstack/react-table"
 15 | 
 16 | import {
 17 |   Table,
 18 |   TableBody,
 19 |   TableCell,
 20 |   TableHead,
 21 |   TableHeader,
 22 |   TableRow,
 23 | } from "@/components/ui/table"
 24 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 25 | import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"
 26 | import { UserFormDialog } from "./user-form-dialog"
 27 | import { getColumns, User } from "./columns"
 28 | import type { roles } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant"
 29 | 
 30 | interface DataTableProps {
 31 |   data: User[]
 32 |   allRoles: (typeof roles.$inferSelect)[]
 33 | }
 34 | 
 35 | export function DataTable({ data, allRoles }: DataTableProps) {
 36 |   const [isDialogOpen, setIsDialogOpen] = React.useState(false);
 37 |   const [editingUser, setEditingUser] = React.useState<User | null>(null);
 38 |   const [sorting, setSorting] = React.useState<SortingState>([])
 39 |   const [columnFilters, setColumnFilters] = React.useState<ColumnFiltersState>([])
 40 | 
 41 |   const handleEdit = React.useCallback((user: User) => {
 42 |     setEditingUser(user);
 43 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
 44 |   }, []);
 45 | 
 46 |   const handleCreate = React.useCallback(() => {
 47 |     setEditingUser(null);
 48 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
 49 |   }, []);
 50 |   
 51 |   const columns = React.useMemo(() => getColumns(handleEdit), [handleEdit]);
 52 | 
 53 |   const table = useReactTable({
 54 |     data,
 55 |     columns,
 56 |     getCoreRowModel: getCoreRowModel(),
 57 |     getPaginationRowModel: getPaginationRowModel(),
 58 |     onSortingChange: setSorting,
 59 |     getSortedRowModel: getSortedRowModel(),
 60 |     onColumnFiltersChange: setColumnFilters,
 61 |     getFilteredRowModel: getFilteredRowModel(),
 62 |     state: {
 63 |         sorting,
 64 |         columnFilters,
 65 |     },
 66 |   })
 67 | 
 68 |   return (
 69 |     <div>
 70 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-4">
 71 |             <Input
 72 |                 placeholder="Filter by email..."
 73 |                 value={(table.getColumn("email")?.getFilterValue() as string) ?? ""}
 74 |                 onChange={(event) =>
 75 |                     table.getColumn("email")?.setFilterValue(event.target.value)
 76 |                 }
 77 |                 className="max-w-sm"
 78 |             />
 79 |             <Button onClick={handleCreate}>Create User</Button>
 80 |         </div>
 81 |         <div className="rounded-md border">
 82 |         <Table>
 83 |             <TableHeader>
 84 |             {table.getHeaderGroups().map((headerGroup) => (
 85 |                 <TableRow key={headerGroup.id}>
 86 |                 {headerGroup.headers.map((header) => (
 87 |                     <TableHead key={header.id}>
 88 |                         {flexRender(header.column.columnDef.header, header.getContext())}
 89 |                     </TableHead>
 90 |                 ))}
 91 |                 </TableRow>
 92 |             ))}
 93 |             </TableHeader>
 94 |             <TableBody>
 95 |             {table.getRowModel().rows?.length ? (
 96 |                 table.getRowModel().rows.map((row) => (
 97 |                 <TableRow key={row.id}>
 98 |                     {row.getVisibleCells().map((cell) => (
 99 |                     <TableCell key={cell.id}>
100 |                         {flexRender(cell.column.columnDef.cell, cell.getContext())}
101 |                     </TableCell>
102 |                     ))}
103 |                 </TableRow>
104 |                 ))
105 |             ) : (
106 |                 <TableRow>
107 |                 <TableCell colSpan={columns.length} className="h-24 text-center">
108 |                     No results.
109 |                 </TableCell>
110 |                 </TableRow>
111 |             )}
112 |             </TableBody>
113 |         </Table>
114 |         </div>
115 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-end space-x-2 py-4">
116 |             <Button
117 |                 variant="outline"
118 |                 size="sm"
119 |                 onClick={() => table.previousPage()}
120 |                 disabled={!table.getCanPreviousPage()}
121 |             >
122 |             Previous
123 |             </Button>
124 |             <Button
125 |                 variant="outline"
126 |                 size="sm"
127 |                 onClick={() => table.nextPage()}
128 |                 disabled={!table.getCanNextPage()}
129 |             >
130 |             Next
131 |             </Button>
132 |       </div>
133 |       <UserFormDialog
134 |         key={editingUser?.id} // Add key to force re-mount and reset form state
135 |         isOpen={isDialogOpen}
136 |         setIsOpen={setIsDialogOpen}
137 |         user={editingUser}
138 |         allRoles={allRoles}
139 |       />
140 |     </div>
141 |   )
142 | }
143 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/users/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { getUsersWithRoles } from "@/lib/actions/user";
 2 | import { getRoles } from "@/lib/actions/role";
 3 | import { DataTable } from "./data-table";
 4 | 
 5 | export default async function UsersPage() {
 6 |   const [users, roles] = await Promise.all([
 7 |     getUsersWithRoles(),
 8 |     getRoles(),
 9 |   ]);
10 | 
11 |   return (
12 |     <div className="space-y-4">
13 |         <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">User Management</h1>
14 |         <p className="text-muted-foreground">Create, edit, and manage users in your organization.</p>
15 |         <DataTable data={users} allRoles={roles} />
16 |     </div>
17 |   );
18 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/dashboard/users/user-form-dialog.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1 | "use client";
  2 | 
  3 | import React from 'react';
  4 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
  5 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
  6 | import {
  7 |   Dialog,
  8 |   DialogContent,
  9 |   DialogHeader,
 10 |   DialogTitle,
 11 |   DialogFooter,
 12 |   DialogDescription,
 13 | } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
 14 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 15 | import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
 16 | import { toast } from 'sonner';
 17 | import { MultiSelect } from '@/components/ui/multi-select';
 18 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form';
 19 | import { UserFormSchema, UserFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/user';
 20 | import { upsertUserAction } from '@/lib/actions/user';
 21 | import type { roles } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 22 | import type { User } from './columns';
 23 | 
 24 | interface UserFormDialogProps {
 25 |   isOpen: boolean;
 26 |   setIsOpen: (open: boolean) => void;
 27 |   user: User | null;
 28 |   allRoles: (typeof roles.$inferSelect)[];
 29 | }
 30 | 
 31 | export function UserFormDialog({ isOpen, setIsOpen, user, allRoles }: UserFormDialogProps) {
 32 |   const isEditMode = !!user;
 33 | 
 34 |   const roleOptions = allRoles.map(role => ({
 35 |     value: role.id.toString(),
 36 |     label: role.name,
 37 |   }));
 38 | 
 39 |   const userRoleValues = user ? user.roles.split(', ').filter(Boolean).map(roleName => {
 40 |     const role = allRoles.find(r => r.name === roleName);
 41 |     return role ? role.id.toString() : '';
 42 |   }).filter(Boolean) : [];
 43 | 
 44 |   const form = useForm<UserFormInput>({
 45 |     resolver: zodResolver(UserFormSchema),
 46 |     defaultValues: {
 47 |       id: user?.id,
 48 |       name: user?.name || '',
 49 |       email: user?.email || '',
 50 |       password: '', // Always start with an empty password field
 51 |       roles: userRoleValues,
 52 |     },
 53 |   });
 54 | 
 55 |   const onSubmit = async (values: UserFormInput) => {
 56 |     const dataToSend = { ...values };
 57 |     if (isEditMode && !dataToSend.password) {
 58 |       delete dataToSend.password;
 59 |     }
 60 | 
 61 |     const result = await upsertUserAction(dataToSend);
 62 |     if (result.success) {
 63 |       toast.success(result.message);
 64 |       setIsOpen(false);
 65 |     } else {
 66 |       toast.error(result.message);
 67 |       if (result.errors?.email) {
 68 |         form.setError('email', { type: 'server', message: result.errors.email[0] });
 69 |       }
 70 |     }
 71 |   };
 72 | 
 73 |   return (
 74 |     <Dialog open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
 75 |       <DialogContent className="sm:max-w-[425px]">
 76 |         <DialogHeader>
 77 |           <DialogTitle>{isEditMode ? 'Edit User' : 'Create New User'}</DialogTitle>
 78 |           <DialogDescription>
 79 |             {isEditMode ? "Update the user's details below." : "Fill in the details to create a new user."}
 80 |           </DialogDescription>
 81 |         </DialogHeader>
 82 |         <Form {...form}>
 83 |           <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4">
 84 |             <FormField
 85 |               control={form.control}
 86 |               name="name"
 87 |               render={({ field }) => (
 88 |                 <FormItem>
 89 |                   <FormLabel>Name</FormLabel>
 90 |                   <FormControl><Input {...field} /></FormControl>
 91 |                   <FormMessage />
 92 |                 </FormItem>
 93 |               )}
 94 |             />
 95 |             <FormField
 96 |               control={form.control}
 97 |               name="email"
 98 |               render={({ field }) => (
 99 |                 <FormItem>
100 |                   <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
101 |                   <FormControl><Input type="email" {...field} /></FormControl>
102 |                   <FormMessage />
103 |                 </FormItem>
104 |               )}
105 |             />
106 |             <FormField
107 |               control={form.control}
108 |               name="password"
109 |               render={({ field }) => (
110 |                 <FormItem>
111 |                   <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
112 |                   <FormControl><Input type="password" placeholder={isEditMode ? "Leave blank to keep current" : ""} {...field} /></FormControl>
113 |                   <FormMessage />
114 |                 </FormItem>
115 |               )}
116 |             />
117 |             <FormField
118 |               control={form.control}
119 |               name="roles"
120 |               render={({ field }) => (
121 |                 <FormItem>
122 |                   <FormLabel>Roles</FormLabel>
123 |                    <FormControl>
124 |                       <MultiSelect
125 |                         options={roleOptions}
126 |                         defaultValue={field.value}
127 |                         onValueChange={field.onChange}
128 |                         placeholder="Select roles..."
129 |                       />
130 |                    </FormControl>
131 |                   <FormMessage />
132 |                 </FormItem>
133 |               )}
134 |             />
135 |             <DialogFooter>
136 |               <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
137 |                 {form.formState.isSubmitting ? 'Saving...' : isEditMode ? 'Save Changes' : 'Create User'}
138 |               </Button>
139 |             </DialogFooter>
140 |           </form>
141 |         </Form>
142 |       </DialogContent>
143 |     </Dialog>
144 |   );
145 | }
146 |

 2 | import { GeistSans } from 'geist/font/sans';
 3 | import { GeistMono } from 'geist/font/mono';

 5 | import { ThemeProvider } from "@/components/theme-provider"; // Import ThemeProvider
 6 | import { Toaster } from "@/components/ui/sonner";
 7 | 
 8 | export const metadata: Metadata = {
 9 |   title: "EduX SaaS",
10 |   description: "Enterprise School Management",
11 | };
12 | 
13 | export default function RootLayout({
14 |   children,
15 | }: Readonly<{
16 |   children: React.ReactNode;
17 | }>) {
18 |   return (
19 |     <html lang="en" suppressHydrationWarning>
20 |       <body
21 |         className={`${GeistSans.variable} ${GeistMono.variable} font-sans antialiased`}
22 |       >
23 |         {/* Wrap the children with the ThemeProvider */}
24 |         <ThemeProvider
25 |           attribute="class"
26 |           defaultTheme="system"
27 |           enableSystem
28 |           disableTransitionOnChange
29 |         >
30 |           {children}
31 |         <Toaster richColors />
32 | 
33 |         </ThemeProvider>
34 |       </body>
35 |     </html>
36 |   );
37 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/app/login/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // app/login/page.tsx
 2 | 'use client';
 3 | 
 4 | import { useState } from 'react';
 5 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 6 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 7 | import { LoginWithTenantInput, LoginWithTenantDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 8 | 
 9 | export default function LoginPage() {
10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
11 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<LoginWithTenantInput>({
12 |     resolver: zodResolver(LoginWithTenantDto),
13 |   });
14 | 
15 |   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginWithTenantInput) => {
16 |     setMessage('');
17 |     try {
18 |       const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
19 |         method: 'POST',
20 |         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
21 |         body: JSON.stringify(data),
22 |       });
23 | 
24 |       if (res.ok) {
25 |         setMessage('Login successful! Redirecting...');
26 |         window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
27 |       } else {
28 |         const result = await res.json();
29 |         setMessage(result.error || 'Login failed');
30 |       }
31 |     } catch (error) {
32 |       setMessage('An unexpected error occurred.');
33 |       console.error('Login request failed:', error);
34 |     }
35 |   };
36 | 
37 |   return (
38 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-900 text-white">
39 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-gray-800 p-8 rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-md">
40 |         <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-center">Login to Your School</h1>
41 |         <div className="mb-4">
42 |           <input {...register('tenantId')} placeholder="School ID (e.g., frisco-high)" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
43 |           {errors.tenantId && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.tenantId.message}</p>}
44 |         </div>
45 |         <div className="mb-4">
46 |           <input {...register('email')} placeholder="Email" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
47 |           {errors.email && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.email.message}</p>}
48 |         </div>
49 |         <div className="mb-6">
50 |           <input type="password" {...register('password')} placeholder="Password" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
51 |           {errors.password && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.password.message}</p>}
52 |         </div>
53 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-600 text-white p-3 w-full rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors">Login</button>
54 |         {message && <p className="mt-4 text-center text-red-400">{message}</p>}
55 |       </form>
56 |     </div>
57 |   );
58 | }

/app/page.tsx:

 1 | // app/page.tsx
 2 | import Link from 'next/link';
 3 | 
 4 | export default function HomePage() {
 5 |   return (

 7 |       <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Welcome to EduX SaaS</h1>
 8 |       <p className="text-xl mb-8">A multi-tenant platform for education management</p>
 9 |       <div className="space-x-4">
10 |         <Link href="/login">
11 |           <button className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-600">Login</button>
12 |         </Link>
13 |         <Link href="/signup">
14 |           <button className="bg-green-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-600">Signup</button>
15 |         </Link>
16 |       </div>
17 |     </div>

/app/signup/page.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use client';
 2 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 3 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 4 | import { TenantSignupInput, TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 5 | import { useState } from 'react';
 6 | // useRouter was removed as it was unused.
 7 | 
 8 | export default function SignupPage() {
 9 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
10 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<TenantSignupInput>({
11 |     resolver: zodResolver(TenantSignupDto),
12 |   });
13 | 
14 |   const onSubmit = async (data: TenantSignupInput) => {
15 |     const res = await fetch('/api/tenants', {
16 |       method: 'POST',
17 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
18 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
19 |     });
20 |     const result = await res.json();
21 |     if (res.ok) {
22 |       setMessage(`Tenant created! Redirecting to your dashboard...`);
23 |       // Redirect to the new tenant's dashboard
24 |       window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
25 |     } else {
26 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Error creating tenant');
27 |     }
28 |   };
29 | 
30 |   return (
31 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
32 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">
33 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Tenant Signup</h1>
34 |         {/* ... rest of the form ... */}
35 |       </form>
36 |     </div>
37 |   );
38 | }

/components/app-sidebar.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import * as React from "react"
 4 | import Link from "next/link"
 5 | import { usePathname } from "next/navigation"
 6 | import { Rocket, Home, Users, Folder, Settings } from "lucide-react"
 7 | 
 8 | import { type UserSession } from "@/lib/session"
 9 | 
10 | import { MainNav } from "./main-nav"
11 | import {
12 |   Sidebar,
13 |   SidebarContent,
14 |   SidebarFooter,
15 |   SidebarHeader,
16 |   SidebarMenu,
17 |   SidebarMenuButton,
18 |   SidebarMenuItem,
19 |   useSidebar,
20 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
21 | import { NavUser } from "./user-nav"
22 | 
23 | interface AppSidebarProps extends React.ComponentProps<typeof Sidebar> {
24 |     user: UserSession;
25 | }
26 | 
27 | export function AppSidebar({ user, ...props }: AppSidebarProps) {
28 |   const { state: sidebarState } = useSidebar(true);
29 |   const isCollapsed = sidebarState === 'collapsed';
30 | 
31 |   const navItems = [
32 |     { title: "Dashboard", url: "/dashboard", iconName: "Home" as const },
33 |     { title: "Users", url: "/dashboard/users", iconName: "Users" as const },
34 |     { title: "Roles", url: "/dashboard/roles", iconName: "Folder" as const },
35 |     { title: "Settings", url: "/dashboard/settings", iconName: "Settings" as const },
36 |   ];
37 | 
38 |   return (
39 |     <Sidebar collapsible="icon" {...props}>
40 |       <SidebarHeader>
41 |         <SidebarMenu>
42 |           <SidebarMenuItem>
43 |             <SidebarMenuButton size="lg" asChild>
44 |               <a href="/dashboard">
45 |                 <div className="flex size-8 items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-primary text-primary-foreground">
46 |                   <Rocket className="size-4" />
47 |                 </div>
48 |                 {/* **THE FIX**: This div now correctly handles the collapsed state */}
49 |                 <div className="flex flex-col gap-0.5 leading-none group-data-[collapsible=icon]:hidden">
50 |                   <span className="font-semibold">EduX</span>
51 |                   <span className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Tenant Portal</span>
52 |                 </div>
53 |               </a>
54 |             </SidebarMenuButton>
55 |           </SidebarMenuItem>
56 |         </SidebarMenu>
57 |       </SidebarHeader>
58 |       <SidebarContent>
59 |         <MainNav items={navItems} />
60 |       </SidebarContent>
61 |       <SidebarFooter>
62 |         <NavUser user={user} />
63 |       </SidebarFooter>
64 |     </Sidebar>
65 |   )
66 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/components/breadcrumbs.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client";
 2 | 
 3 | import { usePathname } from "next/navigation";
 4 | import Link from "next/link";
 5 | import { Fragment } from "react";
 6 | 
 7 | export function Breadcrumbs() {
 8 |     const pathname = usePathname();
 9 |     const segments = pathname.split('/').filter(Boolean);
10 | 
11 |     return (
12 |         <nav aria-label="Breadcrumb">
13 |             <ol className="flex items-center gap-1 text-sm text-muted-foreground">
14 |                 <li><Link href="/dashboard" className="hover:text-foreground capitalize">{segments[0] || 'Dashboard'}</Link></li>
15 |                 {segments.slice(1).map((segment, index) => {
16 |                     const href = `/${segments.slice(0, index + 2).join('/')}`;
17 |                     const isLast = index === segments.length - 2;
18 |                     return (
19 |                         <Fragment key={href}>
20 |                             <li className="text-muted-foreground">/</li>
21 |                             <li>
22 |                                 {isLast ? (
23 |                                     <span className="font-medium text-foreground capitalize">{segment}</span>
24 |                                 ) : (
25 |                                     <Link href={href} className="hover:text-foreground capitalize">{segment}</Link>
26 |                                 )}
27 |                             </li>
28 |                         </Fragment>
29 |                     );
30 |                 })}
31 |             </ol>
32 |         </nav>
33 |     );
34 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/components/dashboard-header.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 'use client';
 2 | 
 3 | import Link from 'next/link';
 4 | import { CircleUser, Menu, School } from 'lucide-react';
 5 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 6 | import {
 7 |   DropdownMenu,
 8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
13 | } from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu';
14 | import { useTenant } from '@/app/dashboard/tenant-provider';
15 | import LogoutButton from './logout-button';
16 | 
17 | 
18 | export default function DashboardHeader() {
19 |   const { user, tenant } = useTenant();
20 | 
21 |   return (
22 |     <header className="sticky top-0 flex h-16 items-center gap-4 border-b bg-background px-4 md:px-6 z-50">
23 |       <nav className="hidden flex-col gap-6 text-lg font-medium md:flex md:flex-row md:items-center md:gap-5 md:text-sm lg:gap-6">
24 |         <Link
25 |           href="#"
26 |           className="flex items-center gap-2 text-lg font-semibold md:text-base"
27 |         >
28 |           <School className="h-6 w-6" />
29 |           <span className="sr-only">{tenant.name}</span>
30 |         </Link>
31 |         <Link
32 |           href="/dashboard"
33 |           className="text-foreground transition-colors hover:text-foreground"
34 |         >
35 |           Dashboard
36 |         </Link>
37 |         <Link
38 |           href="/dashboard/users"
39 |           className="text-muted-foreground transition-colors hover:text-foreground"
40 |         >
41 |           Users
42 |         </Link>
43 |       </nav>
44 |       <div className="flex w-full items-center gap-4 md:ml-auto md:gap-2 lg:gap-4">
45 |         <div className="ml-auto flex-1 sm:flex-initial">
46 |           <h1 className="text-lg font-semibold">{tenant.name}</h1>
47 |         </div>
48 |         <DropdownMenu>
49 |           <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
50 |             <Button variant="secondary" size="icon" className="rounded-full">
51 |               <CircleUser className="h-5 w-5" />
52 |               <span className="sr-only">Toggle user menu</span>
53 |             </Button>
54 |           </DropdownMenuTrigger>
55 |           <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
56 |             <DropdownMenuLabel>{user.name}</DropdownMenuLabel>
57 |             <DropdownMenuSeparator />
58 |             <DropdownMenuItem>Settings</DropdownMenuItem>
59 |             <DropdownMenuSeparator />
60 |             <LogoutButton />
61 |           </DropdownMenuContent>
62 |         </DropdownMenu>
63 |       </div>
64 |     </header>
65 |   );
66 | }

/components/main-nav.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import * as React from "react"
 4 | import Link from "next/link"
 5 | import { usePathname } from "next/navigation"
 6 | import { Home, Users, Folder, Settings, type LucideIcon } from "lucide-react" // Add Settings icon
 7 | 
 8 | import {
 9 |   SidebarMenu,
10 |   SidebarMenuButton,
11 |   SidebarMenuItem,
12 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
13 | 
14 | // The icon map now includes the Settings icon
15 | const iconMap: { [key: string]: LucideIcon } = {
16 |   Home,
17 |   Users,
18 |   Folder,
19 |   Settings,
20 | };
21 | 
22 | // **THE FIX**: The type now correctly expects `iconName`.
23 | interface NavItem {
24 |   title: string;
25 |   url: string;
26 |   iconName: keyof typeof iconMap;
27 | }
28 | 
29 | interface MainNavProps {
30 |   items: NavItem[];
31 | }
32 | 
33 | export function MainNav({ items }: MainNavProps) {
34 |   const pathname = usePathname()
35 | 
36 |   return (
37 |     <SidebarMenu>
38 |       {items.map((item) => {
39 |         const Icon = iconMap[item.iconName];
40 |         return (
41 |           <SidebarMenuItem key={item.url}>
42 |             <SidebarMenuButton
43 |               asChild
44 |               isActive={pathname === item.url}
45 |               tooltip={item.title}
46 |             >
47 |               <Link href={item.url}>
48 |                 <Icon />
49 |                 <span>{item.title}</span>
50 |               </Link>
51 |             </SidebarMenuButton>
52 |           </SidebarMenuItem>
53 |         );
54 |       })}
55 |     </SidebarMenu>
56 |   )
57 | }

/components/mobile-nav.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import Link from "next/link";
 4 | import { usePathname } from "next/navigation";
 5 | import {
 6 |   PanelLeft,
 7 |   Rocket,
 8 |   Home,
 9 |   Users,
10 |   Folder,
11 |   Settings,
12 | } from "lucide-react"
13 | import {
14 |   Sheet,
15 |   SheetContent,
16 |   SheetTrigger,
17 | } from "@/components/ui/sheet"
18 | import { Button } from "./ui/button";
19 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils";
20 | 
21 | export function MobileNav() {
22 |     return (
23 |         <Sheet>
24 |             <SheetTrigger asChild>
25 |               <Button size="icon" variant="outline" className="sm:hidden">
26 |                 <PanelLeft className="h-5 w-5" />
27 |                 <span className="sr-only">Toggle Menu</span>
28 |               </Button>
29 |             </SheetTrigger>
30 |             <SheetContent side="left" className="sm:max-w-xs p-0">
31 |               <nav className="grid gap-6 text-lg font-medium p-4">
32 |                 <Link href="/dashboard" className="group flex h-10 w-10 shrink-0 items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-full bg-primary text-lg font-semibold text-primary-foreground md:text-base">
33 |                   <Rocket className="h-5 w-5 transition-all group-hover:scale-110" />
34 |                   <span className="sr-only">EduX</span>
35 |                 </Link>
36 |                 <MobileLink href="/dashboard" icon={<Home className="h-5 w-5" />}>Dashboard</MobileLink>
37 |                 <MobileLink href="/dashboard/users" icon={<Users className="h-5 w-5" />}>Users</MobileLink>
38 |                 <MobileLink href="/dashboard/roles" icon={<Folder className="h-5 w-5" />}>Roles</MobileLink>
39 |                 <MobileLink href="/dashboard/settings" icon={<Settings className="h-5 w-5" />}>Settings</MobileLink>
40 |               </nav>
41 |             </SheetContent>
42 |         </Sheet>
43 |     )
44 | }
45 | 
46 | function MobileLink({ href, children, icon }: { href: string; children: React.ReactNode; icon: React.ReactNode }) {
47 |     const pathname = usePathname();
48 |     const isActive = pathname === href;
49 | 
50 |     return (
51 |         <Link 
52 |             href={href} 
53 |             className={cn(
54 |                 "flex items-center gap-4 px-2.5 hover:text-foreground",
55 |                 isActive ? "text-foreground" : "text-muted-foreground",
56 |             )}
57 |         >
58 |             {icon}
59 |             {children}
60 |         </Link>
61 |     )
62 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/components/tenant-provider.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client";
 2 | 
 3 | import { createContext, useContext, ReactNode } from 'react';
 4 | import { type UserSession } from '@/lib/session';
 5 | 
 6 | // Define the shape of the context data
 7 | export interface TenantContextType {
 8 |   user: UserSession;
 9 |   tenant: {
10 |     id: string;
11 |     tenantId: string;
12 |     name: string;
13 |     // Add other tenant details here as needed, e.g., name
14 |   };
15 | }
16 | 
17 | // Create the context with a null default value
18 | const TenantContext = createContext<TenantContextType | null>(null);
19 | 
20 | // The provider component that will wrap our dashboard layout
21 | export function TenantProvider({ children, value }: { children: ReactNode; value: TenantContextType }) {
22 |   return (
23 |     <TenantContext.Provider value={value}>
24 |       {children}
25 |     </TenantContext.Provider>
26 |   );
27 | }
28 | 
29 | // The custom hook that client components will use to access the data
30 | export function useTenant() {
31 |   const context = useContext(TenantContext);
32 |   if (context === null) {
33 |     throw new Error("useTenant must be used within a TenantProvider");
34 |   }
35 |   return context;
36 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/components/theme-provider.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | "use client"
2 | 
3 | import * as React from "react"
4 | import { ThemeProvider as NextThemesProvider, ThemeProviderProps } from "next-themes"
5 | 
6 | 
7 | export function ThemeProvider({ children, ...props }: ThemeProviderProps) {
8 |   return <NextThemesProvider {...props}>{children}</NextThemesProvider>
9 | }


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/components/theme-toggle.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | "use client"
 2 | 
 3 | import * as React from "react"
 4 | import { Moon, Sun } from "lucide-react"
 5 | import { useTheme } from "next-themes"
 6 | 
 7 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 8 | import {
 9 |   DropdownMenu,
10 |   DropdownMenuContent,
11 |   DropdownMenuItem,
12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
13 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
14 | 
15 | export function ThemeToggle() {
16 |   const { setTheme } = useTheme()
17 | 
18 |   return (
19 |     <DropdownMenu>
20 |       <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
21 |         <Button variant="outline" size="icon">
22 |           <Sun className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem] rotate-0 scale-100 transition-all dark:-rotate-90 dark:scale-0" />
23 |           <Moon className="absolute h-[0.5rem] w-[0.5rem] rotate-90 scale-0 transition-all dark:rotate-0 dark:scale-100" />
24 |           <span className="sr-only">Toggle theme</span>
25 |         </Button>
26 |       </DropdownMenuTrigger>
27 |       <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
28 |         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme("light")}>
29 |           Light
30 |         </DropdownMenuItem>
31 |         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme("dark")}>
32 |           Dark
33 |         </DropdownMenuItem>
34 |         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme("system")}>
35 |           System
36 |         </DropdownMenuItem>
37 |       </DropdownMenuContent>
38 |     </DropdownMenu>
39 |   )
40 | }

/components/ui/alert.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import * as React from "react"
 2 | import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
 3 | 
 4 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 5 | 
 6 | const alertVariants = cva(
 7 |   "relative w-full rounded-lg border px-4 py-3 text-sm grid has-[>svg]:grid-cols-[calc(var(--spacing)*4)_1fr] grid-cols-[0_1fr] has-[>svg]:gap-x-3 gap-y-0.5 items-start [&>svg]:size-4 [&>svg]:translate-y-0.5 [&>svg]:text-current",
 8 |   {
 9 |     variants: {
10 |       variant: {
11 |         default: "bg-card text-card-foreground",
12 |         destructive:
13 |           "text-destructive bg-card [&>svg]:text-current *:data-[slot=alert-description]:text-destructive/90",
14 |       },
15 |     },
16 |     defaultVariants: {
17 |       variant: "default",
18 |     },
19 |   }
20 | )
21 | 
22 | function Alert({
23 |   className,
24 |   variant,
25 |   ...props
26 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & VariantProps<typeof alertVariants>) {
27 |   return (
28 |     <div
29 |       data-slot="alert"
30 |       role="alert"
31 |       className={cn(alertVariants({ variant }), className)}
32 |       {...props}
33 |     />
34 |   )
35 | }
36 | 
37 | function AlertTitle({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
38 |   return (
39 |     <div
40 |       data-slot="alert-title"
41 |       className={cn(
42 |         "col-start-2 line-clamp-1 min-h-4 font-medium tracking-tight",
43 |         className
44 |       )}
45 |       {...props}
46 |     />
47 |   )
48 | }
49 | 
50 | function AlertDescription({
51 |   className,
52 |   ...props
53 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
54 |   return (
55 |     <div
56 |       data-slot="alert-description"
57 |       className={cn(
58 |         "text-muted-foreground col-start-2 grid justify-items-start gap-1 text-sm [&_p]:leading-relaxed",
59 |         className
60 |       )}
61 |       {...props}
62 |     />
63 |   )
64 | }
65 | 
66 | export { Alert, AlertTitle, AlertDescription }
67 |

/components/ui/badge.tsx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import * as React from "react"
 2 | import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
 3 | import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
 4 | 
 5 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 6 | 
 7 | const badgeVariants = cva(
 8 |   "inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md border px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium w-fit whitespace-nowrap shrink-0 [&>svg]:size-3 gap-1 [&>svg]:pointer-events-none focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px] aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive transition-[color,box-shadow] overflow-hidden",
 9 |   {
10 |     variants: {
11 |       variant: {
12 |         default:
13 |           "border-transparent bg-primary text-primary-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-primary/90",
14 |         secondary:
15 |           "border-transparent bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-secondary/90",
16 |         destructive:
17 |           "border-transparent bg-destructive text-white [a&]:hover:bg-destructive/90 focus-visible:ring-destructive/20 dark:focus-visible:ring-destructive/40 dark:bg-destructive/60",
18 |         outline:
19 |           "text-foreground [a&]:hover:bg-accent [a&]:hover:text-accent-foreground",
20 |       },
21 |     },
22 |     defaultVariants: {
23 |       variant: "default",
24 |     },
25 |   }
26 | )
27 | 
28 | function Badge({
29 |   className,
30 |   variant,
31 |   asChild = false,
32 |   ...props
33 | }: React.ComponentProps<"span"> &
34 |   VariantProps<typeof badgeVariants> & { asChild?: boolean }) {
35 |   const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "span"
36 | 
37 |   return (
38 |     <Comp
39 |       data-slot="badge"
40 |       className={cn(badgeVariants({ variant }), className)}
41 |       {...props}
42 |     />
43 |   )
44 | }
45 | 
46 | export { Badge, badgeVariants }
47 |
