  653 | /app/dashboard/roles/columns.tsx:
  654 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  655 |  1 | "use client"
  656 |  2 | 
  657 |  3 | import { ColumnDef } from "@tanstack/react-table"
  658 |  4 | import { MoreHorizontal } from "lucide-react"
  659 |  5 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
  660 |  6 | import {
  661 |  7 |   DropdownMenu,
  662 |  8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
  663 |  9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
  664 | 10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
  665 | 11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
  666 | 12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
  667 | 13 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
  668 | 14 | import { toast } from "sonner"
  669 | 15 | import { deleteRole } from "@/lib/actions/role"
  670 | 16 | import type { roles } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant"
  671 | 17 | 
  672 | 18 | export type Role = typeof roles.$inferSelect;
  673 | 19 | 
  674 | 20 | export const getColumns = (
  675 | 21 |     onEdit?: (role: Role) => void
  676 | 22 | ): ColumnDef<Role>[] => [
  677 | 23 |     {
  678 | 24 |         accessorKey: "name",
  679 | 25 |         header: "Name",
  680 | 26 |     },
  681 | 27 |     {
  682 | 28 |         accessorKey: "description",
  683 | 29 |         header: "Description",
  684 | 30 |     },
  685 | 31 |     {
  686 | 32 |         id: "actions",
  687 | 33 |         cell: ({ row }) => {
  688 | 34 |             const role = row.original
  689 | 35 | 
  690 | 36 |             const handleDelete = async () => {
  691 | 37 |                 if (window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete role "${role.name}"?`)) {
  692 | 38 |                   const result = await deleteRole(role.id);
  693 | 39 |                   if (result.success) {
  694 | 40 |                     toast.success(result.message);
  695 | 41 |                   } else {
  696 | 42 |                     toast.error(result.message);
  697 | 43 |                   }
  698 | 44 |                 }
  699 | 45 |             };
  700 | 46 | 
  701 | 47 |             return (
  702 | 48 |                 <DropdownMenu>
  703 | 49 |                     <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
  704 | 50 |                         <Button variant="ghost" className="h-8 w-8 p-0">
  705 | 51 |                             <span className="sr-only">Open menu</span>
  706 | 52 |                             <MoreHorizontal className="h-4 w-4" />
  707 | 53 |                         </Button>
  708 | 54 |                     </DropdownMenuTrigger>
  709 | 55 |                     <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
  710 | 56 |                         <DropdownMenuLabel>Actions</DropdownMenuLabel>
  711 | 57 |                         {onEdit && <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => onEdit(role)}>
  712 | 58 |                             Edit Role
  713 | 59 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>}
  714 | 60 |                         <DropdownMenuSeparator />
  715 | 61 |                         <DropdownMenuItem onClick={handleDelete} className="text-red-500 focus:text-red-500">
  716 | 62 |                             Delete Role
  717 | 63 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>
  718 | 64 |                     </DropdownMenuContent>
  719 | 65 |                 </DropdownMenu>
  720 | 66 |             )
  721 | 67 |         },
  722 | 68 |     },
  723 | 69 | ]

  726 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  727 | /app/dashboard/roles/data-table.tsx:
  728 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  729 |  1 | "use client"
  730 |  2 | 
  731 |  3 | import * as React from "react"
  732 |  4 | import {
  733 |  5 |   ColumnDef,
  734 |  6 |   flexRender,
  735 |  7 |   getCoreRowModel,
  736 |  8 |   useReactTable,
  737 |  9 | } from "@tanstack/react-table"
  738 | 10 | import {
  739 | 11 |   Table,
  740 | 12 |   TableBody,
  741 | 13 |   TableCell,
  742 | 14 |   TableHead,
  743 | 15 |   TableHeader,
  744 | 16 |   TableRow,
  745 | 17 | } from "@/components/ui/table"
  746 | 18 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
  747 | 19 | 
  748 | 20 | import { getColumns, Role } from "./columns"
  749 | 21 | import { RoleFormDialog } from "./role-form-dialog"
  750 | 22 | 
  751 | 23 | interface RolesDataTableProps {
  752 | 24 |   data: Role[]
  753 | 25 | }
  754 | 26 | 
  755 | 27 | export function RolesDataTable({ data }: RolesDataTableProps) {
  756 | 28 |   const [isDialogOpen, setIsDialogOpen] = React.useState(false);
  757 | 29 |   const [editingRole, setEditingRole] = React.useState<Role | null>(null);
  758 | 30 | 
  759 | 31 |   const handleEdit = React.useCallback((role: Role) => {
  760 | 32 |     setEditingRole(role);
  761 | 33 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
  762 | 34 |   }, []);
  763 | 35 | 
  764 | 36 |   const handleCreate = React.useCallback(() => {
  765 | 37 |     setEditingRole(null);
  766 | 38 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
  767 | 39 |   }, []);
  768 | 40 |   
  769 | 41 |   const columns: ColumnDef<Role>[] = React.useMemo(() => getColumns(handleEdit), [handleEdit]);
  770 | 42 | 
  771 | 43 |   const table = useReactTable({
  772 | 44 |     data,
  773 | 45 |     columns,
  774 | 46 |     getCoreRowModel: getCoreRowModel(),
  775 | 47 |   })
  776 | 48 | 
  777 | 49 |   return (
  778 | 50 |     <div>
  779 | 51 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-end py-4">
  780 | 52 |             <Button onClick={handleCreate}>Create Role</Button>
  781 | 53 |         </div>
  782 | 54 |         <div className="rounded-md border">
  783 | 55 |         <Table>
  784 | 56 |             <TableHeader>
  785 | 57 |             {table.getHeaderGroups().map((headerGroup) => (
  786 | 58 |                 <TableRow key={headerGroup.id}>
  787 | 59 |                 {headerGroup.headers.map((header) => (
  788 | 60 |                     <TableHead key={header.id}>
  789 | 61 |                         {flexRender(header.column.columnDef.header, header.getContext())}
  790 | 62 |                     </TableHead>
  791 | 63 |                 ))}
  792 | 64 |                 </TableRow>
  793 | 65 |             ))}
  794 | 66 |             </TableHeader>
  795 | 67 |             <TableBody>
  796 | 68 |             {table.getRowModel().rows?.length ? (
  797 | 69 |                 table.getRowModel().rows.map((row) => (
  798 | 70 |                 <TableRow key={row.id}>
  799 | 71 |                     {row.getVisibleCells().map((cell) => (
  800 | 72 |                     <TableCell key={cell.id}>
  801 | 73 |                         {flexRender(cell.column.columnDef.cell, cell.getContext())}
  802 | 74 |                     </TableCell>
  803 | 75 |                     ))}
  804 | 76 |                 </TableRow>
  805 | 77 |                 ))
  806 | 78 |             ) : (
  807 | 79 |                 <TableRow>
  808 | 80 |                 <TableCell colSpan={columns.length} className="h-24 text-center">
  809 | 81 |                     No roles found.
  810 | 82 |                 </TableCell>
  811 | 83 |                 </TableRow>
  812 | 84 |             )}
  813 | 85 |             </TableBody>
  814 | 86 |         </Table>
  815 | 87 |         </div>
  816 | 88 |       <RoleFormDialog
  817 | 89 |         key={editingRole?.id}
  818 | 90 |         isOpen={isDialogOpen}
  819 | 91 |         setIsOpen={setIsDialogOpen}
  820 | 92 |         role={editingRole}
  821 | 93 |       />
  822 | 94 |     </div>
  823 | 95 |   )
  824 | 96 | }
  825 | 97 |

  836 |  6 | 
  837 |  7 |   return (

  839 |  9 |       <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Role Management</h1>

  847 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  848 | /app/dashboard/roles/role-form-dialog.tsx:
  849 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  850 |   1 | "use client";
  851 |   2 | 
  852 |   3 | import React from 'react';
  853 |   4 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
  854 |   5 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
  855 |   6 | import {
  856 |   7 |   Dialog,
  857 |   8 |   DialogContent,
  858 |   9 |   DialogHeader,
  859 |  10 |   DialogTitle,
  860 |  11 |   DialogFooter,
  861 |  12 |   DialogDescription,
  862 |  13 | } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
  863 |  14 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
  864 |  15 | import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
  865 |  16 | import { toast } from 'sonner';
  866 |  17 | import { RoleFormSchema, RoleFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/role';
  867 |  18 | import { upsertRole } from '@/lib/actions/role';
  868 |  19 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form';
  869 |  20 | import type { Role } from './columns';
  870 |  21 | 
  871 |  22 | interface RoleFormDialogProps {
  872 |  23 |   isOpen: boolean;
  873 |  24 |   setIsOpen: (open: boolean) => void;
  874 |  25 |   role: Role | null;
  875 |  26 | }
  876 |  27 | 
  877 |  28 | export function RoleFormDialog({ isOpen, setIsOpen, role }: RoleFormDialogProps) {
  878 |  29 |   const isEditMode = !!role;
  879 |  30 | 
  880 |  31 |   // The useForm hook is now correctly typed with RoleFormInput
  881 |  32 |   const form = useForm<RoleFormInput>({
  882 |  33 |     resolver: zodResolver(RoleFormSchema),
  883 |  34 |     // We explicitly handle the possibility of `null` from the database
  884 |  35 |     // and provide default values that match the schema (`string` or `undefined`).
  885 |  36 |     defaultValues: {
  886 |  37 |         id: role?.id,
  887 |  38 |         name: role?.name || '',
  888 |  39 |         description: role?.description || '',
  889 |  40 |     },
  890 |  41 |   });
  891 |  42 | 
  892 |  43 |   const onSubmit = async (values: RoleFormInput) => {
  893 |  44 |     const result = await upsertRole(values);
  894 |  45 |     if (result.success) {
  895 |  46 |       toast.success(result.message);
  896 |  47 |       setIsOpen(false);
  897 |  48 |     } else {
  898 |  49 |       toast.error(result.message);
  899 |  50 |     }
  900 |  51 |   };
  901 |  52 | 
  902 |  53 |   return (
  903 |  54 |     <Dialog open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
  904 |  55 |       <DialogContent className="sm:max-w-[425px]">
  905 |  56 |         <DialogHeader>
  906 |  57 |           <DialogTitle>{isEditMode ? 'Edit Role' : 'Create New Role'}</DialogTitle>
  907 |  58 |           <DialogDescription>
  908 |  59 |             {isEditMode ? "Update the role's details below." : "Fill in the details to create a new role."}
  909 |  60 |           </DialogDescription>
  910 |  61 |         </DialogHeader>
  911 |  62 |         <Form {...form}>
  912 |  63 |             <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4">
  913 |  64 |                 <FormField
  914 |  65 |                     control={form.control}
  915 |  66 |                     name="name"
  916 |  67 |                     render={({ field }) => (
  917 |  68 |                         <FormItem>
  918 |  69 |                             <FormLabel>Role Name</FormLabel>
  919 |  70 |                             <FormControl>
  920 |  71 |                                 <Input placeholder="e.g., Teacher" {...field} />
  921 |  72 |                             </FormControl>
  922 |  73 |                             <FormMessage />
  923 |  74 |                         </FormItem>
  924 |  75 |                     )}
  925 |  76 |                 />
  926 |  77 |                 <FormField
  927 |  78 |                     control={form.control}
  928 |  79 |                     name="description"
  929 |  80 |                     render={({ field }) => (
  930 |  81 |                         <FormItem>
  931 |  82 |                             <FormLabel>Description</FormLabel>
  932 |  83 |                             <FormControl>
  933 |  84 |                                 <Input placeholder="e.g., Can manage courses and students" {...field} />
  934 |  85 |                             </FormControl>
  935 |  86 |                             <FormMessage />
  936 |  87 |                         </FormItem>
  937 |  88 |                     )}
  938 |  89 |                 />
  939 |  90 |                 <DialogFooter>
  940 |  91 |                     <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
  941 |  92 |                         {form.formState.isSubmitting ? 'Saving...' : 'Save Role'}
  942 |  93 |                     </Button>
  943 |  94 |                 </DialogFooter>
  944 |  95 |             </form>
  945 |  96 |         </Form>
  946 |  97 |       </DialogContent>
  947 |  98 |     </Dialog>
  948 |  99 |   );
  949 | 100 | }
  950 |

  952 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  953 | /app/dashboard/tenant-provider.tsx:
  954 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  955 |  1 | 'use client';
  956 |  2 | 
  957 |  3 | import { createContext, useContext, ReactNode } from 'react';
  958 |  4 | import type { users } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
  959 |  5 | import type { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
  960 |  6 | 
  961 |  7 | type User = Omit<typeof users.$inferSelect, 'password'>;
  962 |  8 | type Tenant = typeof tenants.$inferSelect;
  963 |  9 | 
  964 | 10 | interface TenantContextType {
  965 | 11 |   user: User;
  966 | 12 |   tenant: Tenant;
  967 | 13 | }
  968 | 14 | 
  969 | 15 | const TenantContext = createContext<TenantContextType | null>(null);
  970 | 16 | 
  971 | 17 | export function TenantProvider({
  972 | 18 |   user,
  973 | 19 |   tenant,
  974 | 20 |   children,
  975 | 21 | }: {
  976 | 22 |   user: User;
  977 | 23 |   tenant: Tenant;
  978 | 24 |   children: ReactNode;
  979 | 25 | }) {
  980 | 26 |   return (
  981 | 27 |     <TenantContext.Provider value={{ user, tenant }}>
  982 | 28 |       {children}
  983 | 29 |     </TenantContext.Provider>
  984 | 30 |   );
  985 | 31 | }
  986 | 32 | 
  987 | 33 | export function useTenant() {
  988 | 34 |   const context = useContext(TenantContext);
  989 | 35 |   if (!context) {
  990 | 36 |     throw new Error('useTenant must be used within a TenantProvider');
  991 | 37 |   }
  992 | 38 |   return context;
  993 | 39 | }

 1009 | 11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
 1010 | 12 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
 1011 | 13 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"

 1013 | 15 | import { toast } from "sonner"
 1014 | 16 | 
 1015 | 17 | export type User = {
 1016 | 18 |   id: number
 1017 | 19 |   name: string
 1018 | 20 |   email: string
 1019 | 21 |   roles: string
 1020 | 22 | }

 1034 | 36 |     },

 1038 | 40 |             const user = row.original
 1039 | 41 |

 1041 | 43 |                 if (window.confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete user ${user.name}?`)) {
 1042 | 44 |                   const result = await deleteUserAction(user.id);
 1043 | 45 |                   if (result.success) {
 1044 | 46 |                     toast.success(result.message);
 1045 | 47 |                   } else {
 1046 | 48 |                     toast.error(result.message);
 1047 | 49 |                   }

 1050 | 52 |

 1057 | 59 |                         </Button>

 1062 | 64 |                             Edit User
 1063 | 65 |                         </DropdownMenuItem>

 1077 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1078 | /app/dashboard/users/data-table.tsx:
 1079 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1080 |   1 | "use client"
 1081 |   2 | 
 1082 |   3 | import * as React from "react"
 1083 |   4 | import {
 1084 |   5 |   ColumnDef,
 1085 |   6 |   flexRender,
 1086 |   7 |   getCoreRowModel,
 1087 |   8 |   useReactTable,
 1088 |   9 |   getPaginationRowModel,
 1089 |  10 |   getSortedRowModel,
 1090 |  11 |   getFilteredRowModel,
 1091 |  12 |   SortingState,
 1092 |  13 |   ColumnFiltersState,
 1093 |  14 | } from "@tanstack/react-table"
 1094 |  15 | 
 1095 |  16 | import {
 1096 |  17 |   Table,
 1097 |  18 |   TableBody,
 1098 |  19 |   TableCell,
 1099 |  20 |   TableHead,
 1100 |  21 |   TableHeader,
 1101 |  22 |   TableRow,
 1102 |  23 | } from "@/components/ui/table"
 1103 |  24 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 1104 |  25 | import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"
 1105 |  26 | import { UserFormDialog } from "./user-form-dialog"
 1106 |  27 | import { getColumns, User } from "./columns"
 1107 |  28 | import type { roles } from "@/lib/db/schema/tenant"
 1108 |  29 | 
 1109 |  30 | interface DataTableProps {
 1110 |  31 |   data: User[]
 1111 |  32 |   allRoles: (typeof roles.$inferSelect)[]
 1112 |  33 | }
 1113 |  34 | 
 1114 |  35 | export function DataTable({ data, allRoles }: DataTableProps) {
 1115 |  36 |   const [isDialogOpen, setIsDialogOpen] = React.useState(false);
 1116 |  37 |   const [editingUser, setEditingUser] = React.useState<User | null>(null);
 1117 |  38 |   const [sorting, setSorting] = React.useState<SortingState>([])
 1118 |  39 |   const [columnFilters, setColumnFilters] = React.useState<ColumnFiltersState>([])
 1119 |  40 | 
 1120 |  41 |   const handleEdit = React.useCallback((user: User) => {
 1121 |  42 |     setEditingUser(user);
 1122 |  43 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
 1123 |  44 |   }, []);
 1124 |  45 | 
 1125 |  46 |   const handleCreate = React.useCallback(() => {
 1126 |  47 |     setEditingUser(null);
 1127 |  48 |     setIsDialogOpen(true);
 1128 |  49 |   }, []);
 1129 |  50 |   
 1130 |  51 |   const columns = React.useMemo(() => getColumns(handleEdit), [handleEdit]);
 1131 |  52 | 
 1132 |  53 |   const table = useReactTable({
 1133 |  54 |     data,
 1134 |  55 |     columns,
 1135 |  56 |     getCoreRowModel: getCoreRowModel(),
 1136 |  57 |     getPaginationRowModel: getPaginationRowModel(),
 1137 |  58 |     onSortingChange: setSorting,
 1138 |  59 |     getSortedRowModel: getSortedRowModel(),
 1139 |  60 |     onColumnFiltersChange: setColumnFilters,
 1140 |  61 |     getFilteredRowModel: getFilteredRowModel(),
 1141 |  62 |     state: {
 1142 |  63 |         sorting,
 1143 |  64 |         columnFilters,
 1144 |  65 |     },
 1145 |  66 |   })
 1146 |  67 | 
 1147 |  68 |   return (
 1148 |  69 |     <div>
 1149 |  70 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-4">
 1150 |  71 |             <Input
 1151 |  72 |                 placeholder="Filter by email..."
 1152 |  73 |                 value={(table.getColumn("email")?.getFilterValue() as string) ?? ""}
 1153 |  74 |                 onChange={(event) =>
 1154 |  75 |                     table.getColumn("email")?.setFilterValue(event.target.value)
 1155 |  76 |                 }
 1156 |  77 |                 className="max-w-sm"
 1157 |  78 |             />
 1158 |  79 |             <Button onClick={handleCreate}>Create User</Button>
 1159 |  80 |         </div>
 1160 |  81 |         <div className="rounded-md border">
 1161 |  82 |         <Table>
 1162 |  83 |             <TableHeader>
 1163 |  84 |             {table.getHeaderGroups().map((headerGroup) => (
 1164 |  85 |                 <TableRow key={headerGroup.id}>
 1165 |  86 |                 {headerGroup.headers.map((header) => (
 1166 |  87 |                     <TableHead key={header.id}>
 1167 |  88 |                         {flexRender(header.column.columnDef.header, header.getContext())}
 1168 |  89 |                     </TableHead>
 1169 |  90 |                 ))}
 1170 |  91 |                 </TableRow>
 1171 |  92 |             ))}
 1172 |  93 |             </TableHeader>
 1173 |  94 |             <TableBody>
 1174 |  95 |             {table.getRowModel().rows?.length ? (
 1175 |  96 |                 table.getRowModel().rows.map((row) => (
 1176 |  97 |                 <TableRow key={row.id}>
 1177 |  98 |                     {row.getVisibleCells().map((cell) => (
 1178 |  99 |                     <TableCell key={cell.id}>
 1179 | 100 |                         {flexRender(cell.column.columnDef.cell, cell.getContext())}
 1180 | 101 |                     </TableCell>
 1181 | 102 |                     ))}
 1182 | 103 |                 </TableRow>
 1183 | 104 |                 ))
 1184 | 105 |             ) : (
 1185 | 106 |                 <TableRow>
 1186 | 107 |                 <TableCell colSpan={columns.length} className="h-24 text-center">
 1187 | 108 |                     No results.
 1188 | 109 |                 </TableCell>
 1189 | 110 |                 </TableRow>
 1190 | 111 |             )}
 1191 | 112 |             </TableBody>
 1192 | 113 |         </Table>
 1193 | 114 |         </div>
 1194 | 115 |         <div className="flex items-center justify-end space-x-2 py-4">
 1195 | 116 |             <Button
 1196 | 117 |                 variant="outline"
 1197 | 118 |                 size="sm"
 1198 | 119 |                 onClick={() => table.previousPage()}
 1199 | 120 |                 disabled={!table.getCanPreviousPage()}
 1200 | 121 |             >
 1201 | 122 |             Previous
 1202 | 123 |             </Button>
 1203 | 124 |             <Button
 1204 | 125 |                 variant="outline"
 1205 | 126 |                 size="sm"
 1206 | 127 |                 onClick={() => table.nextPage()}
 1207 | 128 |                 disabled={!table.getCanNextPage()}
 1208 | 129 |             >
 1209 | 130 |             Next
 1210 | 131 |             </Button>
 1211 | 132 |       </div>
 1212 | 133 |       <UserFormDialog
 1213 | 134 |         key={editingUser?.id} // Add key to force re-mount and reset form state
 1214 | 135 |         isOpen={isDialogOpen}
 1215 | 136 |         setIsOpen={setIsDialogOpen}
 1216 | 137 |         user={editingUser}
 1217 | 138 |         allRoles={allRoles}
 1218 | 139 |       />
 1219 | 140 |     </div>
 1220 | 141 |   )
 1221 | 142 | }
 1222 | 143 | 
 1223 | 
 1224 | 
 1225 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1226 | /app/dashboard/users/page.tsx:
 1227 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1228 |  1 | import { getUsersWithRoles } from "@/lib/actions/user";
 1229 |  2 | import { getRoles } from "@/lib/actions/role";
 1230 |  3 | import { DataTable } from "./data-table";
 1231 |  4 | 
 1232 |  5 | export default async function UsersPage() {
 1233 |  6 |   const [users, roles] = await Promise.all([
 1234 |  7 |     getUsersWithRoles(),
 1235 |  8 |     getRoles(),
 1236 |  9 |   ]);
 1237 | 10 | 
 1238 | 11 |   return (
 1239 | 12 |     <div className="space-y-4">
 1240 | 13 |         <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">User Management</h1>
 1241 | 14 |         <p className="text-muted-foreground">Create, edit, and manage users in your organization.</p>
 1242 | 15 |         <DataTable data={users} allRoles={roles} />
 1243 | 16 |     </div>
 1244 | 17 |   );
 1245 | 18 | }
 1246 | 
 1247 | 
 1248 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1249 | /app/dashboard/users/user-form-dialog.tsx:
 1250 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1251 |   1 | "use client";
 1252 |   2 | 
 1253 |   3 | import React from 'react';
 1254 |   4 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 1255 |   5 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 1256 |   6 | import {
 1257 |   7 |   Dialog,
 1258 |   8 |   DialogContent,
 1259 |   9 |   DialogHeader,
 1260 |  10 |   DialogTitle,
 1261 |  11 |   DialogFooter,
 1262 |  12 |   DialogDescription,
 1263 |  13 | } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
 1264 |  14 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 1265 |  15 | import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
 1266 |  16 | import { toast } from 'sonner';
 1267 |  17 | import { MultiSelect } from '@/components/ui/multi-select';
 1268 |  18 | import { Form, FormControl, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form';
 1269 |  19 | import { UserFormSchema, UserFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/user';
 1270 |  20 | import { upsertUserAction } from '@/lib/actions/user';
 1271 |  21 | import type { roles } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 1272 |  22 | import type { User } from './columns';
 1273 |  23 | 
 1274 |  24 | interface UserFormDialogProps {
 1275 |  25 |   isOpen: boolean;
 1276 |  26 |   setIsOpen: (open: boolean) => void;
 1277 |  27 |   user: User | null;
 1278 |  28 |   allRoles: (typeof roles.$inferSelect)[];
 1279 |  29 | }
 1280 |  30 | 
 1281 |  31 | export function UserFormDialog({ isOpen, setIsOpen, user, allRoles }: UserFormDialogProps) {
 1282 |  32 |   const isEditMode = !!user;
 1283 |  33 | 
 1284 |  34 |   const roleOptions = allRoles.map(role => ({
 1285 |  35 |     value: role.id.toString(),
 1286 |  36 |     label: role.name,
 1287 |  37 |   }));
 1288 |  38 | 
 1289 |  39 |   const userRoleValues = user ? user.roles.split(', ').filter(Boolean).map(roleName => {
 1290 |  40 |     const role = allRoles.find(r => r.name === roleName);
 1291 |  41 |     return role ? role.id.toString() : '';
 1292 |  42 |   }).filter(Boolean) : [];
 1293 |  43 | 
 1294 |  44 |   // Correctly typed useForm hook
 1295 |  45 |   const form = useForm<UserFormInput>({
 1296 |  46 |     resolver: zodResolver(UserFormSchema),
 1297 |  47 |     defaultValues: {
 1298 |  48 |       id: user?.id,
 1299 |  49 |       name: user?.name || '',
 1300 |  50 |       email: user?.email || '',
 1301 |  51 |       password: '', // Always start with an empty password field
 1302 |  52 |       roles: userRoleValues,
 1303 |  53 |     },
 1304 |  54 |   });
 1305 |  55 | 
 1306 |  56 |   const onSubmit = async (values: UserFormInput) => {
 1307 |  57 |     const dataToSend = { ...values };
 1308 |  58 |     if (isEditMode && !dataToSend.password) {
 1309 |  59 |       delete dataToSend.password;
 1310 |  60 |     }
 1311 |  61 | 
 1312 |  62 |     const result = await upsertUserAction(dataToSend);
 1313 |  63 |     if (result.success) {
 1314 |  64 |       toast.success(result.message);
 1315 |  65 |       setIsOpen(false);
 1316 |  66 |     } else {
 1317 |  67 |       toast.error(result.message);
 1318 |  68 |       if (result.errors?.email) {
 1319 |  69 |         form.setError('email', { type: 'server', message: result.errors.email[0] });
 1320 |  70 |       }
 1321 |  71 |     }
 1322 |  72 |   };
 1323 |  73 | 
 1324 |  74 |   return (
 1325 |  75 |     <Dialog open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
 1326 |  76 |       <DialogContent className="sm:max-w-[425px]">
 1327 |  77 |         <DialogHeader>
 1328 |  78 |           <DialogTitle>{isEditMode ? 'Edit User' : 'Create New User'}</DialogTitle>
 1329 |  79 |           <DialogDescription>
 1330 |  80 |             {isEditMode ? "Update the user's details below." : "Fill in the details to create a new user."}
 1331 |  81 |           </DialogDescription>
 1332 |  82 |         </DialogHeader>
 1333 |  83 |         <Form {...form}>
 1334 |  84 |           <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4">
 1335 |  85 |             <FormField
 1336 |  86 |               control={form.control}
 1337 |  87 |               name="name"
 1338 |  88 |               render={({ field }) => (
 1339 |  89 |                 <FormItem>
 1340 |  90 |                   <FormLabel>Name</FormLabel>
 1341 |  91 |                   <FormControl><Input {...field} /></FormControl>
 1342 |  92 |                   <FormMessage />
 1343 |  93 |                 </FormItem>
 1344 |  94 |               )}
 1345 |  95 |             />
 1346 |  96 |             <FormField
 1347 |  97 |               control={form.control}
 1348 |  98 |               name="email"
 1349 |  99 |               render={({ field }) => (
 1350 | 100 |                 <FormItem>
 1351 | 101 |                   <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
 1352 | 102 |                   <FormControl><Input type="email" {...field} /></FormControl>
 1353 | 103 |                   <FormMessage />
 1354 | 104 |                 </FormItem>
 1355 | 105 |               )}
 1356 | 106 |             />
 1357 | 107 |             <FormField
 1358 | 108 |               control={form.control}
 1359 | 109 |               name="password"
 1360 | 110 |               render={({ field }) => (
 1361 | 111 |                 <FormItem>
 1362 | 112 |                   <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
 1363 | 113 |                   <FormControl><Input type="password" placeholder={isEditMode ? "Leave blank to keep current" : ""} {...field} /></FormControl>
 1364 | 114 |                   <FormMessage />
 1365 | 115 |                 </FormItem>
 1366 | 116 |               )}
 1367 | 117 |             />
 1368 | 118 |             <FormField
 1369 | 119 |               control={form.control}
 1370 | 120 |               name="roles"
 1371 | 121 |               render={({ field }) => (
 1372 | 122 |                 <FormItem>
 1373 | 123 |                   <FormLabel>Roles</FormLabel>
 1374 | 124 |                    <FormControl>
 1375 | 125 |                       <MultiSelect
 1376 | 126 |                         options={roleOptions}
 1377 | 127 |                         defaultValue={field.value}
 1378 | 128 |                         onValueChange={field.onChange}
 1379 | 129 |                         placeholder="Select roles..."
 1380 | 130 |                       />
 1381 | 131 |                    </FormControl>
 1382 | 132 |                   <FormMessage />
 1383 | 133 |                 </FormItem>
 1384 | 134 |               )}
 1385 | 135 |             />
 1386 | 136 |             <DialogFooter>
 1387 | 137 |               <Button type="submit" disabled={form.formState.isSubmitting}>
 1388 | 138 |                 {form.formState.isSubmitting ? 'Saving...' : isEditMode ? 'Save Changes' : 'Create User'}
 1389 | 139 |               </Button>
 1390 | 140 |             </DialogFooter>
 1391 | 141 |           </form>
 1392 | 142 |         </Form>
 1393 | 143 |       </DialogContent>
 1394 | 144 |     </Dialog>
 1395 | 145 |   );
 1396 | 146 | }

 1537 |  2 | import { GeistSans } from 'geist/font/sans';
 1538 |  3 | import { GeistMono } from 'geist/font/mono';
 1539 |  4 | import "./globals.css";
 1540 |  5 | import { Toaster } from "@/components/ui/sonner";
 1541 |  6 | import React from "react";
 1542 |  7 | export const metadata: Metadata = {
 1543 |  8 |   title: "EduX SaaS",
 1544 |  9 |   description: "Enterprise School Management",
 1545 | 10 | };
 1546 | 11 | export default function RootLayout({
 1547 | 12 |   children,
 1548 | 13 | }: Readonly<{
 1549 | 14 |   children: React.ReactNode;
 1550 | 15 | }>) {
 1551 | 16 |   return (
 1552 | 17 |     <html lang="en">
 1553 | 18 |       <body
 1554 | 19 |         className={`${GeistSans.variable} ${GeistMono.variable} font-sans antialiased`}
 1555 | 20 |       >

 1557 | 22 |         <Toaster richColors />
 1558 | 23 |       </body>

 1562 | 
 1563 | 
 1564 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1565 | /app/login/page.tsx:
 1566 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1567 |  1 | // app/login/page.tsx
 1568 |  2 | 'use client';
 1569 |  3 | 
 1570 |  4 | import { useState } from 'react';
 1571 |  5 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 1572 |  6 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 1573 |  7 | import { LoginWithTenantInput, LoginWithTenantDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 1574 |  8 | 
 1575 |  9 | export default function LoginPage() {
 1576 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
 1577 | 11 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<LoginWithTenantInput>({
 1578 | 12 |     resolver: zodResolver(LoginWithTenantDto),
 1579 | 13 |   });
 1580 | 14 | 
 1581 | 15 |   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginWithTenantInput) => {
 1582 | 16 |     setMessage('');
 1583 | 17 |     try {
 1584 | 18 |       const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
 1585 | 19 |         method: 'POST',
 1586 | 20 |         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
 1587 | 21 |         body: JSON.stringify(data),
 1588 | 22 |       });
 1589 | 23 | 
 1590 | 24 |       if (res.ok) {
 1591 | 25 |         setMessage('Login successful! Redirecting...');
 1592 | 26 |         window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
 1593 | 27 |       } else {
 1594 | 28 |         const result = await res.json();
 1595 | 29 |         setMessage(result.error || 'Login failed');
 1596 | 30 |       }
 1597 | 31 |     } catch (error) {
 1598 | 32 |       setMessage('An unexpected error occurred.');
 1599 | 33 |       console.error('Login request failed:', error);
 1600 | 34 |     }
 1601 | 35 |   };
 1602 | 36 | 
 1603 | 37 |   return (
 1604 | 38 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-900 text-white">
 1605 | 39 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-gray-800 p-8 rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-md">
 1606 | 40 |         <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-center">Login to Your School</h1>
 1607 | 41 |         <div className="mb-4">
 1608 | 42 |           <input {...register('tenantId')} placeholder="School ID (e.g., frisco-high)" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
 1609 | 43 |           {errors.tenantId && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.tenantId.message}</p>}
 1610 | 44 |         </div>
 1611 | 45 |         <div className="mb-4">
 1612 | 46 |           <input {...register('email')} placeholder="Email" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
 1613 | 47 |           {errors.email && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.email.message}</p>}
 1614 | 48 |         </div>
 1615 | 49 |         <div className="mb-6">
 1616 | 50 |           <input type="password" {...register('password')} placeholder="Password" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
 1617 | 51 |           {errors.password && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.password.message}</p>}
 1618 | 52 |         </div>
 1619 | 53 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-600 text-white p-3 w-full rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors">Login</button>
 1620 | 54 |         {message && <p className="mt-4 text-center text-red-400">{message}</p>}
 1621 | 55 |       </form>
 1622 | 56 |     </div>
 1623 | 57 |   );
 1624 | 58 | }
 1625 | 
 1626 | 
 1627 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1628 | /app/page.tsx:
 1629 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1630 |  1 | // app/page.tsx
 1631 |  2 | import Link from 'next/link';
 1632 |  3 | 
 1633 |  4 | export default function HomePage() {
 1634 |  5 |   return (
 1635 |  6 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center bg-gray-800 text-center">
 1636 |  7 |       <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Welcome to EduX SaaS</h1>
 1637 |  8 |       <p className="text-xl mb-8">A multi-tenant platform for education management</p>
 1638 |  9 |       <div className="space-x-4">
 1639 | 10 |         <Link href="/login">
 1640 | 11 |           <button className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-600">Login</button>
 1641 | 12 |         </Link>
 1642 | 13 |         <Link href="/signup">
 1643 | 14 |           <button className="bg-green-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-600">Signup</button>
 1644 | 15 |         </Link>
 1645 | 16 |       </div>
 1646 | 17 |     </div>
 1647 | 18 |   );
 1648 | 19 | }
 1649 | 
 1650 | 
 1651 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1652 | /app/signup/page.tsx:
 1653 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1654 |  1 | 'use client';
 1655 |  2 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 1656 |  3 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 1657 |  4 | import { TenantSignupInput, TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 1658 |  5 | import { useState } from 'react';
 1659 |  6 | // useRouter was removed as it was unused.
 1660 |  7 | 
 1661 |  8 | export default function SignupPage() {
 1662 |  9 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
 1663 | 10 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<TenantSignupInput>({
 1664 | 11 |     resolver: zodResolver(TenantSignupDto),
 1665 | 12 |   });
 1666 | 13 | 
 1667 | 14 |   const onSubmit = async (data: TenantSignupInput) => {
 1668 | 15 |     const res = await fetch('/api/tenants', {
 1669 | 16 |       method: 'POST',
 1670 | 17 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
 1671 | 18 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
 1672 | 19 |     });
 1673 | 20 |     const result = await res.json();
 1674 | 21 |     if (res.ok) {
 1675 | 22 |       setMessage(`Tenant created! Redirecting to your dashboard...`);
 1676 | 23 |       // Redirect to the new tenant's dashboard
 1677 | 24 |       window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
 1678 | 25 |     } else {
 1679 | 26 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Error creating tenant');
 1680 | 27 |     }
 1681 | 28 |   };
 1682 | 29 | 
 1683 | 30 |   return (
 1684 | 31 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
 1685 | 32 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">
 1686 | 33 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Tenant Signup</h1>
 1687 | 34 |         {/* ... rest of the form ... */}
 1688 | 35 |       </form>
 1689 | 36 |     </div>
 1690 | 37 |   );
 1691 | 38 | }

 1790 | 68 |     );

 1800 |   4 | 
 1801 |   5 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 1802 |   6 | 
 1803 |   7 | function Breadcrumb({ ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"nav">) {
 1804 |   8 |   return <nav aria-label="breadcrumb" data-slot="breadcrumb" {...props} />
 1805 |   9 | }
 1806 |  10 | 
 1807 |  11 | function BreadcrumbList({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"ol">) {
 1808 |  12 |   return (
 1809 |  13 |     <ol
 1810 |  14 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-list"
 1811 |  15 |       className={cn(
 1812 |  16 |         "text-muted-foreground flex flex-wrap items-center gap-1.5 text-sm break-words sm:gap-2.5",
 1813 |  17 |         className
 1814 |  18 |       )}
 1815 |  19 |       {...props}
 1816 |  20 |     />
 1817 |  21 |   )
 1818 |  22 | }
 1819 |  23 | 
 1820 |  24 | function BreadcrumbItem({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"li">) {
 1821 |  25 |   return (
 1822 |  26 |     <li
 1823 |  27 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-item"
 1824 |  28 |       className={cn("inline-flex items-center gap-1.5", className)}
 1825 |  29 |       {...props}
 1826 |  30 |     />
 1827 |  31 |   )
 1828 |  32 | }
 1829 |  33 | 
 1830 |  34 | function BreadcrumbLink({
 1831 |  35 |   asChild,
 1832 |  36 |   className,
 1833 |  37 |   ...props
 1834 |  38 | }: React.ComponentProps<"a"> & {
 1835 |  39 |   asChild?: boolean
 1836 |  40 | }) {
 1837 |  41 |   const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "a"
 1838 |  42 | 
 1839 |  43 |   return (
 1840 |  44 |     <Comp
 1841 |  45 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-link"
 1842 |  46 |       className={cn("hover:text-foreground transition-colors", className)}
 1843 |  47 |       {...props}
 1844 |  48 |     />
 1845 |  49 |   )
 1846 |  50 | }
 1847 |  51 | 
 1848 |  52 | function BreadcrumbPage({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"span">) {
 1849 |  53 |   return (
 1850 |  54 |     <span
 1851 |  55 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-page"
 1852 |  56 |       role="link"
 1853 |  57 |       aria-disabled="true"
 1854 |  58 |       aria-current="page"
 1855 |  59 |       className={cn("text-foreground font-normal", className)}
 1856 |  60 |       {...props}
 1857 |  61 |     />
 1858 |  62 |   )
 1859 |  63 | }
 1860 |  64 | 
 1861 |  65 | function BreadcrumbSeparator({
 1862 |  66 |   children,
 1863 |  67 |   className,
 1864 |  68 |   ...props
 1865 |  69 | }: React.ComponentProps<"li">) {
 1866 |  70 |   return (
 1867 |  71 |     <li
 1868 |  72 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-separator"
 1869 |  73 |       role="presentation"
 1870 |  74 |       aria-hidden="true"
 1871 |  75 |       className={cn("[&>svg]:size-3.5", className)}
 1872 |  76 |       {...props}
 1873 |  77 |     >
 1874 |  78 |       {children ?? <ChevronRight />}
 1875 |  79 |     </li>
 1876 |  80 |   )
 1877 |  81 | }
 1878 |  82 | 
 1879 |  83 | function BreadcrumbEllipsis({
 1880 |  84 |   className,
 1881 |  85 |   ...props
 1882 |  86 | }: React.ComponentProps<"span">) {
 1883 |  87 |   return (
 1884 |  88 |     <span
 1885 |  89 |       data-slot="breadcrumb-ellipsis"
 1886 |  90 |       role="presentation"
 1887 |  91 |       aria-hidden="true"
 1888 |  92 |       className={cn("flex size-9 items-center justify-center", className)}
 1889 |  93 |       {...props}
 1890 |  94 |     >
 1891 |  95 |       <MoreHorizontal className="size-4" />
 1892 |  96 |       <span className="sr-only">More</span>
 1893 |  97 |     </span>
 1894 |  98 |   )
 1895 |  99 | }

 2048 | /components/team-switcher.tsx:
 2049 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2050 |  1 | "use client"
 2051 |  2 | 
 2052 |  3 | import * as React from "react"
 2053 |  4 | import { ChevronsUpDown, Plus } from "lucide-react"
 2054 |  5 | 
 2055 |  6 | import {
 2056 |  7 |   DropdownMenu,
 2057 |  8 |   DropdownMenuContent,
 2058 |  9 |   DropdownMenuItem,
 2059 | 10 |   DropdownMenuLabel,
 2060 | 11 |   DropdownMenuSeparator,
 2061 | 12 |   DropdownMenuShortcut,
 2062 | 13 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
 2063 | 14 | } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu"
 2064 | 15 | import {
 2065 | 16 |   SidebarMenu,
 2066 | 17 |   SidebarMenuButton,
 2067 | 18 |   SidebarMenuItem,
 2068 | 19 |   useSidebar,
 2069 | 20 | } from "@/components/ui/sidebar"
 2070 | 21 | 
 2071 | 22 | export function TeamSwitcher({
 2072 | 23 |   teams,
 2073 | 24 | }: {
 2074 | 25 |   teams: {
 2075 | 26 |     name: string
 2076 | 27 |     logo: React.ElementType
 2077 | 28 |     plan: string
 2078 | 29 |   }[]
 2079 | 30 | }) {
 2080 | 31 |   const { isMobile } = useSidebar(false)
 2081 | 32 |     const [activeTeam, setActiveTeam] = React.useState(teams[0])
 2082 | 33 | 
 2083 | 34 |   if (!activeTeam) {
 2084 | 35 |     return null
 2085 | 36 |   }
 2086 | 37 | 
 2087 | 38 |   return (
 2088 | 39 |     <SidebarMenu>
 2089 | 40 |       <SidebarMenuItem>
 2090 | 41 |         <DropdownMenu>
 2091 | 42 |           <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
 2092 | 43 |             <SidebarMenuButton
 2093 | 44 |               size="lg"
 2094 | 45 |               className="data-[state=open]:bg-sidebar-accent data-[state=open]:text-sidebar-accent-foreground"
 2095 | 46 |             >
 2096 | 47 |               <div className="bg-sidebar-primary text-sidebar-primary-foreground flex aspect-square size-8 items-center justify-center rounded-lg">
 2097 | 48 |                 <activeTeam.logo className="size-4" />
 2098 | 49 |               </div>
 2099 | 50 |               <div className="grid flex-1 text-left text-sm leading-tight">
 2100 | 51 |                 <span className="truncate font-medium">{activeTeam.name}</span>
 2101 | 52 |                 <span className="truncate text-xs">{activeTeam.plan}</span>
 2102 | 53 |               </div>
 2103 | 54 |               <ChevronsUpDown className="ml-auto" />
 2104 | 55 |             </SidebarMenuButton>
 2105 | 56 |           </DropdownMenuTrigger>
 2106 | 57 |           <DropdownMenuContent
 2107 | 58 |             className="w-(--radix-dropdown-menu-trigger-width) min-w-56 rounded-lg"
 2108 | 59 |             align="start"
 2109 | 60 |             side={isMobile ? "bottom" : "right"}
 2110 | 61 |             sideOffset={4}
 2111 | 62 |           >
 2112 | 63 |             <DropdownMenuLabel className="text-muted-foreground text-xs">
 2113 | 64 |               Teams
 2114 | 65 |             </DropdownMenuLabel>
 2115 | 66 |             {teams.map((team, index) => (
 2116 | 67 |               <DropdownMenuItem
 2117 | 68 |                 key={team.name}
 2118 | 69 |                 onClick={() => setActiveTeam(team)}
 2119 | 70 |                 className="gap-2 p-2"
 2120 | 71 |               >
 2121 | 72 |                 <div className="flex size-6 items-center justify-center rounded-md border">
 2122 | 73 |                   <team.logo className="size-3.5 shrink-0" />
 2123 | 74 |                 </div>
 2124 | 75 |                 {team.name}
 2125 | 76 |                 <DropdownMenuShortcut>⌘{index + 1}</DropdownMenuShortcut>
 2126 | 77 |               </DropdownMenuItem>
 2127 | 78 |             ))}
 2128 | 79 |             <DropdownMenuSeparator />
 2129 | 80 |             <DropdownMenuItem className="gap-2 p-2">
 2130 | 81 |               <div className="flex size-6 items-center justify-center rounded-md border bg-transparent">
 2131 | 82 |                 <Plus className="size-4" />
 2132 | 83 |               </div>
 2133 | 84 |               <div className="text-muted-foreground font-medium">Add team</div>
 2134 | 85 |             </DropdownMenuItem>
 2135 | 86 |           </DropdownMenuContent>
 2136 | 87 |         </DropdownMenu>
 2137 | 88 |       </SidebarMenuItem>
 2138 | 89 |     </SidebarMenu>
 2139 | 90 |   )
 2140 | 91 | }

 2143 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2144 | /components/ui/alert.tsx:
 2145 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2146 |  1 | import * as React from "react"
 2147 |  2 | import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
 2148 |  3 | 
 2149 |  4 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 2150 |  5 | 
 2151 |  6 | const alertVariants = cva(
 2152 |  7 |   "relative w-full rounded-lg border px-4 py-3 text-sm grid has-[>svg]:grid-cols-[calc(var(--spacing)*4)_1fr] grid-cols-[0_1fr] has-[>svg]:gap-x-3 gap-y-0.5 items-start [&>svg]:size-4 [&>svg]:translate-y-0.5 [&>svg]:text-current",
 2153 |  8 |   {
 2154 |  9 |     variants: {
 2155 | 10 |       variant: {
 2156 | 11 |         default: "bg-card text-card-foreground",
 2157 | 12 |         destructive:
 2158 | 13 |           "text-destructive bg-card [&>svg]:text-current *:data-[slot=alert-description]:text-destructive/90",
 2159 | 14 |       },
 2160 | 15 |     },
 2161 | 16 |     defaultVariants: {
 2162 | 17 |       variant: "default",
 2163 | 18 |     },
 2164 | 19 |   }
 2165 | 20 | )
 2166 | 21 | 
 2167 | 22 | function Alert({
 2168 | 23 |   className,
 2169 | 24 |   variant,
 2170 | 25 |   ...props
 2171 | 26 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & VariantProps<typeof alertVariants>) {
 2172 | 27 |   return (
 2173 | 28 |     <div
 2174 | 29 |       data-slot="alert"
 2175 | 30 |       role="alert"
 2176 | 31 |       className={cn(alertVariants({ variant }), className)}
 2177 | 32 |       {...props}
 2178 | 33 |     />
 2179 | 34 |   )
 2180 | 35 | }
 2181 | 36 | 
 2182 | 37 | function AlertTitle({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
 2183 | 38 |   return (
 2184 | 39 |     <div
 2185 | 40 |       data-slot="alert-title"
 2186 | 41 |       className={cn(
 2187 | 42 |         "col-start-2 line-clamp-1 min-h-4 font-medium tracking-tight",
 2188 | 43 |         className
 2189 | 44 |       )}
 2190 | 45 |       {...props}
 2191 | 46 |     />
 2192 | 47 |   )
 2193 | 48 | }
 2194 | 49 | 
 2195 | 50 | function AlertDescription({
 2196 | 51 |   className,
 2197 | 52 |   ...props
 2198 | 53 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
 2199 | 54 |   return (
 2200 | 55 |     <div
 2201 | 56 |       data-slot="alert-description"
 2202 | 57 |       className={cn(
 2203 | 58 |         "text-muted-foreground col-start-2 grid justify-items-start gap-1 text-sm [&_p]:leading-relaxed",
 2204 | 59 |         className
 2205 | 60 |       )}
 2206 | 61 |       {...props}
 2207 | 62 |     />
 2208 | 63 |   )
 2209 | 64 | }
 2210 | 65 | 
 2211 | 66 | export { Alert, AlertTitle, AlertDescription }
 2212 | 67 |

 2776 |  56 | }) {
 2777 |  57 |   return (
 2778 |  58 |     <DialogPortal data-slot="dialog-portal">
 2779 |  59 |       <DialogOverlay />
 2780 |  60 |       <DialogPrimitive.Content
 2781 |  61 |         data-slot="dialog-content"
 2782 |  62 |         className={cn(
 2783 |  63 |           "bg-background data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95 fixed top-[50%] left-[50%] z-50 grid w-full max-w-[calc(100%-2rem)] translate-x-[-50%] translate-y-[-50%] gap-4 rounded-lg border p-6 shadow-lg duration-200 sm:max-w-lg",
 2784 |  64 |           className
 2785 |  65 |         )}
 2786 |  66 |         {...props}
 2787 |  67 |       >
 2788 |  68 |         {children}
 2789 |  69 |         {showCloseButton && (
 2790 |  70 |           <DialogPrimitive.Close
 2791 |  71 |             data-slot="dialog-close"
 2792 |  72 |             className="ring-offset-background focus:ring-ring data-[state=open]:bg-accent data-[state=open]:text-muted-foreground absolute top-4 right-4 rounded-xs opacity-70 transition-opacity hover:opacity-100 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:outline-hidden disabled:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:shrink-0 [&_svg:not([class*='size-'])]:size-4"

 3130 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3131 | /components/ui/form.tsx:
 3132 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3133 |   1 | "use client"
 3134 |   2 | 
 3135 |   3 | import * as React from "react"
 3136 |   4 | import * as LabelPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-label"
 3137 |   5 | import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
 3138 |   6 | import {
 3139 |   7 |   Controller,
 3140 |   8 |   FormProvider,
 3141 |   9 |   useFormContext,
 3142 |  10 |   useFormState,
 3143 |  11 |   type ControllerProps,
 3144 |  12 |   type FieldPath,
 3145 |  13 |   type FieldValues,
 3146 |  14 | } from "react-hook-form"
 3147 |  15 | 
 3148 |  16 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 3149 |  17 | import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label"
 3150 |  18 | 
 3151 |  19 | const Form = FormProvider
 3152 |  20 | 
 3153 |  21 | type FormFieldContextValue<
 3154 |  22 |   TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues,
 3155 |  23 |   TName extends FieldPath<TFieldValues> = FieldPath<TFieldValues>,
 3156 |  24 | > = {
 3157 |  25 |   name: TName
 3158 |  26 | }
 3159 |  27 | 
 3160 |  28 | const FormFieldContext = React.createContext<FormFieldContextValue>(
 3161 |  29 |   {} as FormFieldContextValue
 3162 |  30 | )
 3163 |  31 | 
 3164 |  32 | const FormField = <
 3165 |  33 |   TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues,
 3166 |  34 |   TName extends FieldPath<TFieldValues> = FieldPath<TFieldValues>,
 3167 |  35 | >({
 3168 |  36 |   ...props
 3169 |  37 | }: ControllerProps<TFieldValues, TName>) => {
 3170 |  38 |   return (
 3171 |  39 |     <FormFieldContext.Provider value={{ name: props.name }}>
 3172 |  40 |       <Controller {...props} />
 3173 |  41 |     </FormFieldContext.Provider>
 3174 |  42 |   )
 3175 |  43 | }
 3176 |  44 | 
 3177 |  45 | const useFormField = () => {
 3178 |  46 |   const fieldContext = React.useContext(FormFieldContext)
 3179 |  47 |   const itemContext = React.useContext(FormItemContext)
 3180 |  48 |   const { getFieldState } = useFormContext()
 3181 |  49 |   const formState = useFormState({ name: fieldContext.name })
 3182 |  50 |   const fieldState = getFieldState(fieldContext.name, formState)
 3183 |  51 | 
 3184 |  52 |   if (!fieldContext) {
 3185 |  53 |     throw new Error("useFormField should be used within <FormField>")
 3186 |  54 |   }
 3187 |  55 | 
 3188 |  56 |   const { id } = itemContext
 3189 |  57 | 
 3190 |  58 |   return {
 3191 |  59 |     id,
 3192 |  60 |     name: fieldContext.name,
 3193 |  61 |     formItemId: `${id}-form-item`,
 3194 |  62 |     formDescriptionId: `${id}-form-item-description`,
 3195 |  63 |     formMessageId: `${id}-form-item-message`,
 3196 |  64 |     ...fieldState,
 3197 |  65 |   }
 3198 |  66 | }
 3199 |  67 | 
 3200 |  68 | type FormItemContextValue = {
 3201 |  69 |   id: string
 3202 |  70 | }
 3203 |  71 | 
 3204 |  72 | const FormItemContext = React.createContext<FormItemContextValue>(
 3205 |  73 |   {} as FormItemContextValue
 3206 |  74 | )
 3207 |  75 | 
 3208 |  76 | function FormItem({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"div">) {
 3209 |  77 |   const id = React.useId()
 3210 |  78 | 
 3211 |  79 |   return (
 3212 |  80 |     <FormItemContext.Provider value={{ id }}>
 3213 |  81 |       <div
 3214 |  82 |         data-slot="form-item"
 3215 |  83 |         className={cn("grid gap-2", className)}
 3216 |  84 |         {...props}
 3217 |  85 |       />
 3218 |  86 |     </FormItemContext.Provider>
 3219 |  87 |   )
 3220 |  88 | }
 3221 |  89 | 
 3222 |  90 | function FormLabel({
 3223 |  91 |   className,
 3224 |  92 |   ...props
 3225 |  93 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root>) {
 3226 |  94 |   const { error, formItemId } = useFormField()
 3227 |  95 | 
 3228 |  96 |   return (
 3229 |  97 |     <Label
 3230 |  98 |       data-slot="form-label"
 3231 |  99 |       data-error={!!error}
 3232 | 100 |       className={cn("data-[error=true]:text-destructive", className)}
 3233 | 101 |       htmlFor={formItemId}
 3234 | 102 |       {...props}
 3235 | 103 |     />
 3236 | 104 |   )
 3237 | 105 | }
 3238 | 106 | 
 3239 | 107 | function FormControl({ ...props }: React.ComponentProps<typeof Slot>) {
 3240 | 108 |   const { error, formItemId, formDescriptionId, formMessageId } = useFormField()
 3241 | 109 | 
 3242 | 110 |   return (
 3243 | 111 |     <Slot
 3244 | 112 |       data-slot="form-control"
 3245 | 113 |       id={formItemId}
 3246 | 114 |       aria-describedby={
 3247 | 115 |         !error
 3248 | 116 |           ? `${formDescriptionId}`
 3249 | 117 |           : `${formDescriptionId} ${formMessageId}`
 3250 | 118 |       }
 3251 | 119 |       aria-invalid={!!error}
 3252 | 120 |       {...props}
 3253 | 121 |     />
 3254 | 122 |   )
 3255 | 123 | }
 3256 | 124 | 
 3257 | 125 | function FormDescription({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"p">) {
 3258 | 126 |   const { formDescriptionId } = useFormField()
 3259 | 127 | 
 3260 | 128 |   return (
 3261 | 129 |     <p
 3262 | 130 |       data-slot="form-description"
 3263 | 131 |       id={formDescriptionId}
 3264 | 132 |       className={cn("text-muted-foreground text-sm", className)}
 3265 | 133 |       {...props}
 3266 | 134 |     />
 3267 | 135 |   )
 3268 | 136 | }
 3269 | 137 | 
 3270 | 138 | function FormMessage({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"p">) {
 3271 | 139 |   const { error, formMessageId } = useFormField()
 3272 | 140 |   const body = error ? String(error?.message ?? "") : props.children
 3273 | 141 | 
 3274 | 142 |   if (!body) {
 3275 | 143 |     return null
 3276 | 144 |   }
 3277 | 145 | 
 3278 | 146 |   return (
 3279 | 147 |     <p
 3280 | 148 |       data-slot="form-message"
 3281 | 149 |       id={formMessageId}
 3282 | 150 |       className={cn("text-destructive text-sm", className)}
 3283 | 151 |       {...props}
 3284 | 152 |     >
 3285 | 153 |       {body}
 3286 | 154 |     </p>
 3287 | 155 |   )
 3288 | 156 | }
 3289 | 157 | 
 3290 | 158 | export {
 3291 | 159 |   useFormField,
 3292 | 160 |   Form,
 3293 | 161 |   FormItem,
 3294 | 162 |   FormLabel,
 3295 | 163 |   FormControl,
 3296 | 164 |   FormDescription,
 3297 | 165 |   FormMessage,
 3298 | 166 |   FormField,
 3299 | 167 | }
 3300 | 168 | 
 3301 | 
 3302 | 
 3303 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3304 | /components/ui/input.tsx:
 3305 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3306 |  1 | import * as React from "react"
 3307 |  2 | 
 3308 |  3 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

 3316 | 11 |         "file:text-foreground placeholder:text-muted-foreground selection:bg-primary selection:text-primary-foreground dark:bg-input/30 border-input flex h-9 w-full min-w-0 rounded-md border bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-base shadow-xs transition-[color,box-shadow] outline-none file:inline-flex file:h-7 file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 md:text-sm",
 3317 | 12 |         "focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-ring/50 focus-visible:ring-[3px]",
 3318 | 13 |         "aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20 dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 aria-invalid:border-destructive",
 3319 | 14 |         className
 3320 | 15 |       )}
 3321 | 16 |       {...props}
 3322 | 17 |     />

 3360 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3361 | /components/ui/multi-select.tsx:
 3362 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3363 |   1 | "use client";
 3364 |   2 | 
 3365 |   3 | import * as React from "react";
 3366 |   4 | import { X } from "lucide-react";
 3367 |   5 | 
 3368 |   6 | import { Badge } from "@/components/ui/badge";
 3369 |   7 | import {
 3370 |   8 |   Command,
 3371 |   9 |   CommandGroup,
 3372 |  10 |   CommandItem,
 3373 |  11 |   CommandList,
 3374 |  12 | } from "@/components/ui/command";
 3375 |  13 | import { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "cmdk";
 3376 |  14 | 
 3377 |  15 | type Option = Record<"value" | "label", string>;
 3378 |  16 | 
 3379 |  17 | // Add onValueChange to the props
 3380 |  18 | interface MultiSelectProps extends React.InputHTMLAttributes<HTMLInputElement> {
 3381 |  19 |     options: Option[];
 3382 |  20 |     defaultValue?: string[];
 3383 |  21 |     onValueChange?: (value: string[]) => void;
 3384 |  22 | }
 3385 |  23 | 
 3386 |  24 | export function MultiSelect({ options, name, defaultValue = [], onValueChange, ...props }: MultiSelectProps) {
 3387 |  25 |   const inputRef = React.useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null);
 3388 |  26 |   const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false);
 3389 |  27 |   const [selected, setSelected] = React.useState<Option[]>(() => {
 3390 |  28 |     return options.filter(option => defaultValue.includes(option.value));
 3391 |  29 |   });
 3392 |  30 |   const [inputValue, setInputValue] = React.useState("");
 3393 |  31 | 
 3394 |  32 |   // Propagate changes up to the form
 3395 |  33 |   React.useEffect(() => {
 3396 |  34 |     onValueChange?.(selected.map(s => s.value));
 3397 |  35 |   }, [selected, onValueChange]);
 3398 |  36 | 
 3399 |  37 |   const handleUnselect = React.useCallback((option: Option) => {
 3400 |  38 |     setSelected(prev => prev.filter(s => s.value !== option.value));
 3401 |  39 |   }, []);
 3402 |  40 | 
 3403 |  41 |   const handleKeyDown = React.useCallback((e: React.KeyboardEvent<HTMLDivElement>) => {
 3404 |  42 |     const input = inputRef.current
 3405 |  43 |     if (input) {
 3406 |  44 |       if ((e.key === "Delete" || e.key === "Backspace") && input.value === "") {
 3407 |  45 |         setSelected(prev => {
 3408 |  46 |             const newSelected = [...prev];
 3409 |  47 |             newSelected.pop();
 3410 |  48 |             return newSelected;
 3411 |  49 |         })
 3412 |  50 |       }
 3413 |  51 |       if (e.key === "Escape") {
 3414 |  52 |         input.blur();
 3415 |  53 |       }
 3416 |  54 |     }
 3417 |  55 |   }, []);
 3418 |  56 | 
 3419 |  57 |   const selectables = options.filter(option => !selected.some(s => s.value === option.value));
 3420 |  58 |   const { value, ...restProps } = props;
 3421 |  59 | 
 3422 |  60 |   return (
 3423 |  61 |       <Command onKeyDown={handleKeyDown} className="overflow-visible bg-transparent">
 3424 |  62 |         <div
 3425 |  63 |           className="group border border-input px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background rounded-md focus-within:ring-2 focus-within:ring-ring focus-within:ring-offset-2"
 3426 |  64 |         >
 3427 |  65 |           <div className="flex gap-1 flex-wrap">
 3428 |  66 |             {selected.map((option) => {
 3429 |  67 |               return (
 3430 |  68 |                 <Badge key={option.value} variant="secondary">
 3431 |  69 |                   {option.label}
 3432 |  70 |                   <button
 3433 |  71 |                     type="button"
 3434 |  72 |                     className="ml-1 ring-offset-background rounded-full outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2"
 3435 |  73 |                     onClick={() => handleUnselect(option)}
 3436 |  74 |                   >
 3437 |  75 |                     <X className="h-3 w-3 text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground" />
 3438 |  76 |                   </button>
 3439 |  77 |                 </Badge>
 3440 |  78 |               )
 3441 |  79 |             })}
 3442 |  80 |             <CommandPrimitive.Input
 3443 |  81 |               ref={inputRef}
 3444 |  82 |               value={inputValue}
 3445 |  83 |               onValueChange={setInputValue}
 3446 |  84 |               onBlur={() => setOpen(false)}
 3447 |  85 |               onFocus={() => setOpen(true)}
 3448 |  86 |               className="ml-2 bg-transparent outline-none placeholder:text-muted-foreground flex-1"
 3449 |  87 |               {...restProps}
 3450 |  88 |             />
 3451 |  89 |           </div>
 3452 |  90 |         </div>
 3453 |  91 |         <div className="relative mt-2">
 3454 |  92 |           {open && selectables.length > 0 ?
 3455 |  93 |             <div className="absolute w-full z-10 top-0 rounded-md border bg-popover text-popover-foreground shadow-md outline-none animate-in">
 3456 |  94 |               <CommandList>
 3457 |  95 |                 <CommandGroup className="h-full overflow-auto">
 3458 |  96 |                   {selectables.map((option) => {
 3459 |  97 |                     return (
 3460 |  98 |                       <CommandItem
 3461 |  99 |                         key={option.value}
 3462 | 100 |                         onMouseDown={(e) => e.preventDefault()}
 3463 | 101 |                         onSelect={() => {
 3464 | 102 |                           setInputValue("")
 3465 | 103 |                           setSelected(prev => [...prev, option])
 3466 | 104 |                         }}
 3467 | 105 |                         className={"cursor-pointer"}
 3468 | 106 |                       >
 3469 | 107 |                         {option.label}
 3470 | 108 |                       </CommandItem>
 3471 | 109 |                     );
 3472 | 110 |                   })}
 3473 | 111 |                 </CommandGroup>
 3474 | 112 |               </CommandList>
 3475 | 113 |             </div>
 3476 | 114 |             : null}
 3477 | 115 |         </div>
 3478 | 116 |       </Command >
 3479 | 117 |   )
 3480 | 118 | }
 3481 | 119 |

 3660 | 140 | 
 3661 | 
 3662 | 
 3663 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3664 | /components/ui/sidebar.tsx:
 3665 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3666 |   1 | "use client"
 3667 |   2 | 
 3668 |   3 | import * as React from "react"
 3669 |   4 | import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
 3670 |   5 | import { cva, VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
 3671 |   6 | import { PanelLeftIcon } from "lucide-react"
 3672 |   7 | 
 3673 |   8 | import { useIsMobile } from "@/hooks/use-mobile"
 3674 |   9 | import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
 3675 |  10 | import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"
 3676 |  11 | import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"
 3677 |  12 | import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator"
 3678 |  13 | import {
 3679 |  14 |   Sheet,
 3680 |  15 |   SheetContent,
 3681 |  16 |   SheetDescription,
 3682 |  17 |   SheetHeader,
 3683 |  18 |   SheetTitle,
 3684 |  19 | } from "@/components/ui/sheet"
 3685 |  20 | 
 3686 |  21 | import {
 3687 |  22 |   Tooltip,
 3688 |  23 |   TooltipContent,
 3689 |  24 |   TooltipProvider,
 3690 |  25 |   TooltipTrigger,
 3691 |  26 | } from "@/components/ui/tooltip"
 3692 |  27 | import { Skeleton } from "./skeleton"
 3693 |  28 | 
 3694 |  29 | 
 3695 |  30 | const SIDEBAR_COOKIE_NAME = "sidebar_state"
 3696 |  31 | const SIDEBAR_COOKIE_MAX_AGE = 60 * 60 * 24 * 7
 3697 |  32 | const SIDEBAR_WIDTH = "16rem"
 3698 |  33 | const SIDEBAR_WIDTH_MOBILE = "18rem"
 3699 |  34 | const SIDEBAR_WIDTH_ICON = "3rem"
 3700 |  35 | const SIDEBAR_KEYBOARD_SHORTCUT = "b"
 3701 |  36 | 
 3702 |  37 | type SidebarContextProps = {
 3703 |  38 |   state: "expanded" | "collapsed"
 3704 |  39 |   open: boolean
 3705 |  40 |   setOpen: (open: boolean) => void
 3706 |  41 |   openMobile: boolean
 3707 |  42 |   setOpenMobile: (open: boolean) => void
 3708 |  43 |   isMobile: boolean
 3709 |  44 |   toggleSidebar: () => void
 3710 |  45 | }
 3711 |  46 | 
 3712 |  47 | const SidebarContext = React.createContext<SidebarContextProps | null>(null)
 3713 |  48 | 
 3714 |  49 | function useSidebar(b: boolean) {
 3715 |  50 |   const context = React.useContext(SidebarContext)
 3716 |  51 |   if (!context) {
 3717 |  52 |     throw new Error("useSidebar must be used within a SidebarProvider.")
 3718 |  53 |   }
 3719 |  54 | 
 3720 |  55 |   return context
 3721 |  56 | }
 3722 |  57 | 
 3723 |  58 | function SidebarProvider({
 3724 |  59 |   defaultOpen = true,
 3725 |  60 |   open: openProp,
 3726 |  61 |   onOpenChange: setOpenProp,
 3727 |  62 |   className,
 3728 |  63 |   style,
 3729 |  64 |   children,
 3730 |  65 |   ...props
 3731 |  66 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & {
 3732 |  67 |   defaultOpen?: boolean
 3733 |  68 |   open?: boolean
 3734 |  69 |   onOpenChange?: (open: boolean) => void
 3735 |  70 | }) {
 3736 |  71 |   const isMobile = useIsMobile()
 3737 |  72 |   const [openMobile, setOpenMobile] = React.useState(false)
 3738 |  73 | 
 3739 |  74 |   // This is the internal state of the sidebar.
 3740 |  75 |   // We use openProp and setOpenProp for control from outside the component.
 3741 |  76 |   const [_open, _setOpen] = React.useState(defaultOpen)
 3742 |  77 |   const open = openProp ?? _open
 3743 |  78 |   const setOpen = React.useCallback(
 3744 |  79 |     (value: boolean | ((value: boolean) => boolean)) => {
 3745 |  80 |       const openState = typeof value === "function" ? value(open) : value
 3746 |  81 |       if (setOpenProp) {
 3747 |  82 |         setOpenProp(openState)
 3748 |  83 |       } else {
 3749 |  84 |         _setOpen(openState)
 3750 |  85 |       }
 3751 |  86 | 
 3752 |  87 |       // This sets the cookie to keep the sidebar state.
 3753 |  88 |       document.cookie = `${SIDEBAR_COOKIE_NAME}=${openState}; path=/; max-age=${SIDEBAR_COOKIE_MAX_AGE}`
 3754 |  89 |     },
 3755 |  90 |     [setOpenProp, open]
 3756 |  91 |   )
 3757 |  92 | 
 3758 |  93 |   // Helper to toggle the sidebar.
 3759 |  94 |   const toggleSidebar = React.useCallback(() => {
 3760 |  95 |     return isMobile ? setOpenMobile((open) => !open) : setOpen((open) => !open)
 3761 |  96 |   }, [isMobile, setOpen, setOpenMobile])
 3762 |  97 | 
 3763 |  98 |   // Adds a keyboard shortcut to toggle the sidebar.
 3764 |  99 |   React.useEffect(() => {
 3765 | 100 |     const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => {
 3766 | 101 |       if (
 3767 | 102 |         event.key === SIDEBAR_KEYBOARD_SHORTCUT &&
 3768 | 103 |         (event.metaKey || event.ctrlKey)
 3769 | 104 |       ) {
 3770 | 105 |         event.preventDefault()
 3771 | 106 |         toggleSidebar()
 3772 | 107 |       }
 3773 | 108 |     }
 3774 | 109 | 
 3775 | 110 |     window.addEventListener("keydown", handleKeyDown)
 3776 | 111 |     return () => window.removeEventListener("keydown", handleKeyDown)
 3777 | 112 |   }, [toggleSidebar])
 3778 | 113 | 
 3779 | 114 |   // We add a state so that we can do data-state="expanded" or "collapsed".
 3780 | 115 |   // This makes it easier to style the sidebar with Tailwind classes.
 3781 | 116 |   const state = open ? "expanded" : "collapsed"
 3782 | 117 | 
 3783 | 118 |   const contextValue = React.useMemo<SidebarContextProps>(
 3784 | 119 |     () => ({
 3785 | 120 |       state,
 3786 | 121 |       open,
 3787 | 122 |       setOpen,
 3788 | 123 |       isMobile,
 3789 | 124 |       openMobile,
 3790 | 125 |       setOpenMobile,
 3791 | 126 |       toggleSidebar,
 3792 | 127 |     }),
 3793 | 128 |     [state, open, setOpen, isMobile, openMobile, setOpenMobile, toggleSidebar]
 3794 | 129 |   )
 3795 | 130 | 
 3796 | 131 |   return (
 3797 | 132 |     <SidebarContext.Provider value={contextValue}>
 3798 | 133 |       <TooltipProvider delayDuration={0}>
 3799 | 134 |         <div
 3800 | 135 |           data-slot="sidebar-wrapper"
 3801 | 136 |           style={
 3802 | 137 |             {
 3803 | 138 |               "--sidebar-width": SIDEBAR_WIDTH,
 3804 | 139 |               "--sidebar-width-icon": SIDEBAR_WIDTH_ICON,
 3805 | 140 |               ...style,
 3806 | 141 |             } as React.CSSProperties
 3807 | 142 |           }
 3808 | 143 |           className={cn(
 3809 | 144 |             "group/sidebar-wrapper has-data-[variant=inset]:bg-sidebar flex min-h-svh w-full",
 3810 | 145 |             className
 3811 | 146 |           )}
 3812 | 147 |           {...props}
 3813 | 148 |         >
 3814 | 149 |           {children}
 3815 | 150 |         </div>
 3816 | 151 |       </TooltipProvider>
 3817 | 152 |     </SidebarContext.Provider>
 3818 | 153 |   )
 3819 | 154 | }
 3820 | 155 | 
 3821 | 156 | function Sidebar({
 3822 | 157 |   side = "left",
 3823 | 158 |   variant = "sidebar",
 3824 | 159 |   collapsible = "offcanvas",
 3825 | 160 |   className,
 3826 | 161 |   children,
 3827 | 162 |   ...props
 3828 | 163 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & {
 3829 | 164 |   side?: "left" | "right"
 3830 | 165 |   variant?: "sidebar" | "floating" | "inset"
 3831 | 166 |   collapsible?: "offcanvas" | "icon" | "none"
 3832 | 167 | }) {
 3833 | 168 |   const { isMobile, state, openMobile, setOpenMobile } = useSidebar(false)
 3834 | 169 | 
 3835 | 170 |     if (collapsible === "none") {
 3836 | 171 |     return (
 3837 | 172 |       <div
 3838 | 173 |         data-slot="sidebar"
 3839 | 174 |         className={cn(
 3840 | 175 |           "bg-sidebar text-sidebar-foreground flex h-full w-(--sidebar-width) flex-col",
 3841 | 176 |           className
 3842 | 177 |         )}
 3843 | 178 |         {...props}
 3844 | 179 |       >
 3845 | 180 |         {children}
 3846 | 181 |       </div>
 3847 | 182 |     )
 3848 | 183 |   }
 3849 | 184 | 
 3850 | 185 |   if (isMobile) {
 3851 | 186 |     return (
 3852 | 187 |       <Sheet open={openMobile} onOpenChange={setOpenMobile} {...props}>
 3853 | 188 |         <SheetContent
 3854 | 189 |           data-sidebar="sidebar"
 3855 | 190 |           data-slot="sidebar"
 3856 | 191 |           data-mobile="true"
 3857 | 192 |           className="bg-sidebar text-sidebar-foreground w-(--sidebar-width) p-0 [&>button]:hidden"
 3858 | 193 |           style={
 3859 | 194 |             {
 3860 | 195 |               "--sidebar-width": SIDEBAR_WIDTH_MOBILE,
 3861 | 196 |             } as React.CSSProperties
 3862 | 197 |           }
 3863 | 198 |           side={side}
 3864 | 199 |         >
 3865 | 200 |           <SheetHeader className="sr-only">
 3866 | 201 |             <SheetTitle>Sidebar</SheetTitle>
 3867 | 202 |             <SheetDescription>Displays the mobile sidebar.</SheetDescription>
 3868 | 203 |           </SheetHeader>
 3869 | 204 |           <div className="flex h-full w-full flex-col">{children}</div>
 3870 | 205 |         </SheetContent>
 3871 | 206 |       </Sheet>
 3872 | 207 |     )
 3873 | 208 |   }
 3874 | 209 | 
 3875 | 210 |   return (
 3876 | 211 |     <div
 3877 | 212 |       className="group peer text-sidebar-foreground hidden md:block"
 3878 | 213 |       data-state={state}
 3879 | 214 |       data-collapsible={state === "collapsed" ? collapsible : ""}
 3880 | 215 |       data-variant={variant}
 3881 | 216 |       data-side={side}
 3882 | 217 |       data-slot="sidebar"
 3883 | 218 |     >
 3884 | 219 |       {/* This is what handles the sidebar gap on desktop */}
 3885 | 220 |       <div
 3886 | 221 |         data-slot="sidebar-gap"
 3887 | 222 |         className={cn(
 3888 | 223 |           "relative w-(--sidebar-width) bg-transparent transition-[width] duration-200 ease-linear",
 3889 | 224 |           "group-data-[collapsible=offcanvas]:w-0",
 3890 | 225 |           "group-data-[side=right]:rotate-180",
 3891 | 226 |           variant === "floating" || variant === "inset"
 3892 | 227 |             ? "group-data-[collapsible=icon]:w-[calc(var(--sidebar-width-icon)+(--spacing(4)))]"
 3893 | 228 |             : "group-data-[collapsible=icon]:w-(--sidebar-width-icon)"
 3894 | 229 |         )}
 3895 | 230 |       />
 3896 | 231 |       <div
 3897 | 232 |         data-slot="sidebar-container"
 3898 | 233 |         className={cn(
 3899 | 234 |           "fixed inset-y-0 z-10 hidden h-svh w-(--sidebar-width) transition-[left,right,width] duration-200 ease-linear md:flex",
 3900 | 235 |           side === "left"
 3901 | 236 |             ? "left-0 group-data-[collapsible=offcanvas]:left-[calc(var(--sidebar-width)*-1)]"
 3902 | 237 |             : "right-0 group-data-[collapsible=offcanvas]:right-[calc(var(--sidebar-width)*-1)]",
 3903 | 238 |           // Adjust the padding for floating and inset variants.
 3904 | 239 |           variant === "floating" || variant === "inset"
 3905 | 240 |             ? "p-2 group-data-[collapsible=icon]:w-[calc(var(--sidebar-width-icon)+(--spacing(4))+2px)]"
 3906 | 241 |             : "group-data-[collapsible=icon]:w-(--sidebar-width-icon) group-data-[side=left]:border-r group-data-[side=right]:border-l",
 3907 | 242 |           className
 3908 | 243 |         )}
 3909 | 244 |         {...props}
 3910 | 245 |       >
 3911 | 246 |         <div
 3912 | 247 |           data-sidebar="sidebar"
 3913 | 248 |           data-slot="sidebar-inner"
 3914 | 249 |           className="bg-sidebar group-data-[variant=floating]:border-sidebar-border flex h-full w-full flex-col group-data-[variant=floating]:rounded-lg group-data-[variant=floating]:border group-data-[variant=floating]:shadow-sm"
 3915 | 250 |         >
 3916 | 251 |           {children}
 3917 | 252 |         </div>
 3918 | 253 |       </div>
 3919 | 254 |     </div>
 3920 | 255 |   )
 3921 | 256 | }
 3922 | 257 | 
 3923 | 258 | function SidebarTrigger({
 3924 | 259 |   className,
 3925 | 260 |   onClick,
 3926 | 261 |   ...props
 3927 | 262 | }: React.ComponentProps<typeof Button>) {
 3928 | 263 |   const { toggleSidebar } = useSidebar(false)
 3929 | 264 | 
 3930 | 265 |     return (
 3931 | 266 |     <Button
 3932 | 267 |       data-sidebar="trigger"
 3933 | 268 |       data-slot="sidebar-trigger"
 3934 | 269 |       variant="ghost"
 3935 | 270 |       size="icon"
 3936 | 271 |       className={cn("size-7", className)}
 3937 | 272 |       onClick={(event) => {
 3938 | 273 |         onClick?.(event)
 3939 | 274 |         toggleSidebar()
 3940 | 275 |       }}
 3941 | 276 |       {...props}
 3942 | 277 |     >
 3943 | 278 |       <PanelLeftIcon />
 3944 | 279 |       <span className="sr-only">Toggle Sidebar</span>
 3945 | 280 |     </Button>
 3946 | 281 |   )
 3947 | 282 | }

 3961 | 296 |         "hover:after:bg-sidebar-border absolute inset-y-0 z-20 hidden w-4 -translate-x-1/2 transition-all ease-linear group-data-[side=left]:-right-4 group-data-[side=right]:left-0 after:absolute after:inset-y-0 after:left-1/2 after:w-[2px] sm:flex",
 3962 | 297 |         "in-data-[side=left]:cursor-w-resize in-data-[side=right]:cursor-e-resize",
 3963 | 298 |         "[[data-side=left][data-state=collapsed]_&]:cursor-e-resize [[data-side=right][data-state=collapsed]_&]:cursor-w-resize",

 4165 | 500 | function SidebarMenuButton({
 4166 | 501 |   asChild = false,
 4167 | 502 |   isActive = false,
 4168 | 503 |   variant = "default",
 4169 | 504 |   size = "default",
 4170 | 505 |   tooltip,
 4171 | 506 |   className,
 4172 | 507 |   ...props
 4173 | 508 | }: React.ComponentProps<"button"> & {
 4174 | 509 |   asChild?: boolean
 4175 | 510 |   isActive?: boolean
 4176 | 511 |   tooltip?: string | React.ComponentProps<typeof TooltipContent>
 4177 | 512 | } & VariantProps<typeof sidebarMenuButtonVariants>) {
 4178 | 513 |   const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
 4179 | 514 |   const { isMobile, state } = useSidebar(false)
 4180 | 515 | 
 4181 | 516 |     const button = (
 4182 | 517 |     <Comp
 4183 | 518 |       data-slot="sidebar-menu-button"
 4184 | 519 |       data-sidebar="menu-button"
 4185 | 520 |       data-size={size}
 4186 | 521 |       data-active={isActive}
 4187 | 522 |       className={cn(sidebarMenuButtonVariants({ variant, size }), className)}
 4188 | 523 |       {...props}
 4189 | 524 |     />
 4190 | 525 |   )
 4191 | 526 | 
 4192 | 527 |   if (!tooltip) {
 4193 | 528 |     return button
 4194 | 529 |   }
 4195 | 530 | 
 4196 | 531 |   if (typeof tooltip === "string") {
 4197 | 532 |     tooltip = {
 4198 | 533 |       children: tooltip,
 4199 | 534 |     }
 4200 | 535 |   }
 4201 | 536 | 
 4202 | 537 |   return (
 4203 | 538 |     <Tooltip>
 4204 | 539 |       <TooltipTrigger asChild>{button}</TooltipTrigger>
 4205 | 540 |       <TooltipContent
 4206 | 541 |         side="right"
 4207 | 542 |         align="center"
 4208 | 543 |         hidden={state !== "collapsed" || isMobile}
 4209 | 544 |         {...tooltip}
 4210 | 545 |       />
 4211 | 546 |     </Tooltip>
 4212 | 547 |   )
 4213 | 548 | }

 5293 |   120 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5294 |   121 | /README.md:
 5295 |   122 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
