 5297 |   124 | 2 | docker exec -it eduspace-postgres psql -U eduspace_user -d eduspace_db
 5298 |   125 | 3 | 
 5299 |   126 | 
 5300 |   127 | 
 5301 |   128 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5302 |   129 | /app/api/auth/login/route.ts:
 5303 |   130 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5304 |   131 |  1 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 5305 |   132 |  2 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 5306 |   133 |  3 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 5307 |   134 |  4 | import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';
 5308 |   135 |  5 | import { LoginWithTenantDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 5309 |   136 |  6 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 5310 |   137 |  7 | import * as tenantSchema from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 5311 |   138 |  8 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 5312 |   139 |  9 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 5313 |   140 | 10 | 
 5314 |   141 | 11 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
 5315 |   142 | 12 | 
 5316 |   143 | 13 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
 5317 |   144 | 14 |   try {
 5318 |   145 | 15 |     const body = await request.json();
 5319 |   146 | 16 |     const { tenantId, email, password } = LoginWithTenantDto.parse(body);
 5320 |   147 | 17 | 
 5321 |   148 | 18 |     log.info({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login attempt.');
 5322 |   149 | 19 | 
 5323 |   150 | 20 |     const tenantDb = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
 5324 |   151 | 21 |     const userResult = await tenantDb.query.users.findFirst({
 5325 |   152 | 22 |       where: eq(tenantSchema.users.email, email),
 5326 |   153 | 23 |     });
 5327 |   154 | 24 | 
 5328 |   155 | 25 |     if (!userResult) {
 5329 |   156 | 26 |       log.warn({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login failed: User not found.');
 5330 |   157 | 27 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
 5331 |   158 | 28 |     }
 5332 |   159 | 29 | 
 5333 |   160 | 30 |     const isPasswordValid = await bcrypt.compare(password, userResult.password);
 5334 |   161 | 31 |     if (!isPasswordValid) {
 5335 |   162 | 32 |       log.warn({ tenantId, email }, '[API] Login failed: Invalid password.');
 5336 |   163 | 33 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
 5337 |   164 | 34 |     }
 5338 |   165 | 35 | 
 5339 |   166 | 36 |     const token = jwt.sign({ tenantId, userId: userResult.id }, env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn: '8h' });
 5340 |   167 | 37 |     log.info({ tenantId, userId: userResult.id }, '[API] Login successful.');
 5341 |   168 | 38 | 
 5342 |   169 | 39 |     const response = NextResponse.json({ message: 'Login successful' });
 5343 |   170 | 40 |     response.cookies.set('authToken', token, {
 5344 |   171 | 41 |       httpOnly: true,
 5345 |   172 | 42 |       secure: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production',
 5346 |   173 | 43 |       sameSite: 'strict',
 5347 |   174 | 44 |       path: '/',
 5348 |   175 | 45 |       maxAge: 8 * 60 * 60, // 8 hours
 5349 |   176 | 46 |     });
 5350 |   177 | 47 | 
 5351 |   178 | 48 |     return response;
 5352 |   179 | 49 | 
 5353 |   180 | 50 |   } catch (err) {
 5354 |   181 | 51 |     log.error({ error: err }, '[API] Login process failed.');
 5355 |   182 | 52 |     if (err instanceof Error && err.message === 'Tenant not found') {
 5356 |   183 | 53 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid tenant specified' }, { status: 404 });
 5357 |   184 | 54 |     }
 5358 |   185 | 55 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'An internal error occurred' }, { status: 500 });
 5359 |   186 | 56 |   }
 5360 |   187 | 57 | }
 5361 |   188 | 
 5362 |   189 | 
 5363 |   190 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5364 |   191 | /app/api/tenants/route.ts:
 5365 |   192 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5366 |   193 |  1 | // In /app/api/tenants/route.ts
 5367 |   194 |  2 | 
 5368 |   195 |  3 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 5369 |   196 |  4 | import { z } from 'zod';
 5370 |   197 |  5 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
 5371 |   198 |  6 | import { TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 5372 |   199 |  7 | import { createNeonProject } from '@/lib/neon/api';
 5373 |   200 |  8 | import { mainDb, getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 5374 |   201 |  9 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
 5375 |   202 | 10 | import * as tenantSchema from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 5376 |   203 | 11 | import { encrypt } from '@/lib/crypto';
 5377 |   204 | 12 | import { runTenantMigrations } from '@/lib/db/migrate';
 5378 |   205 | 13 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 5379 |   206 | 14 | 
 5380 |   207 | 15 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
 5381 |   208 | 16 | 
 5382 |   209 | 17 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
 5383 |   210 | 18 |   let neonProjectId: string | null = null;
 5384 |   211 | 19 |   try {
 5385 |   212 | 20 | const body = await request.json();
 5386 |   213 | 21 |     const data = TenantSignupDto.parse(body);
 5387 |   214 | 22 |     const { tenantId, orgName, adminName, adminEmail, adminPassword } = data;
 5388 |   215 | 23 | 
 5389 |   216 | 24 |     log.info({ tenantId }, '[API] Tenant creation request received.');
 5390 |   217 | 25 | 
 5391 |   218 | 26 |     // 1. Create the new database project on Neon
 5392 |   219 | 27 |     const neonProject = await createNeonProject(tenantId);
 5393 |   220 | 28 |     if (!neonProject || !neonProject.projectId || !neonProject.connectionString) {
 5394 |   221 | 29 |       throw new Error("Invalid response from Neon API during project creation.");
 5395 |   222 | 30 |     }
 5396 |   223 | 31 |     const { projectId: _neonProjectId, connectionString } = neonProject;
 5397 |   224 | 32 |     neonProjectId = _neonProjectId; // Assign to the outer scope variable for the catch block
 5398 |   225 | 33 | 
 5399 |   226 | 34 |     // 2. Store the new tenant's metadata in your main database
 5400 |   227 | 35 |     const encryptedConnectionString = encrypt(connectionString);
 5401 |   228 | 36 |     await mainDb.insert(tenants).values({
 5402 |   229 | 37 |       tenantId,
 5403 |   230 | 38 |       name: orgName,
 5404 |   231 | 39 |       neonProjectId: _neonProjectId, // Use the non-nullable constant here
 5405 |   232 | 40 |       connectionString: encryptedConnectionString,
 5406 |   233 | 41 |     });
 5407 |   234 | 42 |     log.info({ tenantId, neonProjectId }, '[API] Tenant metadata stored.');
 5408 |   235 | 43 | 
 5409 |   236 | 44 |     // 3. Run the migrations on the newly created tenant database
 5410 |   237 | 45 |     await runTenantMigrations(connectionString);
 5411 |   238 | 46 | 
 5412 |   239 | 47 |     // 4. Create the tenant's first admin user in their new database
 5413 |   240 | 48 |     const tenantDb = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
 5414 |   241 | 49 |     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(adminPassword, 12);
 5415 |   242 | 50 |     await tenantDb.insert(tenantSchema.users).values({
 5416 |   243 | 51 |       name: adminName,
 5417 |   244 | 52 |       email: adminEmail,
 5418 |   245 | 53 |       password: hashedPassword,
 5419 |   246 | 54 |     });
 5420 |   247 | 55 |     log.info({ tenantId, adminEmail }, '[API] Admin user created in tenant DB.');
 5421 |   248 | 56 | 
 5422 |   249 | 57 |     // 5. Done!
 5423 |   250 | 58 |     return NextResponse.json({ message: 'Tenant created successfully', tenantId });
 5424 |   251 | 59 | 
 5425 |   252 | 60 |   } catch (err) {
 5426 |   253 | 61 |     // --- THIS IS THE NEW, IMPROVED CATCH BLOCK ---
 5427 |   254 | 62 |     let errorDetails = {};
 5428 |   255 | 63 |     if (err instanceof Error) {
 5429 |   256 | 64 |         errorDetails = {
 5430 |   257 | 65 |             name: err.name,
 5431 |   258 | 66 |             message: err.message,
 5432 |   259 | 67 |             stack: err.stack,
 5433 |   260 | 68 |         };
 5434 |   261 | 69 |     } else {
 5435 |   262 | 70 |         errorDetails = { error: 'An unknown error occurred' };
 5436 |   263 | 71 |     }
 5437 |   264 | 72 |     
 5438 |   265 | 73 |     log.error({ ...errorDetails, neonProjectId }, '[API] Tenant creation failed.');
 5439 |   266 | 74 |     // --- END OF NEW CATCH BLOCK ---
 5440 |   267 | 75 | 
 5441 |   268 | 76 |     if (err instanceof z.ZodError) {
 5442 |   269 | 77 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid input', details: err }, { status: 400 });
 5443 |   270 | 78 |     }
 5444 |   271 | 79 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
 5445 |   272 | 80 |   }
 5446 |   273 | 81 | }
 5447 |   274 | 
 5448 |   275 | 
 5449 |   276 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5450 |   277 | /app/dashboard/page.tsx:
 5451 |   278 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5452 |   279 |  1 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
 5453 |   280 |  2 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
 5454 |   281 |  3 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
 5455 |   282 |  4 | import * as tenantSchema from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
 5456 |   283 |  5 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 5457 |   284 |  6 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 5458 |   285 |  7 | import { redirect } from 'next/navigation';
 5459 |   286 |  8 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 5460 |   287 |  9 | 
 5461 |   288 | 10 | export const dynamic = 'force-dynamic';
 5462 |   289 | 11 | 
 5463 |   290 | 12 | interface UserSession {
 5464 |   291 | 13 |   tenantId: string;
 5465 |   292 | 14 |   userId: number;
 5466 |   293 | 15 | }
 5467 |   294 | 16 | 
 5468 |   295 | 17 | export default async function DashboardPage() {
 5469 |   296 | 18 |   const cookieStore = await cookies();
 5470 |   297 | 19 |   const token = cookieStore.get('authToken')?.value;
 5471 |   298 | 20 | 
 5472 |   299 | 21 |   if (!token) {
 5473 |   300 | 22 |     log.warn(' No auth token found, redirecting to login.');
 5474 |   301 | 23 |     redirect('/login');
 5475 |   302 | 24 |   }
 5476 |   303 | 25 | 
 5477 |   304 | 26 |   try {
 5478 |   305 | 27 |     const decoded = verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as UserSession;
 5479 |   306 | 28 |     log.info({ session: decoded }, ' User session decoded.');
 5480 |   307 | 29 | 
 5481 |   308 | 30 |     const tenantDb = await getTenantDb(decoded.tenantId);
 5482 |   309 | 31 |     const userResult = await tenantDb.query.users.findFirst({
 5483 |   310 | 32 |       where: eq(tenantSchema.users.id, decoded.userId),
 5484 |   311 | 33 |     });
 5485 |   312 | 34 | 
 5486 |   313 | 35 |     if (!userResult) {
 5487 |   314 | 36 |       log.error({ session: decoded }, ' User not found in tenant DB.');
 5488 |   315 | 37 |       cookieStore.delete('authToken');
 5489 |   316 | 38 |       redirect('/login');
 5490 |   317 | 39 |     }
 5491 |   318 | 40 | 
 5492 |   319 | 41 |     return (
 5493 |   320 | 42 |       <div className="min-h-screen p-8 bg-gray-100 text-gray-900">
 5494 |   321 | 43 |         <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold">Welcome to Tenant: <span className="text-blue-600">{decoded.tenantId}</span> Dashboard</h1>
 5495 |   322 | 44 |         <p className="text-xl mt-4">Logged in as: {userResult.name}</p>
 5496 |   323 | 45 |         <p className="text-xl mt-4">User email in as: {userResult.email}</p>
 5497 |   324 | 46 |         
 5498 |   325 | 47 |       </div>
 5499 |   326 | 48 |     );
 5500 |   327 | 49 |   } catch (err) {
 5501 |   328 | 50 |     log.error({ error: err }, ' Authorization failed.');
 5502 |   329 | 51 |     cookieStore.delete('authToken');
 5503 |   330 | 52 |     redirect('/login');
 5504 |   331 | 53 |   }
 5505 |   332 | 54 | }
 5506 |   333 |

 5658 |   485 | 14 |   children: React.ReactNode;

 5670 |   497 | 
 5671 |   498 | 
 5672 |   499 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5673 |   500 | /app/login/page.tsx:
 5674 |   501 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5675 |   502 |  1 | // app/login/page.tsx
 5676 |   503 |  2 | 'use client';
 5677 |   504 |  3 | 
 5678 |   505 |  4 | import { useState } from 'react';
 5679 |   506 |  5 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 5680 |   507 |  6 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 5681 |   508 |  7 | import { LoginWithTenantInput, LoginWithTenantDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 5682 |   509 |  8 | 
 5683 |   510 |  9 | export default function LoginPage() {
 5684 |   511 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
 5685 |   512 | 11 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<LoginWithTenantInput>({
 5686 |   513 | 12 |     resolver: zodResolver(LoginWithTenantDto),
 5687 |   514 | 13 |   });
 5688 |   515 | 14 | 
 5689 |   516 | 15 |   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginWithTenantInput) => {
 5690 |   517 | 16 |     setMessage('');
 5691 |   518 | 17 |     try {
 5692 |   519 | 18 |       const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
 5693 |   520 | 19 |         method: 'POST',
 5694 |   521 | 20 |         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
 5695 |   522 | 21 |         body: JSON.stringify(data),
 5696 |   523 | 22 |       });
 5697 |   524 | 23 | 
 5698 |   525 | 24 |       if (res.ok) {
 5699 |   526 | 25 |         setMessage('Login successful! Redirecting...');
 5700 |   527 | 26 |         window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
 5701 |   528 | 27 |       } else {
 5702 |   529 | 28 |         const result = await res.json();
 5703 |   530 | 29 |         setMessage(result.error || 'Login failed');
 5704 |   531 | 30 |       }
 5705 |   532 | 31 |     } catch (error) {
 5706 |   533 | 32 |       setMessage('An unexpected error occurred.');
 5707 |   534 | 33 |       console.error('Login request failed:', error);
 5708 |   535 | 34 |     }
 5709 |   536 | 35 |   };
 5710 |   537 | 36 | 
 5711 |   538 | 37 |   return (
 5712 |   539 | 38 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-900 text-white">
 5713 |   540 | 39 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-gray-800 p-8 rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-md">
 5714 |   541 | 40 |         <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-center">Login to Your School</h1>
 5715 |   542 | 41 |         <div className="mb-4">
 5716 |   543 | 42 |           <input {...register('tenantId')} placeholder="School ID (e.g., frisco-high)" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
 5717 |   544 | 43 |           {errors.tenantId && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.tenantId.message}</p>}
 5718 |   545 | 44 |         </div>
 5719 |   546 | 45 |         <div className="mb-4">
 5720 |   547 | 46 |           <input {...register('email')} placeholder="Email" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
 5721 |   548 | 47 |           {errors.email && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.email.message}</p>}
 5722 |   549 | 48 |         </div>
 5723 |   550 | 49 |         <div className="mb-6">
 5724 |   551 | 50 |           <input type="password" {...register('password')} placeholder="Password" className="p-3 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 w-full rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" />
 5725 |   552 | 51 |           {errors.password && <p className="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1">{errors.password.message}</p>}
 5726 |   553 | 52 |         </div>
 5727 |   554 | 53 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-600 text-white p-3 w-full rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors">Login</button>
 5728 |   555 | 54 |         {message && <p className="mt-4 text-center text-red-400">{message}</p>}
 5729 |   556 | 55 |       </form>
 5730 |   557 | 56 |     </div>
 5731 |   558 | 57 |   );
 5732 |   559 | 58 | }
 5733 |   560 | 
 5734 |   561 | 
 5735 |   562 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5736 |   563 | /app/page.tsx:
 5737 |   564 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5738 |   565 |  1 | // app/page.tsx
 5739 |   566 |  2 | import Link from 'next/link';
 5740 |   567 |  3 | 
 5741 |   568 |  4 | export default function HomePage() {
 5742 |   569 |  5 |   return (
 5743 |   570 |  6 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center bg-gray-800 text-center">
 5744 |   571 |  7 |       <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Welcome to EduX SaaS</h1>
 5745 |   572 |  8 |       <p className="text-xl mb-8">A multi-tenant platform for education management</p>
 5746 |   573 |  9 |       <div className="space-x-4">
 5747 |   574 | 10 |         <Link href="/login">
 5748 |   575 | 11 |           <button className="bg-blue-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-600">Login</button>
 5749 |   576 | 12 |         </Link>
 5750 |   577 | 13 |         <Link href="/signup">
 5751 |   578 | 14 |           <button className="bg-green-500 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-green-600">Signup</button>
 5752 |   579 | 15 |         </Link>
 5753 |   580 | 16 |       </div>
 5754 |   581 | 17 |     </div>
 5755 |   582 | 18 |   );
 5756 |   583 | 19 | }
 5757 |   584 | 
 5758 |   585 | 
 5759 |   586 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5760 |   587 | /app/signup/page.tsx:
 5761 |   588 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 5762 |   589 |  1 | // app/signup/page.tsx
 5763 |   590 |  2 | 'use client';
 5764 |   591 |  3 | import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
 5765 |   592 |  4 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
 5766 |   593 |  5 | import { TenantSignupInput, TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
 5767 |   594 |  6 | import { useState } from 'react';
 5768 |   595 |  7 | import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
 5769 |   596 |  8 | 
 5770 |   597 |  9 | export default function SignupPage() {
 5771 |   598 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
 5772 |   599 | 11 |   const router = useRouter();
 5773 |   600 | 12 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<TenantSignupInput>({
 5774 |   601 | 13 |     resolver: zodResolver(TenantSignupDto),
 5775 |   602 | 14 |   });
 5776 |   603 | 15 | 
 5777 |   604 | 16 |   const onSubmit = async (data: TenantSignupInput) => {
 5778 |   605 | 17 |     const res = await fetch('/api/tenants', {
 5779 |   606 | 18 |       method: 'POST',
 5780 |   607 | 19 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
 5781 |   608 | 20 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
 5782 |   609 | 21 |     });
 5783 |   610 | 22 |     const result = await res.json();
 5784 |   611 | 23 |     if (res.ok) {
 5785 |   612 | 24 |       setMessage(`Tenant created! Redirecting to dashboard...`);
 5786 |   613 | 25 |       // Redirect to tenant dashboard (add to /etc/hosts first)
 5787 |   614 | 26 |       window.location.href = `http://${data.tenantId}.localhost:3000/dashboard`;
 5788 |   615 | 27 |     } else {
 5789 |   616 | 28 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Error creating tenant');
 5790 |   617 | 29 |     }
 5791 |   618 | 30 |   };
 5792 |   619 | 31 | 
 5793 |   620 | 32 |   return (
 5794 |   621 | 33 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">
 5795 |   622 | 34 |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-96">

 5797 |   624 | 36 |         <input {...register('orgName')} placeholder="Organization Name" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />

 6385 |  1212 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6386 |  1213 | /lib/crypto.ts:
 6387 |  1214 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6388 |  1215 |  1 | import { createCipheriv, createDecipheriv, scryptSync, randomBytes } from 'crypto';
 6389 |  1216 |  2 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 6390 |  1217 |  3 | 
 6391 |  1218 |  4 | const ALGORITHM = 'aes-256-gcm';
 6392 |  1219 |  5 | const IV_LENGTH = 16;
 6393 |  1220 |  6 | const TAG_LENGTH = 16;
 6394 |  1221 |  7 | const KEY = scryptSync(env.ENCRYPTION_KEY, 'salt', 32);
 6395 |  1222 |  8 | 
 6396 |  1223 |  9 | export function encrypt(text: string): string {
 6397 |  1224 | 10 |   const iv = randomBytes(IV_LENGTH);
 6398 |  1225 | 11 |   const cipher = createCipheriv(ALGORITHM, KEY, iv);
 6399 |  1226 | 12 |   const encrypted = Buffer.concat([cipher.update(text, 'utf8'), cipher.final()]);
 6400 |  1227 | 13 |   const tag = cipher.getAuthTag();
 6401 |  1228 | 14 |   return Buffer.concat([iv, tag, encrypted]).toString('hex');
 6402 |  1229 | 15 | }
 6403 |  1230 | 16 | 
 6404 |  1231 | 17 | export function decrypt(encryptedText: string): string {
 6405 |  1232 | 18 |   const data = Buffer.from(encryptedText, 'hex');
 6406 |  1233 | 19 |   const iv = data.slice(0, IV_LENGTH);
 6407 |  1234 | 20 |   const tag = data.slice(IV_LENGTH, IV_LENGTH + TAG_LENGTH);
 6408 |  1235 | 21 |   const encrypted = data.slice(IV_LENGTH + TAG_LENGTH);
 6409 |  1236 | 22 |   const decipher = createDecipheriv(ALGORITHM, KEY, iv);
 6410 |  1237 | 23 |   decipher.setAuthTag(tag);
 6411 |  1238 | 24 |   const decrypted = Buffer.concat([decipher.update(encrypted), decipher.final()]);
 6412 |  1239 | 25 |   return decrypted.toString('utf8');
 6413 |  1240 | 26 | }
 6414 |  1241 | 
 6415 |  1242 | 
 6416 |  1243 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6417 |  1244 | /lib/db/index.ts:
 6418 |  1245 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6419 |  1246 |  1 | // lib/db/index.ts
 6420 |  1247 |  2 | import { drizzle, NodePgDatabase } from 'drizzle-orm/node-postgres';
 6421 |  1248 |  3 | import { Pool } from 'pg';
 6422 |  1249 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
 6423 |  1250 |  5 | import { tenants } from './schema/shared';
 6424 |  1251 |  6 | import * as tenantSchema from './schema/tenant';
 6425 |  1252 |  7 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 6426 |  1253 |  8 | import { decrypt } from '@/lib/crypto';
 6427 |  1254 |  9 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 6428 |  1255 | 10 | 
 6429 |  1256 | 11 | // 1. Main DB Client (for managing tenant metadata)
 6430 |  1257 | 12 | const mainPool = new Pool({ connectionString: env.POSTGRES_URL });
 6431 |  1258 | 13 | export const mainDb = drizzle(mainPool, { schema: { tenants } });
 6432 |  1259 | 14 | 
 6433 |  1260 | 15 | // 2. Tenant DB Client Cache
 6434 |  1261 | 16 | const tenantDbCache = new Map<string, NodePgDatabase<typeof tenantSchema>>();
 6435 |  1262 | 17 | 
 6436 |  1263 | 18 | // 3. Function to get a tenant-specific DB client
 6437 |  1264 | 19 | export async function getTenantDb(tenantId: string): Promise<NodePgDatabase<typeof tenantSchema>> {
 6438 |  1265 | 20 |   if (tenantDbCache.has(tenantId)) {
 6439 |  1266 | 21 |     log.info({ tenantId }, 'Tenant DB client cache HIT.');
 6440 |  1267 | 22 |     return tenantDbCache.get(tenantId)!;
 6441 |  1268 | 23 |   }
 6442 |  1269 | 24 |   log.info({ tenantId }, 'Tenant DB client cache MISS.');
 6443 |  1270 | 25 | 
 6444 |  1271 | 26 |   const results = await mainDb
 6445 |  1272 | 27 |     .select({ connectionString: tenants.connectionString })
 6446 |  1273 | 28 |     .from(tenants)
 6447 |  1274 | 29 |     .where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId))
 6448 |  1275 | 30 |     .limit(1);
 6449 |  1276 | 31 | 
 6450 |  1277 | 32 |   // --- Start of Fix ---
 6451 |  1278 | 33 |   const tenantData = results[0]; // Access the first element of the array
 6452 |  1279 | 34 | 
 6453 |  1280 | 35 |   if (!tenantData) {
 6454 |  1281 | 36 |     log.error({ tenantId }, 'Tenant not found in main database.');
 6455 |  1282 | 37 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
 6456 |  1283 | 38 |   }
 6457 |  1284 | 39 | 
 6458 |  1285 | 40 |   const decryptedConnectionString = decrypt(tenantData.connectionString);
 6459 |  1286 | 41 |   // --- End of Fix ---
 6460 |  1287 | 42 | 
 6461 |  1288 | 43 |   const tenantPool = new Pool({ connectionString: decryptedConnectionString });
 6462 |  1289 | 44 |   const tenantDb = drizzle(tenantPool, { schema: tenantSchema });
 6463 |  1290 | 45 | 
 6464 |  1291 | 46 |   tenantDbCache.set(tenantId, tenantDb);
 6465 |  1292 | 47 |   log.info({ tenantId }, 'Created and cached new tenant DB client.');
 6466 |  1293 | 48 | 
 6467 |  1294 | 49 |   return tenantDb;
 6468 |  1295 | 50 | }

 6470 |  1297 | 
 6471 |  1298 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6472 |  1299 | /lib/db/migrate.ts:
 6473 |  1300 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6474 |  1301 |  1 | // In /lib/db/migrate.ts
 6475 |  1302 |  2 | import { drizzle } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js';
 6476 |  1303 |  3 | import { migrate } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js/migrator';
 6477 |  1304 |  4 | import postgres from 'postgres';
 6478 |  1305 |  5 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 6479 |  1306 |  6 | 
 6480 |  1307 |  7 | export async function runTenantMigrations(connectionString: string) {
 6481 |  1308 |  8 |   // Use postgres 'on-the-fly' with max 1 connection for migrations
 6482 |  1309 |  9 |   const migrationClient = postgres(connectionString, { max: 1 });
 6483 |  1310 | 10 |   const db = drizzle(migrationClient);
 6484 |  1311 | 11 | 
 6485 |  1312 | 12 |   try {
 6486 |  1313 | 13 |     log.info('Starting tenant migration...');
 6487 |  1314 | 14 |     await migrate(db, { migrationsFolder: './drizzle/tenant' }); // Assumes tenant migrations are in 'drizzle/tenant'
 6488 |  1315 | 15 |     log.info('Tenant migration completed successfully.');
 6489 |  1316 | 16 |   } catch (error) {
 6490 |  1317 | 17 |     log.error({ error }, 'Tenant migration failed.');
 6491 |  1318 | 18 |     // Re-throw the error to ensure the API call fails loudly
 6492 |  1319 | 19 |     throw new Error('Could not run tenant migrations.');
 6493 |  1320 | 20 |   } finally {
 6494 |  1321 | 21 |     // Ensure the connection is closed
 6495 |  1322 | 22 |     await migrationClient.end();
 6496 |  1323 | 23 |   }
 6497 |  1324 | 24 | }

 6573 |  1400 | /lib/neon/api.ts:
 6574 |  1401 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6575 |  1402 |  1 | // In lib/neon/api.ts
 6576 |  1403 |  2 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
 6577 |  1404 |  3 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
 6578 |  1405 |  4 | 
 6579 |  1406 |  5 | const NEON_API_BASE = 'https://console.neon.tech/api/v2';
 6580 |  1407 |  6 | 
 6581 |  1408 |  7 | export async function createNeonProject(tenantId: string) {
 6582 |  1409 |  8 |   log.info({ tenantId }, '[NeonAPI] Starting project creation process.');
 6583 |  1410 |  9 | 
 6584 |  1411 | 10 |   const headers = {
 6585 |  1412 | 11 |     'Authorization': `Bearer ${env.NEON_API_KEY}`,
 6586 |  1413 | 12 |     'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 6587 |  1414 | 13 |     'Accept': 'application/json',
 6588 |  1415 | 14 |   };
 6589 |  1416 | 15 | 
 6590 |  1417 | 16 |   const projectResponse = await fetch(`${NEON_API_BASE}/projects`, {
 6591 |  1418 | 17 |     method: 'POST',
 6592 |  1419 | 18 |     headers,
 6593 |  1420 | 19 |     body: JSON.stringify({
 6594 |  1421 | 20 |       project: { name: `edux-tenant-${tenantId}` },
 6595 |  1422 | 21 |     }),
 6596 |  1423 | 22 |   });
 6597 |  1424 | 23 | 
 6598 |  1425 | 24 |   if (!projectResponse.ok) {
 6599 |  1426 | 25 |     const errorBody = await projectResponse.text();
 6600 |  1427 | 26 |     log.error({ tenantId, status: projectResponse.status, errorBody }, '[NeonAPI] Failed to create project.');
 6601 |  1428 | 27 |     throw new Error(`Failed to create Neon project: ${errorBody}`);
 6602 |  1429 | 28 |   }
 6603 |  1430 | 29 | 
 6604 |  1431 | 30 |   const responseData = await projectResponse.json();
 6605 |  1432 | 31 |   const project = responseData.project;
 6606 |  1433 | 32 |   const connectionDetails = responseData.connection_uris?.[0];
 6607 |  1434 | 33 |   const connection_uri = connectionDetails?.connection_uri;
 6608 |  1435 | 34 | 
 6609 |  1436 | 35 |   if (!connection_uri) {
 6610 |  1437 | 36 |     log.error({ responseData }, '[NeonAPI] Connection URI could not be extracted from the response.');
 6611 |  1438 | 37 |     throw new Error('Connection URI could not be extracted from the Neon API response.');
 6612 |  1439 | 38 |   }
 6613 |  1440 | 39 | 
 6614 |  1441 | 40 |   log.info({ tenantId, projectId: project.id }, '[NeonAPI] Project created successfully.');
 6615 |  1442 | 41 | 
 6616 |  1443 | 42 |   // The modification to create a pooled string has been removed.
 6617 |  1444 | 43 |   // We will now return the original, direct connection string.
 6618 |  1445 | 44 | 
 6619 |  1446 | 45 |   return {
 6620 |  1447 | 46 |     projectId: project.id,
 6621 |  1448 | 47 |     connectionString: connection_uri,
 6622 |  1449 | 48 |   };
 6623 |  1450 | 49 | }

 6634 |  1461 |  6 | export async function validateTenant(tenantId: string) {
 6635 |  1462 |  7 |   console.log(`[Tenant] Validating tenant: ${tenantId}`);
 6636 |  1463 |  8 |   const results = await mainDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId)).limit(1);
 6637 |  1464 |  9 |   const tenant = results[0];

 6639 |  1466 | 11 |   if (!tenant) {
 6640 |  1467 | 12 |     console.error(`[Tenant] Invalid tenant: ${tenantId}`);
 6641 |  1468 | 13 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
 6642 |  1469 | 14 |   }
 6643 |  1470 | 15 | 
 6644 |  1471 | 16 |   return tenant;

 6652 |  1479 | 2 | import { twMerge } from "tailwind-merge"
 6653 |  1480 | 3 | 
 6654 |  1481 | 4 | export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
 6655 |  1482 | 5 |   return twMerge(clsx(inputs))

 6659 |  1486 | 
 6660 |  1487 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6661 |  1488 | /middleware.ts:
 6662 |  1489 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 6663 |  1490 |  1 | // middleware.ts
 6664 |  1491 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
 6665 |  1492 |  3 | import logger from './lib/logger';
 6666 |  1493 |  4 | 
 6667 |  1494 |  5 | // Extracts the tenant ID from the hostname.
 6668 |  1495 |  6 | const getTenantId = (host: string): string | null => {
 6669 |  1496 |  7 |   const parts = host.split('.');
 6670 |  1497 |  8 | 
 6671 |  1498 |  9 |   // Handles tenant.localhost:3000 in development
 6672 |  1499 | 10 |   if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && parts.length === 2 && parts[1].startsWith('localhost')) {
 6673 |  1500 | 11 |     return parts[0];
 6674 |  1501 | 12 |   }
 6675 |  1502 | 13 | 
 6676 |  1503 | 14 |   // Handles tenant.example.com in production
 6677 |  1504 | 15 |   if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' && parts.length > 1 && parts[0] !== 'www') {
 6678 |  1505 | 16 |     return parts[0];
 6679 |  1506 | 17 |   }
 6680 |  1507 | 18 | 
 6681 |  1508 | 19 |   return null;
 6682 |  1509 | 20 | };
 6683 |  1510 | 21 | 
 6684 |  1511 | 22 | 
 6685 |  1512 | 23 | export function middleware(request: NextRequest) {
 6686 |  1513 | 24 |   const host = request.headers.get('host') || '';
 6687 |  1514 | 25 |   const tenantId = getTenantId(host);
 6688 |  1515 | 26 |   const { pathname } = request.nextUrl;
 6689 |  1516 | 27 |   const log = logger.child({ tenantId, pathname });
 6690 |  1517 | 28 | 
 6691 |  1518 | 29 |   log.info('Middleware processing request');
 6692 |  1519 | 30 | 
 6693 |  1520 | 31 |   const headers = new Headers(request.headers);
 6694 |  1521 | 32 |   if (tenantId) {
 6695 |  1522 | 33 |     headers.set('x-tenant-id', tenantId);
 6696 |  1523 | 34 |   }
 6697 |  1524 | 35 | 
 6698 |  1525 | 36 |   // Allow public routes regardless of tenant.
 6699 |  1526 | 37 |   if (pathname === '/' || pathname === '/signup') {
 6700 |  1527 | 38 |     return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 6701 |  1528 | 39 |   }
 6702 |  1529 | 40 | 
 6703 |  1530 | 41 |   // If on a tenant subdomain, allow access to login.
 6704 |  1531 | 42 |   if (tenantId && pathname.startsWith('/login')) {
 6705 |  1532 | 43 |       return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 6706 |  1533 | 44 |   }
 6707 |  1534 | 45 | 
 6708 |  1535 | 46 |   // All API routes are allowed to pass through for now;
 6709 |  1536 | 47 |   // authentication will be handled at the route level.
 6710 |  1537 | 48 |   if (pathname.startsWith('/api')) {
 6711 |  1538 | 49 |     return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 6712 |  1539 | 50 |   }
 6713 |  1540 | 51 | 
 6714 |  1541 | 52 |   // For dashboard access, check for an auth token.
 6715 |  1542 | 53 |   const token = request.cookies.get('authToken');
 6716 |  1543 | 54 |   if (pathname.startsWith('/dashboard') && !token) {
 6717 |  1544 | 55 |     log.warn('Access to dashboard denied without token, redirecting to login.');
 6718 |  1545 | 56 |     const loginUrl = new URL('/login', request.url);
 6719 |  1546 | 57 |     return NextResponse.redirect(loginUrl);
 6720 |  1547 | 58 |   }
 6721 |  1548 | 59 | 
 6722 |  1549 | 60 |   return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
 6723 |  1550 | 61 | }
 6724 |  1551 | 62 | 
 6725 |  1552 | 63 | export const config = {
 6726 |  1553 | 64 |   matcher: [
 6727 |  1554 | 65 |     /*
 6728 |  1555 | 66 |      * Match all request paths except for the ones starting with:
 6729 |  1556 | 67 |      * - _next/static (static files)
 6730 |  1557 | 68 |      * - _next/image (image optimization files)
 6731 |  1558 | 69 |      * - favicon.ico (favicon file)
 6732 |  1559 | 70 |      */
 6733 |  1560 | 71 |     '/((?!_next/static|_next/image|favicon.ico).*)',
 6734 |  1561 | 72 |   ],
 6735 |  1562 | 73 | };
 6736 |  1563 | 
 6737 |  1564 | 
 6738 |  1565 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

15225 | 10052 |  107 | 
15226 | 10053 |  108 | 
15227 | 10054 |  109 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15228 | 10055 |  110 | /app/api/auth/login/route.ts:
15229 | 10056 |  111 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15230 | 10057 |  112 |  1 | // app/api/auth/login/route.ts
15231 | 10058 |  113 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
15232 | 10059 |  114 |  3 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
15233 | 10060 |  115 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
15234 | 10061 |  116 |  5 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
15235 | 10062 |  117 |  6 | import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken';
15236 | 10063 |  118 |  7 | import { LoginDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
15237 | 10064 |  119 |  8 | import { validateTenant } from '@/lib/server/tenant';
15238 | 10065 |  120 |  9 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
15239 | 10066 |  121 | 10 | 
15240 | 10067 |  122 | 11 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
15241 | 10068 |  123 | 12 | 
15242 | 10069 |  124 | 13 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
15243 | 10070 |  125 | 14 |   try {
15244 | 10071 |  126 | 15 |     const tenantId = request.headers.get('x-tenant-id');
15245 | 10072 |  127 | 16 |     if (!tenantId) {
15246 | 10073 |  128 | 17 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant required' }, { status: 400 });
15247 | 10074 |  129 | 18 |     }
15248 | 10075 |  130 | 19 | 
15249 | 10076 |  131 | 20 |     // Validate tenant existence
15250 | 10077 |  132 | 21 |     await validateTenant(tenantId);
15251 | 10078 |  133 | 22 | 
15252 | 10079 |  134 | 23 |     const body = await request.json();
15253 | 10080 |  135 | 24 |     const data = LoginDto.parse(body);
15254 | 10081 |  136 | 25 | 
15255 | 10082 |  137 | 26 |     console.log(`[API] Login attempt for tenant: ${tenantId}, email: ${data.email}`);
15256 | 10083 |  138 | 27 | 
15257 | 10084 |  139 | 28 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
15258 | 10085 |  140 | 29 |     const users = await tenantDb.select().from(schema.users).where(eq(schema.users.email, data.email)).limit(1);
15259 | 10086 |  141 | 30 | 
15260 | 10087 |  142 | 31 |     if (!users.length) {
15261 | 10088 |  143 | 32 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
15262 | 10089 |  144 | 33 |     }
15263 | 10090 |  145 | 34 | 
15264 | 10091 |  146 | 35 |     const user = users[0];
15265 | 10092 |  147 | 36 |     const match = await bcrypt.compare(data.password, user.password);
15266 | 10093 |  148 | 37 |     if (!match) {
15267 | 10094 |  149 | 38 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Invalid credentials' }, { status: 401 });
15268 | 10095 |  150 | 39 |     }
15269 | 10096 |  151 | 40 | 
15270 | 10097 |  152 | 41 |     const token = jwt.sign({ tenantId, userId: user.id }, env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn: '1h' });
15271 | 10098 |  153 | 42 | 
15272 | 10099 |  154 | 43 |     const response = NextResponse.json({ message: 'Login successful' });
15273 | 10100 |  155 | 44 |     response.cookies.set('authToken', token, { httpOnly: true, secure: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production', sameSite: 'strict', maxAge: 3600 });
15274 | 10101 |  156 | 45 |     return response;
15275 | 10102 |  157 | 46 |   } catch (err) {
15276 | 10103 |  158 | 47 |     console.error('[API] Login failed:', err);
15277 | 10104 |  159 | 48 |     if (err instanceof Error && err.message === 'Tenant not found') {
15278 | 10105 |  160 | 49 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant not found' }, { status: 404 });
15279 | 10106 |  161 | 50 |     }
15280 | 10107 |  162 | 51 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal error' }, { status: 500 });
15281 | 10108 |  163 | 52 |   }
15282 | 10109 |  164 | 53 | }
15283 | 10110 |  165 | 
15284 | 10111 |  166 | 
15285 | 10112 |  167 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15286 | 10113 |  168 | /app/api/tenants/route.ts:
15287 | 10114 |  169 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15288 | 10115 |  170 |  1 | // app/api/tenants/route.ts
15289 | 10116 |  171 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
15290 | 10117 |  172 |  3 | import { sharedDb, getTenantDb, executeRawQuery } from '@/lib/db';
15291 | 10118 |  173 |  4 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
15292 | 10119 |  174 |  5 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
15293 | 10120 |  175 |  6 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
15294 | 10121 |  176 |  7 | import { TenantSignupDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
15295 | 10122 |  177 |  8 | import z from 'zod/v4';
15296 | 10123 |  178 |  9 | 
15297 | 10124 |  179 | 10 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';
15298 | 10125 |  180 | 11 | 
15299 | 10126 |  181 | 12 | export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
15300 | 10127 |  182 | 13 |   try {
15301 | 10128 |  183 | 14 |     const body = await request.json();
15302 | 10129 |  184 | 15 |     const data = TenantSignupDto.parse(body);
15303 | 10130 |  185 | 16 |     const tenantId = data.tenantId; 
15304 | 10131 |  186 | 17 |     const schemaName = `tenant_${tenantId}`;
15305 | 10132 |  187 | 18 | 
15306 | 10133 |  188 | 19 |     console.log(`[API] Creating tenant: ${tenantId}, schema: ${schemaName}`);
15307 | 10134 |  189 | 20 | 
15308 | 10135 |  190 | 21 |     const existing = await sharedDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId));
15309 | 10136 |  191 | 22 |     if (existing.length) {
15310 | 10137 |  192 | 23 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant ID already exists' }, { status: 409 });
15311 | 10138 |  193 | 24 |     }
15312 | 10139 |  194 | 25 | 
15313 | 10140 |  195 | 26 |     // Create schema and users table
15314 | 10141 |  196 | 27 |     await executeRawQuery(`CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS "${schemaName}";`);
15315 | 10142 |  197 | 28 |     await executeRawQuery(`
15316 | 10143 |  198 | 29 |       CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "${schemaName}".users (
15317 | 10144 |  199 | 30 |         id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
15318 | 10145 |  200 | 31 |         name TEXT NOT NULL,
15319 | 10146 |  201 | 32 |         email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
15320 | 10147 |  202 | 33 |         password TEXT NOT NULL
15321 | 10148 |  203 | 34 |       );
15322 | 10149 |  204 | 35 |     `);
15323 | 10150 |  205 | 36 | 
15324 | 10151 |  206 | 37 |     // Insert tenant metadata
15325 | 10152 |  207 | 38 |     await sharedDb.insert(tenants).values({
15326 | 10153 |  208 | 39 |       tenantId,
15327 | 10154 |  209 | 40 |       schemaName,
15328 | 10155 |  210 | 41 |       name: data.orgName,
15329 | 10156 |  211 | 42 |     });
15330 | 10157 |  212 | 43 | 
15331 | 10158 |  213 | 44 |     // Insert admin user
15332 | 10159 |  214 | 45 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(tenantId);
15333 | 10160 |  215 | 46 |     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(data.adminPassword, 12);  // Stronger salt (12 rounds)
15334 | 10161 |  216 | 47 |     await tenantDb.insert(schema.users).values({
15335 | 10162 |  217 | 48 |       name: data.adminName,
15336 | 10163 |  218 | 49 |       email: data.adminEmail,
15337 | 10164 |  219 | 50 |       password: hashedPassword,
15338 | 10165 |  220 | 51 |     });
15339 | 10166 |  221 | 52 | 
15340 | 10167 |  222 | 53 |     console.log(`[API] Tenant created successfully: ${tenantId}`);
15341 | 10168 |  223 | 54 |     return NextResponse.json({ message: 'Tenant created', tenantId });
15342 | 10169 |  224 | 55 |   } catch (err) {
15343 | 10170 |  225 | 56 |     console.error('[API] Tenant creation failed:', err);
15344 | 10171 |  226 | 57 |     if (err instanceof z.ZodError) {
15345 | 10172 |  227 | 58 |       return NextResponse.json({ error: err }, { status: 400 });
15346 | 10173 |  228 | 59 |     }
15347 | 10174 |  229 | 60 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal error' }, { status: 500 });
15348 | 10175 |  230 | 61 |   }
15349 | 10176 |  231 | 62 | }
15350 | 10177 |  232 | 
15351 | 10178 |  233 | 
15352 | 10179 |  234 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15353 | 10180 |  235 | /app/dashboard/page.tsx:
15354 | 10181 |  236 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15355 | 10182 |  237 |  1 | // app/dashboard/page.tsx
15356 | 10183 |  238 |  2 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
15357 | 10184 |  239 |  3 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
15358 | 10185 |  240 |  4 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
15359 | 10186 |  241 |  5 | 
15360 | 10187 |  242 |  6 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
15361 | 10188 |  243 |  7 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
15362 | 10189 |  244 |  8 | 
15363 | 10190 |  245 |  9 | export const runtime = 'nodejs';  // Node runtime
15364 | 10191 |  246 | 10 | 
15365 | 10192 |  247 | 11 | export default async function DashboardPage() {
15366 | 10193 |  248 | 12 |   const cookieStore = cookies();
15367 | 10194 |  249 | 13 |   const token = (await cookieStore).get('authToken')?.value;
15368 | 10195 |  250 | 14 |   if (!token) {
15369 | 10196 |  251 | 15 |     return <div>Unauthorized</div>;
15370 | 10197 |  252 | 16 |   }
15371 | 10198 |  253 | 17 | 
15372 | 10199 |  254 | 18 |   let decoded;
15373 | 10200 |  255 | 19 |   try {
15374 | 10201 |  256 | 20 |     decoded = verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as { tenantId: string; userId: number };
15375 | 10202 |  257 | 21 | 
15376 | 10203 |  258 | 22 |     const { db: tenantDb, schema } = await getTenantDb(decoded.tenantId);
15377 | 10204 |  259 | 23 |     const user = await tenantDb.select().from(schema.users).where(eq(schema.users.id, decoded.userId)).limit(1);
15378 | 10205 |  260 | 24 | 
15379 | 10206 |  261 | 25 |     return (
15380 | 10207 |  262 | 26 |       <div className="min-h-screen p-8 bg-gray-100">
15381 | 10208 |  263 | 27 |         <h1 className="text-3xl">Welcome to {decoded.tenantId} Dashboard</h1>
15382 | 10209 |  264 | 28 |         <p>Email: {user[0]?.email}</p>
15383 | 10210 |  265 | 29 |       </div>
15384 | 10211 |  266 | 30 |     );
15385 | 10212 |  267 | 31 |   } catch (err) {
15386 | 10213 |  268 | 32 |     if (err === 'Tenant not found') {
15387 | 10214 |  269 | 33 |       return <div>Tenant not found</div>;
15388 | 10215 |  270 | 34 |     }
15389 | 10216 |  271 | 35 |     return <div>Invalid token</div>;
15390 | 10217 |  272 | 36 |   }
15391 | 10218 |  273 | 37 | }
15392 | 10219 |  274 | 
15393 | 10220 |  275 |

15572 | 10399 |  454 |  2 | 'use client';

15574 | 10401 |  456 |  4 | import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
15575 | 10402 |  457 |  5 | import { LoginInput, LoginDto } from '@/lib/dto/tenant';
15576 | 10403 |  458 |  6 | import { useState } from 'react';
15577 | 10404 |  459 |  7 | import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
15578 | 10405 |  460 |  8 | 
15579 | 10406 |  461 |  9 | export default function LoginPage() {
15580 | 10407 |  462 | 10 |   const [message, setMessage] = useState('');
15581 | 10408 |  463 | 11 |   const router = useRouter();
15582 | 10409 |  464 | 12 |   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<LoginInput>({
15583 | 10410 |  465 | 13 |     resolver: zodResolver(LoginDto),
15584 | 10411 |  466 | 14 |   });
15585 | 10412 |  467 | 15 | 
15586 | 10413 |  468 | 16 |   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginInput) => {
15587 | 10414 |  469 | 17 |     const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login', {
15588 | 10415 |  470 | 18 |       method: 'POST',
15589 | 10416 |  471 | 19 |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
15590 | 10417 |  472 | 20 |       body: JSON.stringify(data),
15591 | 10418 |  473 | 21 |     });
15592 | 10419 |  474 | 22 |     if (res.ok) {
15593 | 10420 |  475 | 23 |       router.push('/dashboard');
15594 | 10421 |  476 | 24 |     } else {
15595 | 10422 |  477 | 25 |       const result = await res.json();
15596 | 10423 |  478 | 26 |       setMessage(result.error || 'Login failed');
15597 | 10424 |  479 | 27 |     }
15598 | 10425 |  480 | 28 |   };
15599 | 10426 |  481 | 29 | 
15600 | 10427 |  482 | 30 |   return (
15601 | 10428 |  483 | 31 |     <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-800">

15603 | 10430 |  485 | 33 |         <h1 className="text-2xl mb-4">Login</h1>
15604 | 10431 |  486 | 34 |         <input {...register('email')} placeholder="Email" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
15605 | 10432 |  487 | 35 |         {errors.email && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.email.message}</p>}
15606 | 10433 |  488 | 36 |         <input type="password" {...register('password')} placeholder="Password" className="mb-2 p-2 border w-full" />
15607 | 10434 |  489 | 37 |         {errors.password && <p className="text-red-500">{errors.password.message}</p>}
15608 | 10435 |  490 | 38 |         <button type="submit" className="bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 w-full">Login</button>

15748 | 10575 |  630 | 24 |   variant,
15749 | 10576 |  631 | 25 |   ...props
15750 | 10577 |  632 | 26 | }: React.ComponentProps<"div"> & VariantProps<typeof alertVariants>) {

15752 | 10579 |  634 | 28 |     <div
15753 | 10580 |  635 | 29 |       data-slot="alert"

15757 | 10584 |  639 | 33 |     />
15758 | 10585 |  640 | 34 |   )

16040 | 10867 |  922 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16041 | 10868 |  923 |  1 | // lib/db/index.ts
16042 | 10869 |  924 |  2 | import { drizzle } from 'drizzle-orm/node-postgres';
16043 | 10870 |  925 |  3 | import { Pool, Client } from 'pg';
16044 | 10871 |  926 |  4 | import { pgSchema } from 'drizzle-orm/pg-core';
16045 | 10872 |  927 |  5 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
16046 | 10873 |  928 |  6 | import { tenants } from './schema/shared';
16047 | 10874 |  929 |  7 | import { usersColumns } from './schema/tenant';
16048 | 10875 |  930 |  8 | import { env } from '../../env.mjs';
16049 | 10876 |  931 |  9 | 
16050 | 10877 |  932 | 10 | // Single shared pool for the entire database (all schemas)
16051 | 10878 |  933 | 11 | const sharedPool = new Pool({ connectionString: env.DATABASE_URL });
16052 | 10879 |  934 | 12 | export const sharedDb = drizzle(sharedPool);
16053 | 10880 |  935 | 13 | 
16054 | 10881 |  936 | 14 | // Function to get tenant-specific DB (dynamic schema qualification, same pool)
16055 | 10882 |  937 | 15 | export async function getTenantDb(tenantId: string) {
16056 | 10883 |  938 | 16 |   console.log(`[DB] Resolving tenant DB for ${tenantId}`);
16057 | 10884 |  939 | 17 |   const tenant = await sharedDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId)).limit(1);
16058 | 10885 |  940 | 18 |   if (!tenant.length) {
16059 | 10886 |  941 | 19 |     console.error(`[DB] Tenant not found: ${tenantId}`);
16060 | 10887 |  942 | 20 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
16061 | 10888 |  943 | 21 |   }
16062 | 10889 |  944 | 22 |   const schemaName = tenant[0].schemaName;
16063 | 10890 |  945 | 23 | 
16064 | 10891 |  946 | 24 |   const tenantSchema = pgSchema(schemaName);
16065 | 10892 |  947 | 25 |   const users = tenantSchema.table('users', usersColumns);
16066 | 10893 |  948 | 26 | 
16067 | 10894 |  949 | 27 |   const tenantDb = drizzle(sharedPool, { schema: { users } });
16068 | 10895 |  950 | 28 |   console.log(`[DB] Tenant DB initialized for schema: ${schemaName}`);
16069 | 10896 |  951 | 29 |   return { db: tenantDb, schema: { users } };
16070 | 10897 |  952 | 30 | }
16071 | 10898 |  953 | 31 | 
16072 | 10899 |  954 | 32 | // For raw queries (e.g., schema creation)
16073 | 10900 |  955 | 33 | export async function executeRawQuery(query: string) {
16074 | 10901 |  956 | 34 |   const client = new Client({ connectionString: env.DATABASE_URL });
16075 | 10902 |  957 | 35 |   await client.connect();
16076 | 10903 |  958 | 36 |   try {
16077 | 10904 |  959 | 37 |     await client.query(query);
16078 | 10905 |  960 | 38 |     console.log(`[DB] Executed raw query: ${query.substring(0, 50)}...`);
16079 | 10906 |  961 | 39 |   } finally {
16080 | 10907 |  962 | 40 |     await client.end();
16081 | 10908 |  963 | 41 |   }
16082 | 10909 |  964 | 42 | }
16083 | 10910 |  965 | 43 | 
16084 | 10911 |  966 | 44 | // Export types
16085 | 10912 |  967 | 45 | export type TenantDb = Awaited<ReturnType<typeof getTenantDb>>;
16086 | 10913 |  968 |

16093 | 10920 |  975 |  3 | 
16094 | 10921 |  976 |  4 | export const tenants = pgTable('tenants', {
16095 | 10922 |  977 |  5 |   id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
16096 | 10923 |  978 |  6 |   tenantId: text('tenant_id').notNull().unique(),
16097 | 10924 |  979 |  7 |   schemaName: text('schema_name').notNull(),
16098 | 10925 |  980 |  8 |   name: text('name').notNull(),
16099 | 10926 |  981 |  9 |   createdAt: timestamp('created_at').defaultNow().notNull(),
16100 | 10927 |  982 | 10 | });

16108 | 10935 |  990 | 3 | 
16109 | 10936 |  991 | 4 | export const usersColumns = {

16112 | 10939 |  994 | 7 |   email: text('email').notNull().unique(),
16113 | 10940 |  995 | 8 |   password: text('password').notNull(),  // Hashed
16114 | 10941 |  996 | 9 | };

16121 | 10948 | 1003 |  2 | import { z } from 'zod';
16122 | 10949 | 1004 |  3 | 
16123 | 10950 | 1005 |  4 | export const TenantSignupDto = z.object({
16124 | 10951 | 1006 |  5 |   orgName: z.string().min(3, 'Org name must be at least 3 characters').max(50),
16125 | 10952 | 1007 |  6 |   tenantId: z.string().min(3, 'Tenant ID must be at least 3 characters').max(50).regex(/^[a-z0-9-]+$/, 'Tenant ID must be lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens'),
16126 | 10953 | 1008 |  7 |   adminName: z.string().min(3, 'Admin name must be at least 3 characters').max(100),
16127 | 10954 | 1009 |  8 |   adminEmail: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
16128 | 10955 | 1010 |  9 |   adminPassword: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
16129 | 10956 | 1011 | 10 | });
16130 | 10957 | 1012 | 11 | 
16131 | 10958 | 1013 | 12 | export const LoginDto = z.object({
16132 | 10959 | 1014 | 13 |   email: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
16133 | 10960 | 1015 | 14 |   password: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
16134 | 10961 | 1016 | 15 | });
16135 | 10962 | 1017 | 16 |

16141 | 10968 | 1023 | /lib/server/tenant.ts:

16143 | 10970 | 1025 |  1 | // lib/server/tenant.ts
16144 | 10971 | 1026 |  2 | import { sharedDb } from '@/lib/db';
16145 | 10972 | 1027 |  3 | import { tenants } from '@/lib/db/schema/shared';
16146 | 10973 | 1028 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
16147 | 10974 | 1029 |  5 | 
16148 | 10975 | 1030 |  6 | export async function validateTenant(tenantId: string) {
16149 | 10976 | 1031 |  7 |   console.log(`[Tenant] Validating tenant: ${tenantId}`);
16150 | 10977 | 1032 |  8 |   const tenant = await sharedDb.select().from(tenants).where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId)).limit(1);
16151 | 10978 | 1033 |  9 |   if (!tenant.length) {
16152 | 10979 | 1034 | 10 |     console.error(`[Tenant] Invalid tenant: ${tenantId}`);
16153 | 10980 | 1035 | 11 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
16154 | 10981 | 1036 | 12 |   }
16155 | 10982 | 1037 | 13 |   return tenant[0];
16156 | 10983 | 1038 | 14 | }
16157 | 10984 | 1039 | 
16158 | 10985 | 1040 | 
16159 | 10986 | 1041 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16160 | 10987 | 1042 | /lib/utils.ts:
16161 | 10988 | 1043 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16162 | 10989 | 1044 | 1 | import { clsx, type ClassValue } from "clsx"
16163 | 10990 | 1045 | 2 | import { twMerge } from "tailwind-merge"
16164 | 10991 | 1046 | 3 | 
16165 | 10992 | 1047 | 4 | export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
16166 | 10993 | 1048 | 5 |   return twMerge(clsx(inputs))
16167 | 10994 | 1049 | 6 | }
16168 | 10995 | 1050 | 7 | 
16169 | 10996 | 1051 | 
16170 | 10997 | 1052 | 
16171 | 10998 | 1053 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16172 | 10999 | 1054 | /middleware.ts:
16173 | 11000 | 1055 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16174 | 11001 | 1056 |  1 | // middleware.ts
16175 | 11002 | 1057 |  2 | import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
16176 | 11003 | 1058 |  3 | 
16177 | 11004 | 1059 |  4 | export async function middleware(request: NextRequest) {
16178 | 11005 | 1060 |  5 |   const host = request.headers.get('host') || '';
16179 | 11006 | 1061 |  6 |   const parts = host.split('.');
16180 | 11007 | 1062 |  7 |   const tenantId = parts.length > 2 ? parts[0] : null;  // e.g., tenant1.localhost:3000 → tenant1
16181 | 11008 | 1063 |  8 | 
16182 | 11009 | 1064 |  9 |   console.log(`[Middleware] Host: ${host}, Tenant ID: ${tenantId}`);
16183 | 11010 | 1065 | 10 | 
16184 | 11011 | 1066 | 11 |   // Public routes (no tenant needed) - added '/'
16185 | 11012 | 1067 | 12 |   const pathname = request.nextUrl.pathname;
16186 | 11013 | 1068 | 13 |   if (!tenantId && (pathname === '/' || pathname.startsWith('/signup') || pathname.startsWith('/login') || pathname.startsWith('/api/tenants') || pathname.startsWith('/api/auth'))) {
16187 | 11014 | 1069 | 14 |     return NextResponse.next();
16188 | 11015 | 1070 | 15 |   }
16189 | 11016 | 1071 | 16 | 
16190 | 11017 | 1072 | 17 |   console.log(`[Middleware] Tenant ID found: ${tenantId}`);
16191 | 11018 | 1073 | 18 |   if (!tenantId) {
16192 | 11019 | 1074 | 19 |     console.error('[Middleware] No tenant ID found');
16193 | 11020 | 1075 | 20 |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Tenant not found' }, { status: 404 });
16194 | 11021 | 1076 | 21 |   }
16195 | 11022 | 1077 | 22 | 
16196 | 11023 | 1078 | 23 |   // Set tenant context in headers (no validation here)
16197 | 11024 | 1079 | 24 |   const headers = new Headers(request.headers);
16198 | 11025 | 1080 | 25 |   headers.set('x-tenant-id', tenantId);
16199 | 11026 | 1081 | 26 |   console.log(`[Middleware] Setting x-tenant-id header: ${tenantId}`);
16200 | 11027 | 1082 | 27 |   console.log(`[Middleware] headers: ${JSON.stringify(Array.from(headers.entries()))}`);
16201 | 11028 | 1083 | 28 | 
16202 | 11029 | 1084 | 29 |   return NextResponse.next({ request: { headers } });
16203 | 11030 | 1085 | 30 | }
16204 | 11031 | 1086 | 31 |

24471 | 19298 | /scripts/migrate-tenant.ts:
24472 | 19299 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24473 | 19300 |  1 | // Create a new file: /scripts/migrate-tenant.ts
24474 | 19301 |  2 | import { drizzle } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js';
24475 | 19302 |  3 | import { migrate } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js/migrator';
24476 | 19303 |  4 | import postgres from 'postgres';
24477 | 19304 |  5 | import 'dotenv/config';
24478 | 19305 |  6 | 
24479 | 19306 |  7 | async function main() {
24480 | 19307 |  8 |   const connectionString = process.env.TENANT_DATABASE_URL;
24481 | 19308 |  9 | 
24482 | 19309 | 10 |   if (!connectionString) {
24483 | 19310 | 11 |     throw new Error('TENANT_DATABASE_URL environment variable is not set.');
24484 | 19311 | 12 |   }
24485 | 19312 | 13 | 
24486 | 19313 | 14 |   // Use postgres 'on-the-fly' with max 1 connection for migrations
24487 | 19314 | 15 |   const migrationClient = postgres(connectionString, { max: 1 });
24488 | 19315 | 16 |   const db = drizzle(migrationClient);
24489 | 19316 | 17 | 
24490 | 19317 | 18 |   console.log('Running migrations for tenant...');
24491 | 19318 | 19 | 
24492 | 19319 | 20 |   await migrate(db, { migrationsFolder: './drizzle/tenant' });
24493 | 19320 | 21 | 
24494 | 19321 | 22 |   console.log('Migrations completed successfully.');
24495 | 19322 | 23 | 
24496 | 19323 | 24 |   await migrationClient.end();
24497 | 19324 | 25 |   process.exit(0);
24498 | 19325 | 26 | }
24499 | 19326 | 27 | 
24500 | 19327 | 28 | main().catch((err) => {
24501 | 19328 | 29 |   console.error('Migration failed:', err);
24502 | 19329 | 30 |   process.exit(1);
24503 | 19330 | 31 | });

24591 | /hooks/use-mobile.ts:
24592 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24593 |  1 | import * as React from "react"
24594 |  2 | 
24595 |  3 | const MOBILE_BREAKPOINT = 768
24596 |  4 | 
24597 |  5 | export function useIsMobile() {
24598 |  6 |   const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = React.useState<boolean | undefined>(undefined)
24599 |  7 | 
24600 |  8 |   React.useEffect(() => {
24601 |  9 |     const mql = window.matchMedia(`(max-width: ${MOBILE_BREAKPOINT - 1}px)`)
24602 | 10 |     const onChange = () => {
24603 | 11 |       setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < MOBILE_BREAKPOINT)
24604 | 12 |     }
24605 | 13 |     mql.addEventListener("change", onChange)
24606 | 14 |     setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < MOBILE_BREAKPOINT)
24607 | 15 |     return () => mql.removeEventListener("change", onChange)
24608 | 16 |   }, [])
24609 | 17 | 
24610 | 18 |   return !!isMobile
24611 | 19 | }

24625 |  9 |     // Destroy the session cookie by setting its expiration date to the past
24626 | 10 |     cookies()).set("authToken", "", { expires: new Date(0) });

24634 | /lib/actions/role.ts:

24636 |  1 | 'use server';
24637 |  2 | 
24638 |  3 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
24639 |  4 | import { redirect } from 'next/navigation';
24640 |  5 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
24641 |  6 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
24642 |  7 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
24643 |  8 | import { revalidatePath } from 'next/cache';
24644 |  9 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
24645 | 10 | import log from '../logger';
24646 | 11 | import { roles } from '../db/schema/tenant';
24647 | 12 | import { RoleFormSchema } from '../dto/role';
24648 | 13 | 
24649 | 14 | interface UserSession {
24650 | 15 |   tenantId: string;
24651 | 16 |   userId: number;
24652 | 17 | }
24653 | 18 | 
24654 | 19 | async function getSession() {
24655 | 20 |   const token = (await cookies()).get('authToken')?.value;
24656 | 21 |   if (!token) {
24657 | 22 |     redirect('/login');
24658 | 23 |   }
24659 | 24 |   try {
24660 | 25 |     return verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as UserSession;
24661 | 26 |   } catch (e) {
24662 | 27 |     log.error({ error: e }, 'Invalid session token');
24663 | 28 |     redirect('/login');
24664 | 29 |   }
24665 | 30 | }
24666 | 31 | 
24667 | 32 | export async function getRoles() {
24668 | 33 |     const session = await getSession();
24669 | 34 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
24670 | 35 |     return db.query.roles.findMany();
24671 | 36 | }
24672 | 37 | 
24673 | 38 | export async function upsertRole(data: unknown) {
24674 | 39 |     const session = await getSession();
24675 | 40 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
24676 | 41 | 
24677 | 42 |     const validatedFields = RoleFormSchema.safeParse(data);
24678 | 43 | 
24679 | 44 |     if (!validatedFields.success) {
24680 | 45 |         return { success: false, message: 'Invalid role data.' };
24681 | 46 |     }
24682 | 47 | 
24683 | 48 |     const { id, name, description } = validatedFields.data;
24684 | 49 | 
24685 | 50 |     try {
24686 | 51 |         if (id) {
24687 | 52 |             await db.update(roles).set({ name, description }).where(eq(roles.id, id));
24688 | 53 |         } else {
24689 | 54 |             await db.insert(roles).values({ name, description });
24690 | 55 |         }
24691 | 56 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/roles');
24692 | 57 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/users'); // Also revalidate users page in case roles changed
24693 | 58 |         return { success: true, message: `Role successfully ${id ? 'updated' : 'created'}.` };
24694 | 59 |     } catch (error) {
24695 | 60 |         log.error({ error }, 'Failed to upsert role');
24696 | 61 |         return { success: false, message: 'Failed to save role.' };
24697 | 62 |     }
24698 | 63 | }
24699 | 64 | 
24700 | 65 | export async function deleteRole(roleId: number) {
24701 | 66 |     const session = await getSession();
24702 | 67 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
24703 | 68 | 
24704 | 69 |     try {
24705 | 70 |         // You might want to add a check here to ensure the role is not in use
24706 | 71 |         await db.delete(roles).where(eq(roles.id, roleId));
24707 | 72 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/roles');
24708 | 73 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/users');
24709 | 74 |         return { success: true, message: 'Role deleted successfully.' };
24710 | 75 |     } catch (error) {
24711 | 76 |         log.error({ error, roleId }, 'Failed to delete role');
24712 | 77 |         return { success: false, message: 'Failed to delete role. It might be in use.' };
24713 | 78 |     }
24714 | 79 | }

24718 | /lib/actions/user.ts:
24719 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24720 |   1 | 'use server';
24721 |   2 | 
24722 |   3 | import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
24723 |   4 | import { redirect } from 'next/navigation';
24724 |   5 | import { verify } from 'jsonwebtoken';
24725 |   6 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
24726 |   7 | import { getTenantDb } from '@/lib/db';
24727 |   8 | import { UserFormSchema, type UserFormInput } from '@/lib/dto/user';
24728 |   9 | import { users, usersToRoles } from '@/lib/db/schema/tenant';
24729 |  10 | import { revalidatePath } from 'next/cache';
24730 |  11 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
24731 |  12 | import bcrypt from 'bcrypt';
24732 |  13 | import log from '../logger';
24733 |  14 | 
24734 |  15 | interface UserSession {
24735 |  16 |   tenantId: string;
24736 |  17 |   userId: number;
24737 |  18 | }
24738 |  19 | 
24739 |  20 | function isDatabaseError(error: unknown): error is { code: string; message: string } {
24740 |  21 |     return typeof error === 'object' && error !== null && 'code' in error;
24741 |  22 | }
24742 |  23 | 
24743 |  24 | async function getSession() {
24744 |  25 |   const token = (await cookies()).get('authToken')?.value;
24745 |  26 |   if (!token) {
24746 |  27 |     redirect('/login');
24747 |  28 |   }
24748 |  29 |   try {
24749 |  30 |     return verify(token, env.JWT_SECRET) as UserSession;
24750 |  31 |   } catch (e) {
24751 |  32 |     log.error({ error: e }, 'Invalid session token');
24752 |  33 |     redirect('/login');
24753 |  34 |   }
24754 |  35 | }
24755 |  36 | 
24756 |  37 | export async function getUsersWithRoles() {
24757 |  38 |     const session = await getSession();
24758 |  39 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
24759 |  40 |     
24760 |  41 |     const usersWithRoles = await db.query.users.findMany({
24761 |  42 |         with: {
24762 |  43 |             usersToRoles: {
24763 |  44 |                 with: {
24764 |  45 |                     role: true
24765 |  46 |                 }
24766 |  47 |             }
24767 |  48 |         }
24768 |  49 |     });
24769 |  50 | 
24770 |  51 |     return usersWithRoles.map(user => ({
24771 |  52 |        ...user,
24772 |  53 |         roles: user.usersToRoles.map(ur => ur.role.name).join(', ')
24773 |  54 |     }));
24774 |  55 | }
24775 |  56 | 
24776 |  57 | // The invalid re-export has been removed from here.
24777 |  58 | 
24778 |  59 | export async function upsertUserAction(data: UserFormInput) {
24779 |  60 |     const session = await getSession();
24780 |  61 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
24781 |  62 | 
24782 |  63 |     const { id, name, email, password, roles: roleIdsStr } = data;
24783 |  64 |     const roleIds = roleIdsStr.map(Number);
24784 |  65 |     
24785 |  66 |     try {
24786 |  67 |         await db.transaction(async (tx) => {
24787 |  68 |             if (id) { // Update existing user
24788 |  69 |                 const userToUpdate: { name: string; email: string; password?: string } = { name, email };
24789 |  70 |                 if (password) {
24790 |  71 |                     const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(password, 12);
24791 |  72 |                     userToUpdate.password = hashedPassword;
24792 |  73 |                 }
24793 |  74 |                 
24794 |  75 |                 await tx.update(users).set(userToUpdate).where(eq(users.id, id));
24795 |  76 |                 
24796 |  77 |                 await tx.delete(usersToRoles).where(eq(usersToRoles.userId, id));
24797 |  78 |                 if (roleIds.length > 0) {
24798 |  79 |                     await tx.insert(usersToRoles).values(roleIds.map(roleId => ({
24799 |  80 |                         userId: id,
24800 |  81 |                         roleId: roleId
24801 |  82 |                     })));
24802 |  83 |                 }
24803 |  84 | 
24804 |  85 |             } else { // Create new user
24805 |  86 |                 if (!password) throw new Error("Password is required for new users.");
24806 |  87 |                 
24807 |  88 |                 const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(password, 12);
24808 |  89 |                 
24809 |  90 |                 const [newUser] = await tx.insert(users).values({
24810 |  91 |                     name,
24811 |  92 |                     email,
24812 |  93 |                     password: hashedPassword,
24813 |  94 |                 }).returning({ id: users.id });
24814 |  95 | 
24815 |  96 |                 if (roleIds.length > 0) {
24816 |  97 |                     await tx.insert(usersToRoles).values(roleIds.map(roleId => ({
24817 |  98 |                         userId: newUser.id,
24818 |  99 |                         roleId: roleId
24819 | 100 |                     })));
24820 | 101 |                 }
24821 | 102 |             }
24822 | 103 |         });
24823 | 104 |     } catch (error: unknown) {
24824 | 105 |         log.error({ error }, 'Failed to upsert user');
24825 | 106 |         if (isDatabaseError(error) && error.code === '23505') {
24826 | 107 |             return { 
24827 | 108 |                 success: false, 
24828 | 109 |                 message: "A user with this email already exists.",
24829 | 110 |                 errors: { email: ["This email is already in use."] }
24830 | 111 |             };
24831 | 112 |         }
24832 | 113 |         return { success: false, message: "An unexpected error occurred." };
24833 | 114 |     }
24834 | 115 | 
24835 | 116 |     revalidatePath('/dashboard/users');
24836 | 117 |     return { success: true, message: `User successfully ${id ? 'updated' : 'created'}.` };
24837 | 118 | }
24838 | 119 | 
24839 | 120 | export async function deleteUserAction(userId: number) {
24840 | 121 |     const session = await getSession();
24841 | 122 |     const db = await getTenantDb(session.tenantId);
24842 | 123 | 
24843 | 124 |     if (userId === session.userId) {
24844 | 125 |         return { success: false, message: "You cannot delete your own account." };
24845 | 126 |     }
24846 | 127 | 
24847 | 128 |     try {
24848 | 129 |         await db.delete(users).where(eq(users.id, userId));
24849 | 130 |         revalidatePath('/dashboard/users');
24850 | 131 |         return { success: true, message: "User deleted successfully." };
24851 | 132 |     } catch (error) {
24852 | 133 |         log.error({ error, userId }, 'Failed to delete user');
24853 | 134 |         return { success: false, message: "Failed to delete user." };
24854 | 135 |     }
24855 | 136 | }
24856 | 
24857 | 
24858 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24859 | /lib/crypto.ts:
24860 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24861 |  1 | import { createCipheriv, createDecipheriv, scryptSync, randomBytes } from 'crypto';
24862 |  2 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
24863 |  3 | 
24864 |  4 | const ALGORITHM = 'aes-256-gcm';
24865 |  5 | const IV_LENGTH = 16;
24866 |  6 | const TAG_LENGTH = 16;
24867 |  7 | const KEY = scryptSync(env.ENCRYPTION_KEY, 'salt', 32);
24868 |  8 | 
24869 |  9 | export function encrypt(text: string): string {
24870 | 10 |   const iv = randomBytes(IV_LENGTH);
24871 | 11 |   const cipher = createCipheriv(ALGORITHM, KEY, iv);
24872 | 12 |   const encrypted = Buffer.concat([cipher.update(text, 'utf8'), cipher.final()]);
24873 | 13 |   const tag = cipher.getAuthTag();
24874 | 14 |   return Buffer.concat([iv, tag, encrypted]).toString('hex');
24875 | 15 | }
24876 | 16 | 
24877 | 17 | export function decrypt(encryptedText: string): string {
24878 | 18 |   const data = Buffer.from(encryptedText, 'hex');
24879 | 19 |   const iv = data.slice(0, IV_LENGTH);
24880 | 20 |   const tag = data.slice(IV_LENGTH, IV_LENGTH + TAG_LENGTH);
24881 | 21 |   const encrypted = data.slice(IV_LENGTH + TAG_LENGTH);
24882 | 22 |   const decipher = createDecipheriv(ALGORITHM, KEY, iv);
24883 | 23 |   decipher.setAuthTag(tag);
24884 | 24 |   const decrypted = Buffer.concat([decipher.update(encrypted), decipher.final()]);
24885 | 25 |   return decrypted.toString('utf8');
24886 | 26 | }
24887 | 
24888 | 
24889 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24890 | /lib/db/index.ts:
24891 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24892 |  1 | // lib/db/index.ts
24893 |  2 | import { drizzle, NodePgDatabase } from 'drizzle-orm/node-postgres';
24894 |  3 | import { Pool } from 'pg';
24895 |  4 | import { eq } from 'drizzle-orm';
24896 |  5 | import { tenants } from './schema/shared';
24897 |  6 | import * as tenantSchema from './schema/tenant';
24898 |  7 | import { env } from '@/env.mjs';
24899 |  8 | import { decrypt } from '@/lib/crypto';
24900 |  9 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
24901 | 10 | 
24902 | 11 | // 1. Main DB Client (for managing tenant metadata)
24903 | 12 | const mainPool = new Pool({ connectionString: env.POSTGRES_URL });
24904 | 13 | export const mainDb = drizzle(mainPool, { schema: { tenants } });
24905 | 14 | 
24906 | 15 | // 2. Tenant DB Client Cache
24907 | 16 | const tenantDbCache = new Map<string, NodePgDatabase<typeof tenantSchema>>();
24908 | 17 | 
24909 | 18 | // 3. Function to get a tenant-specific DB client
24910 | 19 | export async function getTenantDb(tenantId: string): Promise<NodePgDatabase<typeof tenantSchema>> {
24911 | 20 |   if (tenantDbCache.has(tenantId)) {
24912 | 21 |     log.info({ tenantId }, 'Tenant DB client cache HIT.');
24913 | 22 |     return tenantDbCache.get(tenantId)!;
24914 | 23 |   }
24915 | 24 |   log.info({ tenantId }, 'Tenant DB client cache MISS.');
24916 | 25 | 
24917 | 26 |   const results = await mainDb
24918 | 27 |     .select({ connectionString: tenants.connectionString })
24919 | 28 |     .from(tenants)
24920 | 29 |     .where(eq(tenants.tenantId, tenantId))
24921 | 30 |     .limit(1);
24922 | 31 | 
24923 | 32 |   // --- Start of Fix ---
24924 | 33 |   const tenantData = results[0]; // Access the first element of the array
24925 | 34 | 
24926 | 35 |   if (!tenantData) {
24927 | 36 |     log.error({ tenantId }, 'Tenant not found in main database.');
24928 | 37 |     throw new Error('Tenant not found');
24929 | 38 |   }
24930 | 39 | 
24931 | 40 |   const decryptedConnectionString = decrypt(tenantData.connectionString);
24932 | 41 |   // --- End of Fix ---
24933 | 42 | 
24934 | 43 |   const tenantPool = new Pool({ connectionString: decryptedConnectionString });
24935 | 44 |   const tenantDb = drizzle(tenantPool, { schema: tenantSchema });
24936 | 45 | 
24937 | 46 |   tenantDbCache.set(tenantId, tenantDb);
24938 | 47 |   log.info({ tenantId }, 'Created and cached new tenant DB client.');
24939 | 48 | 
24940 | 49 |   return tenantDb;
24941 | 50 | }
24942 | 
24943 | 
24944 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24945 | /lib/db/migrate.ts:
24946 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24947 |  1 | // In /lib/db/migrate.ts
24948 |  2 | import { drizzle } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js';
24949 |  3 | import { migrate } from 'drizzle-orm/postgres-js/migrator';
24950 |  4 | import postgres from 'postgres';
24951 |  5 | import log from '@/lib/logger';
24952 |  6 | 
24953 |  7 | export async function runTenantMigrations(connectionString: string) {
24954 |  8 |   // Use postgres 'on-the-fly' with max 1 connection for migrations
24955 |  9 |   const migrationClient = postgres(connectionString, { max: 1 });
24956 | 10 |   const db = drizzle(migrationClient);
24957 | 11 | 
24958 | 12 |   try {
24959 | 13 |     log.info('Starting tenant migration...');
24960 | 14 |     await migrate(db, { migrationsFolder: './drizzle/tenant' }); // Assumes tenant migrations are in 'drizzle/tenant'
24961 | 15 |     log.info('Tenant migration completed successfully.');
24962 | 16 |   } catch (error) {
24963 | 17 |     log.error({ error }, 'Tenant migration failed.');
24964 | 18 |     // Re-throw the error to ensure the API call fails loudly
24965 | 19 |     throw new Error('Could not run tenant migrations.');
24966 | 20 |   } finally {
24967 | 21 |     // Ensure the connection is closed
24968 | 22 |     await migrationClient.end();
24969 | 23 |   }
24970 | 24 | }

24977 |  2 | 
24978 |  3 | export const tenants = pgTable('tenants', {
24979 |  4 |   id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
24980 |  5 |   tenantId: text('tenant_id').notNull().unique(),
24981 |  6 |   name: text('name').notNull(),
24982 |  7 |   neonProjectId: text('neon_project_id').notNull().unique(),
24983 |  8 |   connectionString: text('connection_string').notNull(), // Encrypted
24984 |  9 |   createdAt: timestamp('created_at').defaultNow().notNull(),
24985 | 10 | });

24988 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24989 | /lib/db/schema/tenant.ts:
24990 | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
24991 |  1 | import { serial, text, pgTable, integer, timestamp, primaryKey } from 'drizzle-orm/pg-core';
24992 |  2 | import { relations } from 'drizzle-orm';
24993 |  3 | 
24994 |  4 | // Existing users table
24995 |  5 | export const users = pgTable('users', {
24996 |  6 |   id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
24997 |  7 |   name: text('name').notNull(),
24998 |  8 |   email: text('email').notNull().unique(),
24999 |  9 |   password: text('password').notNull(),
25000 | 10 | });
25001 | 11 | 
25002 | 12 | // New roles table
25003 | 13 | export const roles = pgTable('roles', {
25004 | 14 |     id: serial('id').primaryKey(),
25005 | 15 |     name: text('name').notNull().unique(),
25006 | 16 |     description: text('description'),
25007 | 17 |     createdAt: timestamp('created_at').defaultNow().notNull(),
25008 | 18 | });
25009 | 19 | 
25010 | 20 | // New users_to_roles join table
25011 | 21 | export const usersToRoles = pgTable('users_to_roles', {
25012 | 22 |     userId: integer('user_id').notNull().references(() => users.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
25013 | 23 |     roleId: integer('role_id').notNull().references(() => roles.id, { onDelete: 'cascade' }),
25014 | 24 | }, (t) => ({
25015 | 25 |     pk: primaryKey({ columns: [t.userId, t.roleId] }),
25016 | 26 | }));
25017 | 27 | 
25018 | 28 | // --- RELATIONS ---
25019 | 29 | 
25020 | 30 | export const usersRelations = relations(users, ({ many }) => ({
25021 | 31 |     usersToRoles: many(usersToRoles),
25022 | 32 | }));
25023 | 33 | 
25024 | 34 | export const rolesRelations = relations(roles, ({ many }) => ({
25025 | 35 |     usersToRoles: many(usersToRoles),
25026 | 36 | }));
25027 | 37 | 
25028 | 38 | export const usersToRolesRelations = relations(usersToRoles, ({ one }) => ({
25029 | 39 |     role: one(roles, {
25030 | 40 |         fields: [usersToRoles.roleId],
25031 | 41 |         references: [roles.id],
25032 | 42 |     }),
25033 | 43 |     user: one(users, {
25034 | 44 |         fields: [usersToRoles.userId],
25035 | 45 |         references: [users.id],
25036 | 46 |     }),
25037 | 47 | }));
25038 | 48 |

25060 |  3 | 
25061 |  4 | export const TenantSignupDto = z.object({
25062 |  5 |   orgName: z.string().min(3, 'Org name must be at least 3 characters').max(50),
25063 |  6 |   tenantId: z.string().min(3, 'Tenant ID must be at least 3 characters').max(50).regex(/^[a-z0-9-]+$/, 'Tenant ID must be lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens'),
25064 |  7 |   adminName: z.string().min(3, 'Admin name must be at least 3 characters').max(100),
25065 |  8 |   adminEmail: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
25066 |  9 |   adminPassword: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
25067 | 10 | });
25068 | 11 | 
25069 | 12 | export const LoginDto = z.object({
25070 | 13 |   email: z.string().email('Invalid email'),
25071 | 14 |   password: z.string().min(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
25072 | 15 | });
25073 | 16 | 
25074 | 17 | export const LoginWithTenantDto = LoginDto.extend({
25075 | 18 |   tenantId: z.string().min(1, 'Tenant ID is required'),
25076 | 19 | });
25077 | 20 | 
25078 | 21 | export type TenantSignupInput = z.infer<typeof TenantSignupDto>;
